src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Taolo ya Dikoduwa Kamora Dikgohola.

src_text: Disaster management after the floods.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebisitse matshediso bathong bohle ba lahlehetsweng ke beng ka bona dikgoholeng tsa morao tse mpe tse ileng tsa hlasela dibaka tse ngata tsa naha ya rona, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal..     Sepheo ka tsebahatso ya Maemo Dikoduwa Naha le dithuso tsa boiphediso tse sa tswa tsebahatswa ke Presidente Cyril Ramaphosa ne le ho netefatsa karabelo atlehileng le hlophisehileng makaleng ohle mmuso, ka Setsi sa Taolo ya Naha ya Dikoduwa.

src_text: Cabinet expressed condolences to all people who have lost their loved ones in the recent devastating floods that hit several parts of our country, particularly KwaZulu-Natal..
tgt_text: Biliyone ya diranta eo mmuso e ntshitseng sebedisetswa ho tshehetsa maiteko dithuso le ho iphumana, ho kgutlisa ditshebeletso tsa motheo le ho phallela ba hlokang ka ho ba thusa ka dijo, metsi, botshabelo, tsa bohlweki le diaparo.

src_text: The declaration of National State of Disaster and socio-economic relief interventions recently announced by President Cyril Ramaphosa, sought to ensure an effective and coordinated response across all spheres of government, through the National Disaster Management Centre..
tgt_text: Motjha wa ho aha botjha dibaka tse amehileng se qadile mme le batho ba naha ya rona ba kopane ka maikemisetso ho thusa ba lahlehetsweng ke bodulo le thepa ya bona..     Tlhahisoleseding ka Lefu laCoronavirus (COVID-19).

src_text: The R1 billion made available by the government is being used to support relief and recovery efforts, restore basic services and provide humanitarian assistance in the form of food, water, shelter, sanitation and clothing..
tgt_text: Kabinete kgathatsehile ka ho eketseha ha morao tjena ha ditshwaetso tsa COVID-19 dikarolong tse ding tsa naha mme ipileditse ho bohle ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa kgahlano le vaerase ena kotsi, haholoholo mariha tjena..     Vaerase ena ntse le kotsi mme ho enta ntse le sebetsa se bohlokwa haholo seo re ka itshireletsang ka sona.

src_text: The process to rebuild affected areas has already started as the people of our country unite in their determination to assist those who have lost their homes and possessions.
tgt_text: Kabinete thabiswa ke hore batho ba bangata ba ntse ba kgetha ho enta le tshireletso ya bona ya pele kgahlano le COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao di bontshe hore batho ba baholo ba fetang dipersente tse mashome mahlano ba se ba entile diprovenseng tse hlano..     Kabinete ipiletsa ho ba so ente ho enta molemong wa ho itshireletsa le beng ka bona.

src_text: Update on the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Bohle re lokela ho tswela pele le ho ikamahanya le melao ya ho itshireletsa ho COVID-19 kenyeletsang ho rwala semonkwana se kwahelang nko le molomo, ho hlapa matsoho ka metsi le sesepa, kapa ho sebedisa sehlwekisi se nang le alcohol ballwang dipersenteng tse 70, le ho arohana le ba bang ka bonnyane mitara..     Thuso Imollang Nakong ya Mathata (SRD).

src_text: Cabinet noted with concern the recent spike in COVID-19 infections in some parts of the country and urged all people to take precautionary measures to protect themselves against the deadly virus, especially during winter.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgothaleditse baahi ba fumanang R350 ya SRDGrant ho etsa dikopo hape, kamora hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong melawana metjha laolang dikopo le ho lokela ha batho ho fumana dithuso.

src_text: The virus is still constant threat and vaccination remains the most effective weapon to protect ourselves.
tgt_text: Dikopo di ka etswa websaeteng ya Setheo sa Dithuso tsa Setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa (SASSA) leng:https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.Mokgwatshebetso wa dikopo butswe ka la 23 Mmesa 2022 mme etswa inthaneteng molemong wa ho potlakisa katleho ya ona..     Thuso ena ya ho imolla bohlokwa haholo malapeng hlokang le ka sulafallwang ke maphelo ka lebaka la bofuma le ho hloka mesebetsi.

src_text: The cabinet is pleased that more people continue to choose vaccination as their first line of defence against COVID-19 after recent statistics showed that we have reached the milestone of over 50 per cent of adult vaccinations in five provinces.
tgt_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho fana ka dithuso tsa setjhaba hoba hlokang haholo ba kgone ho fumana tseo ba di hlokang tsa motheo..     Polokeho le Tshireletseho.
Kabinete tswella le ho nyatsa ho bolawa ka sehloho ha basadi mme ananetse karabelo potlakileng ya mapolesa ha tshwara babelaellwa polaong ya Mofumahatsana Hillary Gardee (28), waKamaguguMpumalanga.

src_text: Cabinet calls on those who have not yet been vaccinated to do so to protect themselves and their loved ones.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse nyatsitse ho bolawa ha batho ba tsheletseng Khayelitsha, Motsekapa.

src_text: We should also all continue to adhere to all COVID-19 prevention protocols, including the wearing of mask that covers both the nose and mouth, washing hands with water and soap, or using 70% alcohol-based hand sanitiser, and keeping safe social distance of at least one metre..   Social Relief of Distress (SRD) Grant.
tgt_text: Dipolao tsena tse sehloho di re hopotsa hore re lokela ho sebetsa ka matla re le setjhaba ho fedisa dikgoka le dikgoka tsa bong le polao ya basadi (GBVF)..     Kabinete ipileditse ho bohle naheng ena ho sebetsa mmoho le mmuso ntweng kgahlano le bosenyi le GBVF.

src_text: Cabinet encouraged citizens receiving the R350 SRD Grant to reapply, following the introduction of new regulations governing applications and eligibility for the grant.
tgt_text: Mmoho re ka netefatsa hore metse le diterata tsa rona di bolokehile bakeng sa batho bohle, ho kenyeletsa maqheku, basadi le bana..     Moruo.

src_text: Applications can be lodged on the South African Social Security Agency (SASSA)  website: https://srd.sassa.gov.za/.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho bulwa semmuso ha feme ya ho etsa ditene ya Kwastina ya Corobrik, Driefontein,Gauteng ke Presidente Ramaphosa ka Laboraro la la 4 Motsheanong.

src_text: The application system opened on 23 April 2022 and is fully digital process to enable quick turnaround times..
tgt_text: Feme ena ya maemo phahameng haholo ke karolo ya matsete diranta tse dimiliyone tse 800 tsamayang mmoho le diranta tse ding tse dimiliyone tse 200 tse behetsweng ho atolosa feme ya Corobrik ya konkreiti KwaZulu-Natal.Corobrik ke nngwe ya dikgwebo tsa mona tse ileng tsa utlwa boipiletso ba Presidente Ramaphosa ba hore dikgwebo tsa Afrika Borwa le tsa matjhaba di tsetele moruong wa naha ena.

src_text: The relief grant is an important safety net for needy families who would otherwise be devastated by the scourge of poverty and unemployment.
tgt_text: Kabinete elelletswe hore moruo fokolang wahydrogen matlafaditswe kamora ho thakgolwa ha lori sebedisang hydrogen ke Anglo American.

src_text: Government is committed to providing social assistance to the most vulnerable so that they can meet their basic needs.
tgt_text: Lori ena neng sebedisa diesel mme ya fetolelwa tshebedisong ya hydrogen le sebedisang le dibetri tsa lithium-ion keya pele lefatsheng.

src_text: Safety and security.
tgt_text: Moruo wahydrogen hlwauwe le lewa le pele moruong wa naha ya rona lwantshang tshenyo ya tikoloho, mme moruo ona tla ntshetsa pele kgolo moruong thuse le ho thehweng ha mesebetsi..     Kabinetee boetse ananetse matsete mang moruong wa rona ka khampani ya dijo ya Ireland, The Kerry Group butseng feme ya diranta tse dimiliyone tse 650, Hammarsdale,KwaZulu-Natal, eo sepheo ka yona leng ho hlahisa dijo ho ya ho ile kontinenteng.

src_text: Cabinet continues to condemn the senseless killing of women and has welcomed the swift response by law-enforcement officers in arresting suspects in connection with the death of Ms Hillary Gardee (28), of Kamagugu in Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Feme ena ke ikgethang hobane na le dikarolo tsa moshwelella tse kenyeletsang disebediswa tsa eneji nyenyane, tlhahiso ya matla letsatsi ho fokotsa tshebediso ya motlakase wa keriti ya naha ena, mokgwa wa paballo ya eneji, le wa paballo ya metsi, tshebediso ya ona hape le mokgwa wa ho fokotsa tshebediso ya ona.

src_text: Cabinet further condemned the killing of six people in Khayelitsha, Cape Town.
tgt_text: The Kerry Group fihlile Afrika Borwa ka 2011, mme matsete yona amang ke letshwao la hore Afrika Borwa ntse ratelwa matsete.

src_text: These senseless murders are reminder that we must do more as society to end violence and gender-based violence and femicide (GBVF)..
tgt_text: Matsete ana tla kamora ho thakgolwa ha vene ena ya Isuzu D-Max hlahisitsweng naheng, Gqeberha, Kapa Botjhabela kgweding fetileng.

src_text: Cabinet urged all people in the country to work with the government in the fight against crime and GBVF.
tgt_text: Koloi ena ya D-MAX ya mehleng ena bontsha boinehelo ba Isuzu naheng ena mmeke nngwe ya dikatleho tse fihletsweng tlasa Lenaneo la Ntshetsopele ya Tlhahiso ya Makoloi (APDP).

src_text: Together we can ensure that our communities and streets are safer for all people, including the elderly, women and children..  Economy.
tgt_text: APDP ke mokgwatshebetso wa kgothatso wa tlhahiso bakeng sa indasteri ya makoloi oo sepheo ka ona leng ho phahamisa tlhahiso indastering boletsweng ya makoloi, ho phahamisa bolengindastering mme ka tsela ena ho thehwe mesebetsi makaleng ohle amanang le tlhahiso ya makoloi.Kediranta tse dibiliyone tse batlang di eba 2,8 tse tla etswa ka tlhahiso ya mona nakong ya tshebetso ya APDP.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the official opening of Corobrik’s Kwastina brick manufacturing factory at Driefontein in Gauteng by President Ramaphosa on Wednesday, 4 May.
tgt_text: Matsete tla thusa ho theha mesebetsi fetang 1000 ka palo ka kotloloho femeng, le meng ya tlatsetso hirang batho ba 24 000, mme sena se tla kenya letsoho matlafatsong ya baahi lebatoweng.

src_text: The state-of-the-art factory forms part of an R800 million investment, which goes hand in hand with further R200 million earmarked to expand Corobrik’s concrete operations in KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Seboka sa tsa Merafo.

src_text: Corobrik is one of several local businesses that have responded to President Ramaphosa’s call on South African and international enterprises to invest in this economy.
tgt_text: Investing in African Mining Indaba 2022 neng tshwaretswe Cape Town International Convention Centreho tloha ka la 9 ho ya ho la 12 Motsheanong 2022, ke le leng la mapatlelo maholo ho bontshana le tshebedisano pakeng tsa ba amehang indastering ya merafo.

src_text: Cabinet noted that the fledgling hydrogen economy has been given boost with the launch of hydrogen-powered truck by Anglo American.
tgt_text: Mookotaba wa ketsahalo ena ne le: “Ntshetsopele ho tsa Merafo Afrika: Matsete Diphetohong ho tsa Eneji, ESG, leMeruo”.

src_text: The truck – which was converted from diesel to hydrogen, and is powered in part by lithium-ion batteries – is world first.
tgt_text: Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore Seboka sa tsa Merafo se tla thusa ho pepesa le ho phahamisa Afrika Borwa jwaloka naha ka kgahlang batsetedi..     Afrika Borwa amohela matsete naheng ya rona mme inehetse ho theheng maemo loketseng kgolo kenyeletsang bohle le diphetoho moruong..     Dikamano le Dinaha tsa Matjhaba le tsa Mabatowa.

src_text: The hydrogen economy has been identified as strategic priority for our country’s green economy, and to drive economic growth and employment..
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse ditherisano tsa morao tjena tsa Presidente Ramaphosa le Presidente Joe Biden wa Amerika, Presidente Emmanuel Macron wa France le Presidente Hakainde Hichilema wa Zambia mapatlelong fapaneng.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed further investment into our economy by an Irish food company, The Kerry Group, which has opened new R650-million plant in Hammarsdale, KwaZulu-Natal aimed at producing sustainable food for the continent.
tgt_text: Dipuisano tsena di nehile Presidente monyetla wa ho tiisa maqhama le tshebedisano pakeng tsa Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding ditabeng tsa bohlokwa boemong ba mabatowa le matjhaba, ho kenyeletsa ho fumana tharollo ya kgotso ntweng ya Ukraine     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: The plant is unique as it boasts numerous sustainability features including low energy usage equipment, solar power generation to reduce consumption from the local grid, waste heat capture, and efficient water capture, reuse and reduction.
tgt_text: Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete.

src_text: The Kerry Group has had presence in South Africa since 2011, and their further investment is sign that South Africa remains an investment destination of choice.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho baahi bohle ho mamela Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete tsa mafapha naha mmuso le puo ya lefapha la Bopresidente molemong wa hore ba behe mmuso leihlo..     Ha ho tekwa Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso, mafapha ohle fana ka dintlha tse felletseng tsa merero le tsa bohlokwa tseo ikemiseditseng ho di phetha selemong.

src_text: These investments follow in the footsteps of the launch of the locally manufactured Isuzu D-Max bakkie in Gqeberha in the Eastern Cape last month.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka Dipuo tsa Ditekanyetso ke ho netefatsa hore ditjhelete tsa setjhaba di sebediswa hantle ho thusa setjhaba ka tseo di se hlokang.

src_text: The new generation D-MAX crowns Isuzu’s commitment to South Africa and is one of the successes achieved under the Automotive Production Development Programme (APDP).
tgt_text: Dipuo tsa ditekanyetso di boetse ke monyetla wa hore Matona hlalose haholwanyane ka mosebetsi wa mmuso, ho kenyeletsa dikatleho le diphephetso tseo tobanang le tsona.

src_text: The APDP is production incentive scheme for the motor industry aimed at promoting production volumes in the specified motor vehicle industry, promoting added value in the automotive component industry thus creating employment across the automotive value chain.
tgt_text: Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya Kgase ya Mafura (LPG).

src_text: Approximately R2,8 billion will be generated in local content production value through the lifecycle of the APDP.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lewa la Qalo ya Tshebediso ya LPG, le phatlaladitsweng hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona ka Tlhakubele.

src_text: The investment will secure more than 1 000 direct jobs at the plant and indirectly employ 24 000 people, contributing significantly to community upliftment in the region..  Mining Indaba.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho atolosa indasteri ya kgase ya mafura naheng.

src_text: The Investing in African Mining Indaba 2022 held at the Cape Town International Convention Centre from 9 to 12 May 2022, is one of the biggest platforms for engagement and collaboration between all stakeholders in the mining industry.
tgt_text: LPG tla ba le seabo se molemo phapanong ya mehlodi ya eneji..     Hara tse ding lewa le tla laola theko makaleng fapaneng tlhahiso le ho tshehetsa tlhahiso ya meqomo ya LPG naheng ena.

src_text: The theme of the event was: “Evolution of African Mining: Investing in the Energy Transition, ESG, and the Economies”.
tgt_text: Le tla boela le rute setjhaba ka melemo ya ho sebedisa LPG jwaloka mofuta mong wa eneji..

src_text: Cabinet is confident that the Mining Indaba will assist in showcasing and promoting South Africa as an investment destination of choice.
tgt_text: Le tla fumaneha kamora hore le phatlalatswe ke Lefapha la Diminerale le Eneji howww.dmr.gov.za.

src_text: South Africa welcomes investments into our country and is committed to creating favourable conditions for inclusive growth and transformation of the economy.
tgt_text: Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha Mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.

src_text: International and regional relations.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralotshebetso wa Batho ba sa Itekanelang wa Lewa wa Naha mabapi le Matsholo ho Hlokomedisa ka Ditokelo tsa ba sa Itekanelang.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed President Ramaphosa’s recent interactions with President Joe Biden of the United States, President Emmanuel Macron of France and President Hakainde Hichilema of Zambia on different platforms.
tgt_text: Moralotshebetso tla tataisa lekala la poraefete le la setjhaba hore netefatse ho sireletswa ha ditokelo tsa basa itekanelang, jwalokaha di sireleditswe le Molaong wa Motheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.

src_text: These engagements allowed the President to strengthen bilateral relations and cooperation between South Africa and partner states on key regional and international issues, including finding peaceful solution to the conflict in Ukraine  Cabinet Decisions.
Budget Votes.
tgt_text: Moralotshebetso nehelana kadisebediswa tse tla thusa ho tlosa kgethollo thibelang ho nkuwa ha diqeto, haholoholo tse amanang le batho basa itekanelang boetse lemosa batho ba sa itekanelang hore ba tsebe ditokelo tsa bona jwalokaha di sireleditswe ke Molao wa Motheo.Moralotshebetso boetse fana ka thupelo hlokomedise mehloding ya ditaba le setjhabeng ka ditokelo tsa batho basa itekanelang thusa ho kenngweng tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang.Afrika Borwa saenne Tumellano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Ditokelo tsa Batho basa Itekanelang mmoho le Tokomaneya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) yaLekgotla la Tumellano la Ditokelo tsa Botho le Batho Afrika mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang leng Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa basa Itekanelang Afrika).

src_text: Cabinet calls on all citizens to follow the various Budget Votes by national government departments and The Presidency so that they can hold the government to account..  During Budget Votes, all departments give detailed account of their plans and priorities for the year.
tgt_text: Ho bontshanwe le bohle ba amehang, ho kenyeletsa Ntshetsopele ya Moruo ya Naha le Lekgotlala Basebetsi..     Seboka sa Lefatshe Metseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe.

src_text: Budget Votes seek to ensure that public funds are spent efficiently in meeting the needs of the public..
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Seboka saMetse ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022, Gauteng..     Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Maikutlo ka Seboka saMetseng ya Mahae sa Tsamaiso ya Lefatshe le Tokelo ya Lefatshe ka Tlhakubele.

src_text: They also provide the ideal platform for Ministers to further unpack the work of government, including successes and challenges..  Liquefied Petroleum Gas (LPG) Rollout Strategy.
tgt_text: Kabinete laetse hore ho be le dipontshano tse ding lebohle ba amehang..     Seboka ke sehlohlolo sa mosebetsi entsweng ngwahola ileng wa nonya maikutlo ba fapaneng ba amehang     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: Cabinet approved the LPG Rollout Strategy for implementation, which was published for public consultation in March.
tgt_text: Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.

src_text: The strategy seeks to expand the LPG industry in the country.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara Seboka sa Bohlano sa Lefatshe sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana, Durban International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka Sontaha sa la 15 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong.

src_text: LPG will contribute meaningfully to the diversification of sources of energy..
tgt_text: Ke lekgetlo la pele Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi (ILO) tshwarela seboka sena Afrika..     Baetapele ba Dinaha, matona 120, baemedi ba dikarolo tse tharo tsa dinaha tse 187 tseo leng ditho tsa ILO, makgotla Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba, ditheo tsa thuto phahameng, mekgatlo ya baahi, mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso le mehlodi ya ditaba ba lebelletswe ho ba sebokeng sena..     Seboka se tla boela se nehe Afrika Borwa monyetla wa ho beha ka pele Molao wa Motheo wa naha jwalokaha sireletsa ditokelo tsa bana.

src_text: The strategy will amongst other interventions, regulate the pricing in the value chain and support the manufacturing of LPG cylinders in the country.
tgt_text: Naha tla bontshana le dinaha tse ding tse itlhommeng pele phedisong ya mosebetsi wa bana mme ithute ho tsona.

src_text: It will also educate the public about the benefits of using LPG as an alternative form of energy..
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke (DDM).

src_text: It will be accessible after it has been published by the Department of Mineral Resources and Energy on www.dmr.gov.za.
tgt_text: Presidente Ramaphosa tla ba le Imbizo ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke Mpumalanga ka Labohlano la la 20 Motsheanong 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ha re siye motho morao”.

src_text: National Strategic Framework on Disability Rights Awareness-Raising Campaigns for Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Jwaloka mokgwa wa bohlokwa wa ho ba le seabo ha setjhaba, Imbizo fa Presidente monyetla wa ho buisana le ba amehang ba fapaneng ka ho otloloha – haholoholo batho ba metseng ya mahae – le ho mamela mathata bona ka sepheo sa ho buisana le bona ka ona..     Sepheo ka Imbizo ya Presidente ya Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke ke ho lwantsha tse sitisang phumantsho momahaneng ya ditshebeletso le ho kgothaletsa seabo sa baahi ho ikamahantswe le Mokgwa wa Ntshetsopele ya Ditereke..     Maafrika Borwa ka latela le ho ba leseabo dipuisanong kaho kena diwebsaeteng tsa ho etsa setswalle tlasa #PresidentialImbizo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the National Strategic Framework on Disability Rights Awareness-Raising Campaigns for Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika.

src_text: The framework seeks to guide both private and public sectors in ensuring the rights of persons with disabilities are protected, as enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
tgt_text: Ho ketekwa ha selemo le selemo ha Kgwedi ya Afrika le Letsatsi la Afrika ka Laboraro lala 25 Motsheanong ho tla ba le mookotaba oo leng: “Selemo sa Phepo Nepahetseng: Matlafatso ya Phepo Nepahetseng le ya dijo tse lekaneng bohle kontinenteng ya Afrika”..     Jwaloka karolo ya ponelopele ya nako telele ho Agenda 2063 (eo leng leano la ntshetsopele la Afrika la ho fihlella ntshetsopele ya tsa bophelo kenyeletsang bohle le ya moshwelella ya dilemo tse fetang tse mashome mahlano), mookotaba ona tsepame bokgoning ba batho ba Afrika mme ho tsepamisitswe maikutlo haholo basading, batjheng le baneng.

Sena se bohlokwa haholo bakeng sa ntshetsopele hobane se lebisa maphelong ntlafetseng bakeng sa motho ka mong, se lebise le meputsong hodimo le kunong hodimo bakeng sa dinaha..     Ntlha ka sehloohong meketeng ya Kgwedi ya Afrika ke Beke ya Dikgokahano ya Afrika tla ketekwa Constitutional Hill, Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 23 ho ya ho la 27 Motsheanong.

src_text: The framework provides toolkit that will assist in the removal of discriminatory barriers in decision-making, especially those related to persons with disabilities.
It also conscientise persons with disabilities to know their rights as protected by the Constitution.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Afrika ke monyetla wa ho phahamisa kopano ya Afrika le momahano tebileng ya lebatowa, le ho inehela botjha ha Afrika bokamosong bo le bong.

src_text: The framework also provides training, media reporting and awareness-raising within society on the rights of persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Kabinete hopotsa bohle hore ditabatabelo tsa rona tsa naha di amana haholo le botsitso, kopano le tswelopele ya Afrika     Melaetsa.

src_text: It gives effect to the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: •    MmePhindile Xaba(53),ya sebeditseng nako telele le ka bokgabane indastering ya ditaba, Afrika Borwa le mose sebeleditse ntlafalo ya naha ena ka boitelo.•    LenqosaSilumkoSokupa(74),ya sebeleditseng Lekgotla la Tshireletseho ya Mmuso maemong fapaneng, nako telele sebetsa ka bokgabane Tshebeletsong ya Mmuso.

src_text: South Africa is signatory to the United Nations (UN) Convention on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities and the UN Protocol to the African Charter on Human and Peoples’ Rights on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (African Disability Rights Protocol).
tgt_text: •    Profesa Francis Wilson(83), setsebi sa moruo se ipabotseng, le mothehi wa Lekala la Diphuputso la tsa Basebetsi le Ntshetsopele Lebatoweng le Borwa ba Afrika     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba eso ka ba tlola molao..     Ngaka Kesavan Naidoo jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Ntshetsopele ya Makgabane Ditheong, Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo (DCoG).

src_text: The framework was consulted with all relevant stakeholders, including the National Economic Development and Labour Council.
tgt_text: Monghadi Siphosihle Emmanuel Hlomukajwaloka DDG: Botsamaisi ba Tshehetso le Dithuso Mebusong ya Lehae,DCoG.. src_text: Recovery and rebuilding efforts after the floods.
tgt_text: Kabinete rorisitse le ho ananela mosebetsi wa batho le mekgatlo yohle kentseng letsoho maitekong hore batho ba iphumane, le kahongbotjha kamora dikgohola tse mpe dikarolong tse ding tsa naha, haholoholo KwaZulu-Natal lebohile mekgatlo yohle eo eseng ya mmuso, ya ditumelo, baahi, beng ba dikgwebo le mekgatlo thusang faneng ka dijo, diaparo, dikobo, dipakana tse sebediswang ke bomme ha ba le matsatsing  le diaparo tsa sekolo malapeng tlokotsing sa kgoneng ho iphumanela tsa motheo tseo di hlokang..     Setsi Sa Taolo ya Dikoduwa se ntse se tswela pele le ho kopanya makala ohle mmuso maitekong sona ho fana ka thuso ya diphallelo malapeng ohle amehileng.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its praise and appreciation to all people and organisations involved in recovery and rebuilding efforts following the recent devastating floods in some parts of the country, especially in KwaZulu-Natal.
tgt_text: Batho ba fetang 7 000 ka palo ba fuwa botshabelo diterekeng tse nne tse amehileng haholo KwaZulu-Natal qadile mosebetsi wa ho fumantsha malapa amehileng bodulo ba nakwana ditsheng tseo leng tsa mmuso tse hlwauweng KwaZulu-Natal tse ka sebedisetswang ho ahela batho.

src_text: It thanked all non-governmental organisations, faith-based organisations, communities, business people and relief organisations that have provided food, clothes, blankets, dignity packs and school uniforms to vulnerable families to meet their basic needs..
tgt_text: Kabinete tiisitse boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho laola matlole dithuso tsa kamora dikgohola ka hloko le ka ho se pate letho.

src_text: The National Disaster Management Centre continues to coordinate all spheres of government in its efforts to provide humanitarian relief to all affected households.
tgt_text: Mohlahlobi Moholo wa Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete Afrika Borwa fana ka tshebeletso ya tlatsetso ya peholeihlo mme tlhophisobotjha ya ditjhelete ikamahanya le mokgwatshebetso wa mmuso wa ditekanyetso tsa ditjhelete..     Tsa Morao tsa Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).

src_text: Sheltering services are being provided to over 7 000 people in the four worst affected districts in KwaZulu-Natal..   Work has started on building temporary residences for affected families on state-owned land parcels that have been identified in KwaZulu-Natal for possible resettlement.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipileditse ho batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ho nka mehato ya ho itshireletsa ho thibela ho ata ha COVID-19 kamora hore dipalopalo tsa morao tjena di bontshe hore palo ya batho ba tshwaetsehang le ba kulang a eketseha jwalokaha mariha se kene..     Kabinete hopoditse bohle ho tswela pele ka ho itshireletsa le batho ba bang ka ho hlapa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala dimonkwana ha motho le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere moya kene, le ho enta..     Ente ntse le tshireletso matla kgahlano le COVID-19 hobane thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed government’s commitment to managing the flood relief funds prudently and transparently.
tgt_text: Ha hloke hore be le aterese ya moo dulang teng hore ente.

src_text: The Auditor-General of South Africa is providing an additional monitoring service and the reprioritisation of funds is in line with the government’s budgeting system..   Update on the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19).

src_text: Cabinet urged all people in South Africa to take precautionary measures to prevent the spread of COVID-19 after latest statistics showed marked increase in the rate of infections and illnesses associated with the winter season in the country..
tgt_text: Kabinete nyatsitse diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala ka matla naheng ena, ho kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse tlalehilweng tsa Sekolo se Phahameng sa Good Hope Seminary le Yunivesithi ya Stellenbosch, Kapa Bophirima.

src_text: Cabinet reminded everyone to continue safeguarding ourselves and other people by washing or sanitising our hands regularly, wearing mask when indoors, maintaining safe social distance, opening windows for ventilation and vaccinating.
tgt_text: Diketso tsena tse mpe di kgahlano le makgabane Molaotheo ao naha ya rona thehuweng hodima ona kenyeletsang seriti sa botho, ho se kgethollane ka mmala, ho se kgethollane ka bong, toka setjhabeng, ho se be leeme, le hlomphano.

src_text: Vaccination remains the best defence against COVID-19 as it prevents severe illness, hospitalisation and even death.
tgt_text: Molaotheo wa Riphaboliki ya Afika Borwa wa 1996 ke ona re tataisang hore re fedise dikarohano tse mpe le diketso tsa kgale tsa tlhokeho ya toka.

src_text: You do not need home address to vaccinate.
tgt_text: Ho ipiletswa ho batswadi ho ruta bana ba bona ho se ikamahanye le diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala le ho atlarela diphapano jwaloka karolo ya letsholo la rona le tsitlalletseng ho kgothaletsa kaho ya setjhaba le momahano ya setjhaba re sebetseng mmoho ho pepesa diketso tsa kgethollo ya mmala hohle moo di bonahalang di amoheleha mme re romele molaetsa hlakileng reng ha di amoheleha naheng ya rona ya demokrasi..     Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le Germany.

src_text: Any person, with or without an identity document, can get vaccinated for free at all public vaccination sites across the country.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse leeto la semmuso le bileng le katleho la Tjhanselara ya Riphaboliki ya Federale ya Germany, Monghadi Olaf Scholz, Afrika Borwa ka Labobedi la la 24 Motsheanong.

src_text: Stop racism!.
Cabinet strongly condemned all acts of racism in the country, including the reported incidents at the Good Hope Seminary High School and the University of Stellenbosch in the Western Cape.
tgt_text: Tjhanselara Scholz etetse kwano semmuso menngwe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa, eo leng moetapele wa letsholo la mmuso la ho kgothaletsa dikamano tse ntle tsa lebatowa le matjhaba, mmoho le ho hohela matsete hlokwang ka matla..     Hara tse ding baetapele bana ba babedi ba buisane ka ditsela tsa ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano ho tsa eneji le diphetoho maemong lehodimo, kgwebisano le matsete, le mekgwa ya ho lwantsha COVID-19 le tlhokeho matla ya ente.

src_text: These deplorable acts go against the constitutional values on which our democratic country was founded, which include human dignity, non-racialism, non-sexism, social justice, equity and respect..
tgt_text: Ba boetse ba buisana ka diketsahalo tsa kontinenteng ya Afrika le matjhabeng, ho kenyeletsa ntwa ya Ukraine le kamoo amang moruo wa lefatshe le phumaneho ya dijo le eneji.

src_text: The Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996 is our guide towards eradicating the despicable divisions and injustices of the past.
tgt_text: Germany ke molekane wa bobedi moholo kgwebisanong le Afrika Borwa, mme boetse ke naha ya boraro eo leng mohlodi wa bahahlaudi ba mose tsetela haholo naheng ena mme ke molekane ho tsa ntshetsopele..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana.

src_text: Parents are urged to teach children to reject racism and embrace diversity, as part of our concerted drive to promote nation-building and social cohesion.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho phethelwa ka katleho ha Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Bohlano sa Phediso ya Mosebetsi wa Bana se neng se tshwaretswe Durban ho tloha ka la 15 ho ya ho la 20 Motsheanong.

src_text: Let us work together to expose racism wherever it is treated as the norm and send clear message that there is no space for it in our democratic country..   South Africa – Germany relations.
tgt_text: Ba amehang ba tswang lefatsheng ka bophara ba ne ba le sebokeng sena se neng se tshwerwe ka tshebedisano le Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Basebetsi..     Kamora ho buisana ka mesebetsi metle kentsweng tshebetsong ke dinaha tse fapaneng le ho hlwaya tse salletseng morao le mehato potlakileng hlokehang bakeng sa ho potlakisa phediso ya ya ho etsa bana makgoba le ho qobellwa ha bana ho sebetsa, ho thehilwe ‘Durban Call to Action’ ho sebetsana le bothata ba ho etsa bana makgoba..     Ho etsa bana makgoba ke ntho mpe etswang ke setjhaba mme beha bana pontsheng ya maemo kotsi.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful Official Visit by Chancellor of the Federal Republic of Germany, His Excellency Olaf Scholz, to South Africa on Tuesday, 24 May.
tgt_text: Ke tlhekefetso mme thibela bana ho fumana thuto le menyetla meng ka ba ntshetsang pele.
Ngwana mong le mong wa Afrika Borwa na le tokelo ke keng ya phehiswa ya ho sireletswa diketsong tse sotlang mosebetsing.

src_text: Chancellor Scholz’s Official Visit was at the invitation of President Cyril Ramaphosa, who is leading the government crusade to foster good regional and international relations, as well as attract much-needed investments.
The two leaders discussed, among others, ways to enhance cooperation in areas such as energy and climate change, trade and investment, and responses to COVID-19 and vaccine demand.
tgt_text: Tokelo ya thuto ya motheo kentswe Molaong wa rona wa Motheo mme ho ya ka Molao wa Dikolo wa Afrika Borwa wa 1996 (Molao 84 wa 1996), “motswadi mong le mong tlameha ho netefatsa hore morutwana mong le mong eo mo hodisang kena sekolo ho tloha letsatsing la pele la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse supa ho sona ho fihlela letsatsi la ho qetela la sekolo selemong seo ngwana qetang dilemo tse 15 kapa bang ho kereiti ya borobong ho sona, ho tla ya ka hore ke efe etsahalang pele.” .

src_text: They also reflected on developments on the African continent and internationally, including the conflict in Ukraine and its impact on the international economy and food and energy security..   Germany is not only South Africa’s second-largest trading partner, but it is also the third-largest source of overseas tourists major investor and development partner..  5th Global Conference on the Elimination of Child Labour.
tgt_text: Ho ya ka Molao wa Bana wa 2005 (Molao 38 wa 2005), “ha ho motho ya ka sebedisang reka fana ka ngwana hore sebetse kapa hire ngwana”     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful conclusion of the 5th Global Conference on the Elimination of Child Labour held in Durban from 15 to 20 May.
tgt_text: Kananelo ya ho ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Tshireletso ya Batho Bohle ba Nyametswang ke Mapolesa (ICPPED).

src_text: Stakeholders from the around the world attended the conference, which was held in collaboration with the International Labour Organisation..   After discussing good practices implemented by the different countries and identifying gaps and urgent measures needed to accelerate the elimination of both child and forced labour, they adopted the ‘Durban Call to Action’ to deal with the scourge of child labour.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tokomane ya tlhahiso ya ICPPED palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo ha Afrika Borwa lohotha ho ba karolo ya tumellano ena.

src_text: Child labour represents the worst of society and exposes children to dangerous situations.
tgt_text: Ke tumellano tlamang dinaha tse saenneng tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) sebetsanang le tlolo ya ditokelo tsa botho ka mokgwa wa ho nyametswa ha batho ke mapolesa.

src_text: It constitutes abuse and prevents children from getting an education and other developmental opportunities.
Every child in South Africa has the inalienable right to be protected from exploitative labour practices.
tgt_text: Tumellano hlalosa ho nyametswa ke mapolesa ho qobelletsweng ho kenyeletsa kwetelo, ho tshwarwa ke mapolesa, ho kwallwa kapa mekgwa meng ka bakang hore sesenyi se hane ho dumela kapa se pate hore lehlatsipa le kae..     Ha tumellano se ananetswe kenyeleditswe le melaong ya naha ena, ho tla lebellwa hore Afrika Borwa tlalehele Matjhaba Kopaneng dilemo tse ding le tse ding tse pedi ka kamoo sebedisang tumellano ena kateng.
Tumellano fana ka mehato eo dinaha tseo leng ditho di ka nkang ho thibela ho nyametswa ha batho.

src_text: The right to basic education is enshrined in our Constitution and in terms of the South African Schools Act, 1996 (Act 84 of 1996), “every parent must cause every learner for whom he or she is responsible to attend school from the first school day of the year in which such learner reaches the age of seven years until the last school day of the year in which such learner reaches the age of 15 years or the ninth grade, whichever occurs first”..
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Afrika Borwa ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho.

src_text: In terms of the Children’s Act, 2005 (Act 38 of 2005), “no person may use, procure, offer or employ child for child labour”   Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse tlhahiso ya Tlaleho ya Bone ya Naha ya Tshireletso le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Botho Lekgotleng la Matjhaba Kopaneng la Ditokelo tsa Botho.

src_text: Accession to the International Convention for the Protection of all Persons from Enforced Disappearance (ICPPED) .
tgt_text: Tokomane ena tla lekolwa hamorao selemong ke lekala la Matjhaba Kopaneng le lekolang diketsahalo tse amang ditokelo tsa botho dinaheng tseo leng ditho tsa UN.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the ICPPED to Parliament for consideration of South Africa acceding to the convention.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa se lekotswe makgetlo mararo esale ba karolo ya Tumellano ya Ditokelo tsa Botho ya Matjhaba Kopaneng, mme tekolo ya ho qetela entswe ka Loetse..     Tlaleho fana ka tsa morao tse mabapi le dikgothaletso tse 187 tse amohetsweng tsa motjha wa tekolo wa.

src_text: The convention is universally binding treaty of the United Nations (UN) that deals with the violation of human rights through the enforced disappearance of people..
tgt_text: Ho qotsitswe maikutlo mang dintlheng tse netefaditsweng, tlhahisoleseding tswang mafapheng amehang, ditheo tse tshehetsang demokrasi le mekgatlo ya baahi amehang.

src_text: The convention defines the enforced disappearance to include abduction, arrest, detention or any other forms which may result in the perpetrator’s refusal to acknowledge or even conceal the whereabouts of the victim..   Once acceded to be domesticated into our laws, South Africa will be expected to report every two years to the UN on how it is giving effect to the convention.

The convention provides preventative measures the member countries need to put in place to prevent the enforced disappearance of persons in their respective countries..   South Africa’s fourth Country Report on the Protection and Promotion of Human Rights.
tgt_text: Kabinete motlotlo ka kgatelopele entsweng ha ho kenngwa tshebetsong dikgothaletso tsena le ka dikarolo tseo ho ntseng ho sebetsanwa le tsona.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the fourth Country Report on the Protection and Promotion of Human Rights to the United Nations Human Rights Council.
tgt_text: Tlaleho tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba ka Phato.

src_text: The UN Universal Periodic Review will review the report later this year.
tgt_text: Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.

src_text: Since being signatory to the UN Human Rights Convention, South Africa has been reviewed three times, with the last review done in September..
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho kenngwe tshebetsong Leano la Botsamaisi ba Metsi Merafo la.

src_text: The report provides an update on the 187 accepted recommendations from the 2017 review process.
tgt_text: Leano lena le fana ka mekgwa ya ho sireletsa le ho baballa metsi.

src_text: Inputs were drawn from verified data, information from relevant departments, Chapter 9 institutions and relevant civil-society organisations..
tgt_text: Le setletsa mesebetsi ya merafong le boikarabello ba merafe ba ho netefatsa tshebediso ya metsi ya ho ya ho ile bakeng sa naha.

src_text: Cabinet is pleased with the progress made in implementing the recommendations and also with those areas that are still work in progress.
tgt_text: Hara tse ding, leano le hlakisa mesebetsi le boikarabello ba makala mararo mmuso malebana le tse amanang le metsi merafo.

src_text: The report will be made public once it has been tabled to the UN in August.
tgt_text: Diphetoho tse sisintsweng di tla rarolla mathata ho tlisa dikotlo kgahlano le merafo silafatsang metsi mme di bebofatse   tshebediso ya molao reng ba silafatsang ba lefe.

src_text: Mine Water Management Policy of.
tgt_text: Leano lena le hlahisitswe ho ikamahantswe le Molao wa Naha wa Metsi, 1998 (Molao wa 36 wa 1998).

src_text: Cabinet approved the Mine Water Management Policy of 2022 for implementation.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Peholeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.

src_text: The policy provides mechanisms to protect and conserve water usage.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse tlaleho ya kgatelopele ya ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Moralotshebetso Nahanelang Bong wa Merero, Ditekanyetso tsa Ditjhelete, Tekolo ya Pehololeihlo le Bohlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete.

src_text: It balances the mine economic activities with the mandate to provide sustainable water usage for the country.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse kgatelopele matla entsweng ke mafapha fapaneng mmuso kentseng tshebetsong moralotshebetso ananetsweng ka..     Mafapha mang se behile pele maano tla tataisa mananeo matjha tla shebana le ditlhoko tsa basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.

src_text: Amongst other interventions, the policy clarifies the roles and responsibilities within the three spheres of government with regard to mine water issues.
tgt_text: Kabinete kopile hore ho be le mekgwa matla ya peholeihlo le tlaleho, haholoholo mafapheng so kenye ditlaleho tsa ona..     Puisano ya Batjha ya ho Tlotla Nelson Mandela (NMYD).

src_text: The proposed changes will resolve the challenges of instituting sanctions on polluters and make it easy to invoke the polluter pays principle.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le NMYD selemo le selemo ho tloha ka.

src_text: The policy is developed in line with the National Water Act, 1998 (Act 36 of 1998).
tgt_text: NMYD ya pele tla ba ka la 07 ho ya ho la 20 Phupu.

src_text: Report on the Framework on Gender Responsive Planning, Budgeting, Monitoring Evaluation and Audit.
tgt_text: Bona ke boiteko ba Bopresidente ba ho neha batjha ba kontinente ena lepatlelo la ho tshwara ditherisano tse ahang ka ditaba tse ba amang..     Dipuisano tsena tse tla bua ka Mopresidente wa mehleng ya hlomphuwang haholo matjhabeng Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela, di tla thakgola meqoqo amanang le ho otlella tlwaelo ya boetapele bo kgabane Afrika..     Dipuisanong tsena batjha ba tla nehwa monyetla wa ho abelana ka botjhaba ba bona.

src_text: Cabinet received the progress report on the implementation of the Framework on Gender Responsive Planning, Budgeting, Monitoring Evaluation and Audit.
tgt_text: Boiteko bona bo tla boela bo matlafatse dikamano tsa batho ka ho otloloha hara batjha ba kontinente.

Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang le tla fana ka dintlha tsa lenaneo la diketsahalo hamorao..     Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Peholeihlo ya Tshebetso ya Ntlafatso ya Basadi le Tekano ya Bong, Ntshetsopele ya Batjha le Ntshetsopele ya Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2021/.

src_text: Cabinet appreciated the great progress made by number of government departments in institutionalising the framework that was adopted in 2019 for implementation.
tgt_text: Kabinete fumane tlaheho ya selemo le selemo ya peholeihlo ya tshebetso ya 2021/22 malebana le ntlafatso ya basadi, batjha le batho ba sa itekanelang.

Tlaleho latella ditshupo tsa bohlokwa ntshetsopeleng ya tekatekano, boemo ba khiro le thuo le seabo sa dihlopha tsena tsa batho diketsahalong tsa mafapha le ditheo tsa mmuso..     Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho ikamahantswe le moralo, tekanyetso ya ditjhelete, peholeihlo, tekolo le moralotshebetso wa Hlahlobo ya Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete tsepameng ho bong ananetsweng ke Kabinete ka     Dibili.

src_text: More departments have since put in place policy priorities to guide the mainstreaming programmes targeting women, youth and persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong.

src_text: Cabinet has called for tighter monitoring and reporting, especially on some of the departments that have not yet reported.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho bakeng sa hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona.

src_text: Nelson Mandela Youth Dialogue (NMYD).
tgt_text: Sepheo ka Bili ena ke ho ntlafatsa bophelo bo botle le polokeho tsa basebetsi ba merafong, ho kenyeletsa tikoloho eo tshebetso ya merafong etsahalang ho yona.

src_text: Cabinet endorsed the NMYD to take place annually starting in.
tgt_text: Bili fetola Molao wa jwale wa Bophelo bo Botle le Polokeho Merafong wa 1996 (Molao wa 29 wa 1996).

src_text: The inaugural NMYD will take place from 7 to 20 July.
tgt_text: Hara tse ding ditlhomathiso tse lokisitsweng di hlakisa dikgopolo tse ding tse kahara Molao, di matlafatse moralotshebetso wa bophelo bo botle le polokeho mme di amahanye le mekgwa ya tshebetso tswang pele lefatsheng ha ho tluwa ho tsa polokeho merafong.

src_text: This is the Presidential initiative to afford the youth of the Continent platform to engage in constructive dialogues on matters that affect them.
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya.

Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Molaotheo ya Leshome le Metso Robedi ya 2022 hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka yona le hore Letona la Toka le Ditshebeletso tsa Ditjhankana, Monghadi Ronald Lamola ntshe tsebiso nang le dintlha tsa tlhomathiso sisintsweng ya Molaotheo.

src_text: The dialogues – which will be anchored on our international icon former President Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela – will start conversations to inculcate the culture of an ethical leadership in Africa.
tgt_text: Bili fetola Karolo ya 6(1) ya Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa 1996 tsebahatsang hore dipuo tsa semmuso tsa Afrika Borwa tse 11 ke Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenḓa, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa le isiZulu..     Ditlhomathiso di tla tlisa hlompho Puong ya Matsoho ya Afrika Borwa (SASL) jwaloka puo ya bo-12 ya semmuso naheng ena mme sena se tla ntshetsa pele puo le ba buang se boele se tiise tekano ya ditokelo tsa Maafrika Borwa ohle, ho sa kgathallehe maemo bona.

src_text: They will afford young people an opportunity to share their rich cultural heritage.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Thuto ya Motheo le se le ananetse Puo ya Matsoho jwalo ka puo ya lapeng     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: The initiative will also strengthen people-to-people relations amongst the youth of the continent.
tgt_text: Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana.

src_text: The Department of Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities will provide details of the programme for the events at later stage.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Beke ya Tshireletso ya Bana ya Naha ho tloha ho la 29 Motsheanong ho ya ho la 4 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “A re Sireletseng Bana nakong ya COVID-19 le Kamora moo.”.

src_text: 2021/22 Annual Performance Monitoring Report on Women Empowerment and Gender Equality, Youth Development and Promotion of the Rights of Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Bekeng ena ho tla tsepamiswa maikutlo ntlheng kgolo naheng ya ho ima ha batjha leng ntho totileng haholo ka nako ya COVID-19 ha batjha ba bangata ba beleha ka..     Kabinete ipileditse ho batswadi, mekgatlo ya baahi, ya ditumelo tse fapaneng le baahi ka kakaretso ho sebedisana le ho thusa ho lwantsha keketseho ya ho ima ha batjha..     Seboka sa Lefatshe sa Moruo (WEF).

src_text: Cabinet received the annual performance monitoring report for the 2021/22 report on the empowerment of women, youth and persons with disabilities.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa na le seabo ho WEF tla tshwarelwa Davos-Klosters, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 22 ho ya ho la 26 Motsheanong 2022, tlasa mookotaba reng: “Re Sebetsa Mmoho ho Kgutlisa Tshepo”.

src_text: The report tracks the key indicators in the promotion of equity, level of employment and the ownership and participation of these groups in the activities of the departments and the state-owned entities.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa thabela monyetla wa ho ba karolo ya tharollo le ho abelana ka boiphihlelo ba rona sebokeng sa lefatshe.

src_text: The report is compiled against the gender-responsive planning budgeting, monitoring, evaluation and Auditing framework which was adopted by Cabinet in   Bills.
tgt_text: Boteng ba rona WEF bo bohlokwa haholo ho phahamiseng lebitso la rona sebakeng sa matsete sa lefatshe, ho abelana le lefatshe ponelopele ya rona ya bokamoso le ho totobatsa tse ntjha tse seng di sibollotswe kahara naha..     Kgwedi ya Batjha.

src_text: Mine Health and Safety Amendment Bill.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Lenaneo la Kgwedi ya Batjha la 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.”.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Mine Health and Safety Amendment Bill for public comments.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Batjha le tla ketekwa semmuso Kapa Botjhabela..     Monongwaha ho tla be ho ketekwa selemo sa bo-46 esale baithuti ba itseka ka la 16 Phupjane 1976, Soweto, ba ipelaetsa kgahlano le ho qobellwa ho ithuta dithuto kaofela ka puo ya Afrikaans ke mmuso wa kgethollo..     Ka moya oo wa Phuptjane 1976, Kabinete ipileditse ho batjha ba naha ena ho lwantsha tlhokeho ya mosebetsi ntseng eketseha ya batjha ka ho ba le seabo mananeong ntshetsopele kang thupelo ya mosebetsi lebisang ho fumaneng mangolo, le mananeo thupelo ya mosebetsi bakeng sa ba seng ba na le mangolo..     Mmuso sibollotse mananeo nang le molemong wa ho tshehetsa ho thehwa ha mesebetsi bakeng sa batjha le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi ya nakwana.

src_text: The Bill seeks to improve the health and safety of the mine employees, including the environment in which mining operations take place.
tgt_text: Dikgwebo le tsona di kgothaletswa ho hohella batjha mosebetsing ka ho ba thehela menyetla ya mesebetsi..     Lenaneo la batjha bakeng sa kgwedi ya Phuptjane le kenyeletsa diketsahalo tse fapaneng ho tloha ho thakgolweng ha letsholo la dipulamadiboho tsa batjha, ho thakgolweng ha Lenaneo la Moemedi wa Letshwao wa NYDA le diketsahalo tse ding tsa tshebeletso ya naha ya Batjha naheng ka bophara.

src_text: The Bill amends the current Mine Health and Safety Act, 1996 (Act 29 of 1996).
tgt_text: Letona la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang Lefapheng la Bopresidente haufinyane le tla hlakisa lenaneo kaofela.

src_text: The revised amendments provide, among others, clarity on some of the concepts in the Act, strengthen the health and safety regulatory framework and align it with international best practices with regard to safety in the mines..
tgt_text: Ho lebelletswe hore diketsahalo tsohle tsa batjha di ikamahanye le melawana ya bophelo bo botle ya COVID-.

src_text: The Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 .
tgt_text: Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the Constitution Eighteenth Amendment Bill of 2022 for public comments and that the Minister of Justice and Correctional Services, Mr Ronald Lamola, can give notice with particulars of the proposed amendment to the Constitution..
tgt_text: Mmuso, ka tshebedisano le ntlo ya Naha ya Baetapele ba Setso tla ba le Seboka sa Lefatshe la Metseng ya Mahae ka Labohlano la la 27 le ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong 2022 molemong wa ho buisana ka ditaba tse amanang le thuo ya mobu..     Ditaba tsena di kenyeletsa motjha wa ho tloswa ha lefatshe la metseng ya mahae Mmusong le iswa ho beng ba lona ba loketseng leng se bohlokwa bakeng sa matlafatso ya baahi ba metseng ya mahae.

src_text: The Bill amends Section 6(1) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996, which proclaims that South Africa’s 11 official languages are Sepedi, Sesotho, Setswana, siSwati, Tshivenda, Xitsonga, Afrikaans, English, isiNdebele, isiXhosa and isiZulu..
tgt_text: Ho se be teng ha thuo ya lefatshe ka molao metseng ya mahae ho fokodisa ditokelo tsa beng ba lefatshe le ho fokotsa bokgoni ba bona ba ho le sebedisetsa ho ntlafatsa maphelo bona le maemo bona ditjhelete     Melaetsa.

src_text: The amendments will give recognition to the South African Sign Language (SL)as the 12th official language of the country and will advance its cultural acceptance and affirm equal rights for all South Africans, irrespective of their disabilities.
tgt_text: MahlohonoloKabinete lebohisitse le ho lebisa ditakalletso tse ntle ho: Mme Leanne Manas, sebohodi sa lenaneo la SABC la Morning Live, ya hlomphilweng ka Kgau Tlotlang Tshebetso Ipabotseng ya France ho tswa naheng ya France ka Labobedi la la 17 Motsheanong 2022, bakeng sa seabo sa hae boqolotsing ba ditaba, kgasong le mesebetsing meng fapaneng ya ho thusa setjhaba.

src_text: The Department of Basic Education already recognises the SASL as home language   Upcoming events.
tgt_text: MatshedisoKabinete lebisitse matshediso malapeng le metswalleng ya bana: Monghadi Mpho Moerane (52), Ramotse wa mehleng wa Masepala wa Johannesburg, eo neng le radipolotiki ya neng lwanela ditokelo tsa batho bile le mohlanka wa batho ba Johannesburg.

src_text: Child Protection Week.
tgt_text: Pele e ba Ramotse bile setho sa Komiti ya Ramotse ya Tikoloho le Meralo ya Ditshebeletso.

src_text: South Africa will mark National Child Protection Week from 29 May to 4 June 2022 under the theme: “Let us Protect Children during COVID-19 and Beyond”..   During the week, special attention will be drawn to the national issue of teenage pregnancy, which saw spike during COVID-19 of teenagers giving birth in..
tgt_text: Ngaka Deborah Fraser (56), sebini se hapileng dikgau tse ngata mminong wa sedumedi se neng se sa tswa hlomphuwa ka Doctor of Philosophy in Sacred Music ke Christian Leadership Academy.Ngaka Namane Magau (70), serutehi se neng se hlompheha bile le setho se hlomphehang sa Boto ya Bahlokomedi ba Ditjhelete ba Lekgotla la Naha la AIDS Afrika Borwa.Monghadi Mike Schüssler (60), eo neng le setsebi se hlomphehang sa moruo Afrika Borwa le mokaubere indastering ena mme na le maikutlo tjhatsi ka maemo moruo wa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Cabinet called for combined effort from parents, civil society, religious groupings and the community at large to help change the rise in teenage pregnancy.
tgt_text: Monghadi Jamie Bartlett (56), sebapadi se neng se tlotlwa Afrika Borwa sa kalaneng le dipapadi tsa thelevisheneng se neng se hapile dikgau tse ngata, se tumme ka seabo sa sona jwaloka Mike O'Reilly ho Isidingo le David Genaro ho Rhythm City.

src_text: World Economic Forum (WEF).
tgt_text: Kabinete mmoho le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba boetse ba lebisitse matshediso mmusong le bathong ba United Arab Emirates (UAE) kamora ho hlokahala ha Mopresidente Sheikh Khalifa bin Zayed Al Nahyan (73) wa UAE      KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuteho ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe hore ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.

src_text: South Africa is participating in the WEF in Davos-Klosters, Switzerland from 22 to 26 May 2022, under the theme: “Working Together, Restoring Trust”..   South Africa values the opportunity to be part of the solution and share our experiences at the global forum.
tgt_text: Monghadi Bongani Sinenhlanhla Dladla ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong wa Phethahatso Botong ya Ntshetsopele ya Indasteri ya tsa Kaho.

src_text: Our nation’s presence at WEF is also critical to growing our reputation as global investment destination, sharing with the world our vision for the future and highlighting new developments within the country.
tgt_text: Mongadi Shabeer Hamid Khan ke Akhaontente Kgolo Matlotlong Naha..     Mme Mendoe Ntswahlana ke Mohlanka ya ka Sehloohong Thekong ya Thepa, Matlotlong Naha..     Kabinete dumellane le ho hirwa ha ba latelang bakeng sa ho tlatswa ha dikgeo Botong ya Balaodi ya Letlole le Leholo la Eneji     Monghadi Mosimaneotsile Jim Besnaar; (ii)    Mme Unati Nombakuse-Figlan.

src_text: Issues in the Environment.
tgt_text: Moruo.

src_text: Economy .
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse kgatelopele tsa morao tjena tse kgothatsang, maitekong mmuso ao sepheo ka ona leng ho kgothaletsa kgolo ya moruo.

src_text: Cabinet has welcomed the recent positive developments in the country’s interventions aimed at stimulating economic growth.
tgt_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi tse tswang ho ba Dipalopalo Afrika Borwa, tlhokeho ya mosebetsi fokotsehile ho tloha dipersenteng tse.

src_text: According to the recent unemployment figures from Statistics South Africa, unemployment decreased from.
tgt_text: 3 kotareng ya bone ya 2021 ho ya dipersenteng tse.

src_text: 3 per cent in the fourth quarter of 2021 to.
tgt_text: 5 kotareng ya pele ya.

src_text: 5 per cent in the first quarter of.
tgt_text: Ke kotara ya bobedi jwale sekgahla se atolositsweng sa tlhokeho ya mosebetsi se fokotseha.

src_text: The expanded unemployment rate has declined for second quarter in row.
tgt_text: Mesebetsi mengata fumanwe makaleng ditshebeletso tsa baahi le setjhaba, makaleng tlhahiso le bohwebi.

src_text: The biggest job gains were in community and social services, manufacturing and trade..
The gross domestic product in the first quarter of 2022 grew by.
tgt_text: Tlhahiso yohle ya kahara naha kotareng ya pele ya 2022 hodile ka persente tse.

src_text: 9% which takes the size of our economy to pre-pandemic levels.
tgt_text: 9% mme sena sa lekanya moruo wa rona le nakong ya pele ho sewa sena.

src_text: Over the quarter, the manufacturing sector was the economy’s key performer with an increase in the production of petroleum and chemicals, food and beverages, and metals and machinery.
tgt_text: Kotareng eo, lekala la tlhahiso bile lona le sebetsang ka matla mme le bile le kgolo tlhahisong ya petroliamo le dikhemikhale, dijo le dino, le dimethale le metjhini..     Phaello tsena tse itekanetseng di bontsha hore moruo wa rona ntse le matla le hore maiteko kang Leano la Tlhophisobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ntse matlafala.

src_text: These moderate gains show that our economy remains robust and that interventions such as the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan are gaining momentum.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho bohle ho tshehetsa dikgwebo le diindasteri tsa lehae ka ho reka dihlahiswa le ditshebeletso tsa tsona..     Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya mokgatlo wa ditekolo wa S&P Global ya ho lekolabotjha maemo Afrika Borwa ho kgona ho lefa melato ya yona – ho tloha maemong tsitsitseng ho ya ho matle.

src_text: Cabinet calls on everyone to support local businesses and industries by buying local products and services.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ona boetse behile bokgoni ba naha ba ho lefa melato ya ditjhelete tsa dinaha tse ding ho BB minus le ya tjhelete ya kwano ho BB.
Theko ya tsa ho Iphedisa.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the decision by the rating agency S&P Global to revise South Africa's credit rating outlook – from stable to positive.
tgt_text: Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19) le ntwa ntseng tswela pele lefatsheng di bile le kameho matla thekong ya tsa ho iphedisa lefatsheng ka bophara.

src_text: Rating agency also affirmed the long-term foreign and local currency debt ratings at BB minus and BB respectively.
tgt_text: Maafrika Borwa le ona tsieditswe ke theko nyolohang ya mafura, dijo le tse ding tsa bohlokwa..     Re lokela ho sebetsa mmoho, re thusane re boele re baballe disebediswa tsa rona nakong tsena tse boima.

Mmuso etsa ka hohle kamoo ka kgonang kateng ho thusa bohle, haholoholo ba futsanehileng..     Banka ya Afrika Borwa Kgolo sebetsang hantle matla le ikemetseng thusa ho sireletsa setjhaba ditlamoraong tsa boleng ba tjhelete ka ho tsitlallela infleishene seng batsi tlase ha ho bapiswa le ya dinaha tse ding..     Kabinete ananetse qeto ya Matlotlo Naha ya ho eketsa nako ya ho fokotswa ha Lekgetho la Mafura la Kakaretso (GFL).

src_text: Cost of living  .
tgt_text: GFL fokoditswe ka  50 bakeng sa litara ya mafura ka Mmesa le Motsheanong, mme sena se tla tswela pele le ho tloha ho la 1 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 6 Phupu.

src_text: The Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) pandemic and the ongoing global conflict have had severe impact on the cost of living worldwide.
South Africans too are frustrated by rising prices of fuel, food and essentials..   We all need to pull together, help each other and save our resources in this difficult time.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse qeto ya Khomeshene ya Ditlhodisano ya ho beha ditheko tsa dintho tsa bohlokwa leihlo, haholoholo pehelo ya hore dikgwebo di lokela ho fana ka mabaka ho eketsa ditheko tsa dihlahiswa..     Kopano ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Government is doing everything in its power to provide relief for everyone, especially the poor.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa Kopano ya morao ya tsa Kgwebo ya Japan le Afrika Borwa, eo ho yona ho dumellanweng ka lenaneo le leholo la mosebetsi le kenyeletsang tshebedisano ho tlisweng ha diphetoho ho tsa tikoloho, ditheknolojing tsa dipalangwang tsa motlakase le mehlodi ya motlakase ya tsa tlhaho..     Kopanong ho boetse ho dumellanwe ka hore ho be le letsholo la marangranng la ho hlakisa menyetla teng Afrika Borwa ho beng ba dikgwebo ba Japan, ntshetsopele ya boiphihlelo indastering ya lehae ya tlhahiso ya makoloi, menyetla ya tlhahiso le phapanyetsano ya boiphihlelo ho tsa tekgniki..     Japan ke nngwe ya dinaha tseo leng balekane ba bohlokwa kgwebisanong le rona mme tsetela haholo makaleng fapaneng Afrika Borwa, ho tloha ho tsa tlhahiso ya makoloi ho ya metjhining tswang pele ya merafong, le ho tloha ho kgwebo ho tsa temothuo ho ya ditshebeletsong tsa ditjhelete..     Kabinete boetse ananetse ho thehwa ha Mokgwatshebetso wa Barekisetsi ba Dinaheng tse ding ba Batho ba Batsho ke Lefapha la Kgwebisano, Diindasteri le Ditlhodisano (dtic), molemong wa ho kopanya difeme tse romelang thepa entsweng naheng ena dinaheng tse ding lefatsheng.

src_text: Our well-functioning, strong and independent South African Reserve Bank is helping to shield society from the ravages of inflation by keeping it within narrow target range; well below what many other countries are currently experiencing.
tgt_text: Mokgwatshebeso ona tla thusa kabelanong ya tlhahisoleseding, bokgoni le tsebo, mme tsamaya mehlaleng ya dikatleho tsa Lenaneo la Beng ba Diindasteri ba Batho ba Batsho.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the decision by National Treasury to grant an extension of the reduction in the General Fuel Levy (GFL).
tgt_text: Eneji.

src_text: The GFL was cut by  50 litre for April and May, and will be further extended from 1 June to 6 July.
tgt_text: Mehato ya rona ya ho netefatsa boteng ba motlakase sa timeng  nako telele matlafaditswe kamora hore ho nehelanwe ka Karolo ya 4 ya Sebaka sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Kusile, Mpumalanga.

Ho nehelana hona ke letshwao la phihlello ya bohlokwa matsapeng Eskom ho tsitsisa mokgwatshebetso wa motlakase mme ho tla eketsa dimekawate (MW) tse 800 keriting ya matla..     Kabinete elelletswe hore kaho ya dikarolo tse nne tsa tse tsheletseng tsa ho fehla motlakase phethetswe projekeng ya Kusile ya ho Fehla Motlakase..     Kabinete ananetse ho eketswa ha bokgoni bo bong ba ho fehla motlakase keriting leng ntho kgonahaditsweng ke ho dumella bahlahisi ba motlakase ba ikemetseng hore ba hlahise motlakase.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the decision of the Competition Commission to closely monitor prices of essential food items, particularly the provision that businesses should justify their price increases.
tgt_text: Mmuso sa tswa saena tumellano ya ho reka dimekawate tse 150 ho Scatec ASA, bao leng bahlahisi ba motlakase tswang mehloding ya tlhaho..     Lekgotla la Boeletsi la Matlafatso ya Batho ba Batsho Batsi Moruong (B-BBEE).

src_text: Japan-South Africa Business Forum.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho kgethwa ha Lekgotla le letjha la naha la Boeletsi la B-BBEE.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the recent Japan-South Africa Business Forum, which agreed to an ambitious work programme that includes collaboration on green industrialisation, electric vehicle technologies and green hydrogen..
tgt_text: Lekgotla le na le batho ba bangata ba tswang makaleng kgwebo, mekgatlo ya basebetsi, mekgatlo ya baahi le ditheo tsa thuto hodimo, ba tla thusa ho tataisa mmuso ho tlisweng ha diphetoho moruong..     Leha ho bile le kgatelopele kgahlisang molemong wa ho lokisa tse senyehileng nakong ya mmuso wa kgethollo, ho sa na le tse ngata tse lokelang ho etswa ho matlafatsa botsamaisi ba batho ba batsho, ho matlafatsa ntshetsopele ya bokgoni le ho atolosa phumano ya thepa le ditshebeletso molemong wa ho neha batjha le basadi ba batho ba batsho menyetla.

src_text: The forum also agreed to virtual ‘roadshow’ to highlight South African opportunities to more Japanese businesses, skills development in the local auto industry, work streams on manufacturing opportunities and the exchange of technical experiences.
tgt_text: Dikgohola.

src_text: Japan is one of our most important trade partners and leading investor in number of South African sectors, ranging from automobiles to advanced mining machinery, and from agribusiness to financial services.
tgt_text: Dithuso tse ntseng di tswella tsa mmuso diprovenseng tse anngweng ke dikgohola di etsa phapang kgolo.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the establishment of the Black Exporters Network by the Department of Trade, Industry and Competition (the dtic), to bring together black-owned firms which are currently exporting locally made goods to other parts of the world.
tgt_text: Mmuso behile pele phumantsho ya dijo, metsi le botshabelo bakeng sa batho ba tlaletsweng ke naha, le ho lokiswa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso senyehileng.

src_text: The network will enable the sharing of information, experience and know-how, and it builds on the successes of the Black industrialist Programme..   Energy.
tgt_text: Ho sebetswa ka matla ho tsoseletsa ditshebeletso tsa motheo tse kang metsi, motlakase, bohlweki le tsamaiso ya dikgwerekgwere..     Ke tjhelete ka bang dimiliyone tse R189, 217 sebediswang Lenaneong la Ntlafatso ya Mekhukhu leo ka lona sepheo leng ho fetola boleng ba bophelo ba ba phelang mekhukhung..     Ho boetse ho na le dimiliyone tse R733, 086 tsa Ntshetsopele ya Nyehelo ya Phumantsho ya Matlo tse tla thusa ho thehweng ha bodulo ba moshwelella le bo momahaneng ha batho..     Kabinete ananetse thuso ya botho tswang naheng ya Qatar ya dijo, diaparo, di-generator, dihlwekisametsi, metjhini thusang bakudi ho phefumoloha, ditente le disebediswa tsa bongaka.

src_text: Our long-term energy security has been given massive boost following the commercial handover of Unit 4 at the Kusile Power Station in Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Nyehelo ena tla thusa batho ba fetang 4 000 ka palo ba fuweng bodulo ba nakwana ditsing tsa tlhokomelo tsa baahi.

src_text: This handover marks another milestone in Eskom’s efforts to stabilise the power system and will add 800 megawatts (MW) to the power grid..
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ananetse thuso ya botho tswang United Arab Emirates (UAE) ya dijo le metsi ho thusa mahlatsipa dikgohola..     Ho Thehwa ha Letlole la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba.

src_text: Cabinet noted that the construction of four out of the six generation units had been completed at the Kusile Power Station project..
tgt_text: 1    Kabinete ananetse ho thehwa ha Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba ke Mokgatlo wa Ntshetsopele ya Diindasteri (IDC) sebedisana le lefapha la Bookamedi le dtic.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the addition of new generation capacity to the grid, which was made possible by the decision to allow independent power producers to produce electricity.
tgt_text: Tshehetso ena tla thusa ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi ya nakwana bakeng sa batjha ba ka bang 50 000 leng mesebetsi tla tswela setjhaba molemo etswang metseng.. 2    Tshehetso tla kenyeletsa tlhokomelo ya bophelo bo botle le ya baahi, dijo le phepo ntle ka mokgwa wa dibaka tsa ho phehela batho, ntshetsopele ya ho ngola le ho bala, mananeo ho hlokomedisa ka tsa tikoloho le ho lwantsha diphetoho maemong lehodimo mmoho le maiteko ho tshehetsa batjha.

src_text: Government recently signed an agreement to buy 150 MW of capacity from renewable power producer, Scatec ASA.
tgt_text: Letlole le tla tshehetsa dikgwebo tse 26 tsa baahi le tse sa iketsetseng phaello..     Bosenyi le Bobodu.

src_text: Broad-Based Black Economic Empowerment (B-BBEE) Advisory Council.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho tshwarwa ha batho mabapi le diketso tsa manyofonyofo, ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong le bobodu.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the appointment by President Cyril Ramaphosa of the country’s new B-BBEE Advisory Council.
tgt_text: Ba tshwerweng ba kenyeletsa bao neng le bahlanka ba hodimo mmusong le dikgwebong tsa mmuso, mme ba bang ba bona ba tobane le diqoso tse kenyeletsang ho tlolwa ha Molao wa Botsamaisi ba Ditjhelete tsa Setjhaba, 1999 (Molao wa 1 wa 1999).

src_text: The council comprises diverse group of people from business, trade unions, community-based organisations and academia, who will be responsible for guiding government on the transformation of the economy.
tgt_text: Ho tshwarwa ha batho bana ho kenyeletsang le ho tshwarwa ha mohlanka wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha, Setsing sa Kamohelo ya Baphaphathehi sa Desmond Tutu, Pretoria, ya belaellwang ka ho nka tjotjo ho letswantle, ke bopaki ba hore ha ho motho eo molao sa tlo mo fihlela mme ha ho sebaka sa basebetsi ba sa tshepahaleng lekaleng la setjhaba..     Kabinete boetse ananetse kgatelopele bonahalang pusetsong ya baena ba ha Gupta, Rajesh le Atul, Afrika Borwa.

src_text: While there has been remarkable progress in reversing apartheid’s distortions on the economy, more work still needs to be done in increasing black management control, upscaling skills development and broadening procurement to give opportunities to black women and the youth.
tgt_text: Sena se latela ho tshwarwa ha morao ha bona Dubai, UAE, kamora hore Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Mapolesa Bosenyi (Interpol) ntshe ditsebiso tsa ho ba batla.

src_text: Floods.
tgt_text: Bobedi bona bo batleha Afrika Borwa mabapi le seabo sa bona ho hatjweng ha mmuso, ho kenyeletsa manyofonyofo le ho patwa ha mehlodi ya ditjhelete tse seng molaong.

src_text: Ongoing government relief efforts in the provinces affected by the recent devastating floods are making significant impact.
tgt_text: Ditherisano pakeng tsa mekgatlo ya tshebetso ya molao ya naha ya UAE le Afrika Borwa ka pusetso ya bona naheng ya rona di tswela pele.

src_text: Government has prioritised the provision of food, water and shelter for displaced people and the repair of damaged infrastructure.
tgt_text: Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa maikemisetso mmuso ho lwantsha bosenyi le bobodu ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..     Ho tshwarwa ha bona ke sesupo sa metjha le mekgwa sebetsang hantle ya hore ba belaellwang ka bosenyi ba ikarabelle diketsong tsa bona tse mpe le ho netefatsa hore ha ho ya kahodima molao..     Kabinete nyatsitse boiteko bo se nang dihlong ba ho kgella mmuso le naha ya rona fatshe kamora hore ho senngwe hampe kheibole Karolong ya 1 ya Seteishene sa ho Fehla Motlakase sa Matla sa Eskom, Mpumalanga ne le ketsahalo ya bone ya tshenyo belaellwang seteisheneng sa ho fehla motlakase kamora hore diketsahalo tse tshwanang le eo di tlalehwe diteisheneng tse ding tse tharo dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng.

src_text: Extensive work is underway to restore basic services such as water, electricity, sanitation and waste removal.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsa morao tjena tsa diketso tsa bosenyi ke pontsho ya hore re tlameha ho leka ka matla re le setjhaba ho etsa hore ho be le polokeho metseng ya rona.

src_text: About R189, 217 million is being used for the Upgrading of the Informal Settlements Programme aimed at improving the quality of life of informal settlement dwellers.
tgt_text: Dintlha tsena di re hopotsa hore ho lwantsha bosenyi ke boikarabelo ba setjhaba le hore kaofela ha rona, ho kenyeletsa mapolesa, baetapele ba dipolotiki, baahi, malapa, beng ba dikgwebo, basebetsi le mekgatlo ya baahi, re lokela ho ba le seabo twantshong ya bosenyi..     Kabinete na le tshepo ya hore ditjhelete tse ding tse behetsweng thoko ke Lefapha la Mapolesa bakeng sa diteishene tsa mapolesa tse nang le palo hodimo ya melato ya dipolao, dipeto le diketso tse ding tsa bosenyi ba dikgoka, di tla thusa ho fetola maemo le ho tlisa polokeho metseng..     Tsa Morao tsa COVID-.
Kabinete hopoditse bohle hore COVID-19 ha so fele mme dikotsi tsa tshwaetso tse ntjha di tla eketseha nakong ya mariha.

src_text: An additional R733, 086 million has been allocated through the Human Settlements Development Grant to assist in the creation of sustainable and integrated human settlements..
tgt_text: Re tlameha ho tswela pele ho nka mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho itshireletsa le ba bang kenyeletsa ho hlapa kapa ho hlwekisa matsoho kgafetsa, ho rwala semonkwana ha le kahara moaho, ho se atamelane le ba bang, ho bula difenstere hore ho kene moya le ho enta..     Seboka sa African Union (AU).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the humanitarian aid from the State of Qatar in the form of foodstuff, clothing, generators, water purifiers, ventilators, tents and medical supplies.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse tsebahatso, boitlamo le boinehelo bo ananetsweng Sebokeng se sa Tlwaelehang sa AU sa Boferekanyi le Diphetoho tse sa Tsamaelaneng le Molaotheo Afrika se neng se tshwaretswe Malabo, Republic of Equatorial Guinea, ka Moqebelo wa la 28 Motsheanong..     Baetapele ba Afrika ba lekotse ditshoso tse pheelletseng, ba lekola mekgwa ya jwale ya ho di arabela mme ba itlama ho matlafatsa polokeho ya dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa AU tse tobaneng le boferekanyi le bongangele..     Lefu la Monkeypox.

src_text: The donation will benefit over 4 000 citizens temporarily housed in community care centres.
tgt_text: Kabinete tiiseditse Maafrika Borwa hore balaodi ba rona ba tsa bophelo bo botle ba malala laotswe ho beha leihlo le ho thibela lefu la Monkeypox kamora hore le qhome dinaheng tse se nang lona.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the humanitarian aid from the United Arab Emirates (UAE) in the form of foodstuff and water to assist victims of the recent floods.
tgt_text: Leha ho se motho ya fumanweng na le lefu lena Afrika Borwa, balaodi ba tsa bophelo bo botle naheng ba tswela pele ho beha maemo ana leihlo     Qeto ya Kabinete.

src_text: Launch of Social Development Fund.
tgt_text: Puisano le Setjhaba ka Mehato ya ho Sebetsana le Kgwebo seng Molaong ya Masalla Ditshepe.

src_text: 1  Cabinet welcomed the launch of the Social Employment Fund by the Industrial Development Corporation (IDC) in partnership with the Presidency and the dtic.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore ho be le dipuisano le setjhaba mabapi le ditshisinyo tsa ho thibela kgwebo ya masalla ditshepe tse utswitsweng le tse lokisitsweng.

src_text: The support will provide bridging employment opportunities for up to 50 000 young persons in socially-useful work being done in local communities.. 2  The support will include  health and community care, food and nutrition support like soup kitchens, promotion of literacy, greening and climate change mitigation programmes as well as  and youth support initiatives.
tgt_text: Boshodu ba masalla ditshepe le dikheibole tsa koporo meralong ya ditshebeletso ya setjhaba bo sitisa tshebetso ya moruo ka ho baka ditjeho tse hodimo.

src_text: The Fund will support 26 community and not-for-profit enterprises.
tgt_text: Tse ding tsa ditshitiso di kenyeletsa tshitiso ya phepelo ya motlakase le ditshebeletso tsa diterene ka lebaka la diporo tse sentsweng.

src_text: Crime and corruption.
tgt_text: Ho sitisa tsamaiso ya dipalangwang tsa bapalami ho eketsa ditefello tsa ho tsamaya.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the arrest of several individuals in connection with fraud, money laundering and corruption.
tgt_text: Dikheibole tsa motlakase tse sentsweng le tse sa bolokehang di kotsi ho baahi, haholoholo bana..     Kabinete laetse dtic ho etella pele dipuisano bakeng sa nako itseng, le ho nonya maikutlo setjhaba le makala loketseng, ka mehato sebetsang hantle eo mmuso ka kenyang tshebetsong ho thibela ho senngwa ha meralo ya ditshebeletso ya bohlokwa.

src_text: These include former high ranking state and parastatal employees, some of whom face charges relating to the contravention of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
tgt_text: Kamora moo, Kabinete tla tsebahatsa mehato tjhaetsweng monwana     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: The arrests – which include that of Home Affairs official at the Desmond Tutu Refugee Reception Centre in Pretoria who allegedly accepted bribe from foreign national – bear testimony to the fact that no one is above the law and that there is no space for dishonest employees in the public sector..
tgt_text: Seboka sa Matjhaba se Mabapi le Theknoloji Polokong ya Kgotso (PTPS) sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN).

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the progress being made on the extradition of the Gupta brothers, Rajesh and Atul, back to South Africa.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla tshwara seboka sa Botshelela sa PTPS Lekgotleng la Diphuputso tsa Saense le Diindasteri Pretoria ho tloha ka Labobedi la la 21 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.

src_text: This follows their recent arrest at Dubai in the UAE after the International Criminal Police Organisation (Interpol) had issued red notices.
tgt_text: Ho lebelletswe baromuwa ba 300 ba tswang dinaheng tse 50 tseo leng ditho sebokeng sena..     Seboka se kopanya ba nang le thahasello ho tswa sesoleng, sepoleseng, le batho ka kakaretso Dinaheng tseo leng Ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng molemong wa hore ba sebetse mmoho tshebedisong ya ditheknoloji tsa sejwalejwale le tse tswetseng pele le dikgopolotaba matsholong poloko ya kgotso Matjhaba Kopaneng.

src_text: The brothers are wanted in South Africa in connection with their alleged role in state capture, including fraud and money laundering.
tgt_text: Seboka se tla sebediswa jwaloka lepatlelo la ho abelana ka tlhahisoleseding le ho qothisana lehlokwa bakeng sa dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa UN tse nang le seabo matsholong ho boloka kgotso ka tshebediso ya ditheknoloji tsa morao tjena matsholong ana..     Tlhodisano ya Naha Tshwarwang Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi tla Tshwarwa Lekgetlo la Bone ya WorldSkills South Africa (WSZA).

src_text: Discussions between law-enforcement agencies in the UAE and South Africa on their extradition are underway.
