tgt_text: Ho tshwerwe Tlhodisano ya Naha ya Kamora Dilemo tse Pedi ya Bone ya WSZA, Inkosi Albert Luthuli International Convention Centre, KwaZulu-Natal ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 10 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba: “Ntlafatso ya Tlhahiso ya ba Etsang Mesebetsi ya Matsoho Mongwahakgolong wa bo-21”..     Ketsahalo ena sebedisetswa ho ntlafatsa boiphihlelo ba batho ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka mosebetsi ka phedisang motho le ho lebisa tshebedisanong le ba bang indastering ena.

src_text: Their arrest demonstrates government’s determination to fight crime and corruption without fear or favour..
tgt_text: Ketsahalo ena boetse sebedisetswa ho lekola boemo ba boithuto ba mosebetsi le ntshetsopele ya ba etsang mesebetsi ya matsoho hodima ho kgothaletsa ho kgethwa ha mesebetsi ya matsoho jwaloka kgetho ya pele ya baithuti ba rona     Molaetsa.

src_text: These arrests demonstrate that processes and mechanisms are working effectively to hold perpetrators accountable for their heinous actions and ensure that no one is above the law..
tgt_text: MatshedisoKabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lebisitse matshediso Lelapeng la Boreneng le setjhabeng sa Borena ba Maphoto kamora ho hlokahala ha Motlotlehi Morena Moholo Zanozuko Tyelovuyo Sigcau     KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao..     Monghadi Jacob Ganny Mbele jwaloka Molaodi-Kakaretso (DG) Lefapheng la Diminerale le Eneji..     Mme Pumeza Nwabisa Nodada jwaloka Motlatsa-Molaodi-Kakaretso (DDG): Botsamaisi ba Meru Lefapheng la Meru, Botshwasi le Tikoloho.

src_text: Cabinet condemned the blatant attempt to undermine our economy and country following the malicious damage to cable at Unit 1 of Eskom's Matla Power Station in Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Mme Susan Mafanedza Masapu jwaloka Moeletsi ya ka Sehloohong wa Mmuso wa Molao Lefapheng la Toka le Ntshetsopele ya Molaotheo..     Mme Doris Tshepe jwaloka Mokhomeshenara Khomesheneng ya Ditlhodisano..     Ngaka Alex Mahapa jwaloka Moeletsi ya Ikgethang wa nako tsohle ho Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo lefapheng la Tshebeletso ya Mmuso le Tsamaiso.

src_text: ISSUES IN THE ENVIRONMENT.
tgt_text: Diphetoho Maemong Lehodimo.

src_text: Climate Change.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo ya Monghadi Alok Sharma, Afrika Borwa, eo leng Mopresidente wa Seboka sa bo-26 sa Maemo Lehodimo sa Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN), ho tloha ka la 19 ho ya ho la 21 Phuptjane 2022, le tekolo ya hae ya hore Afrika Borwa bontshitse ho ikemisetsa ho fetohela enejing ya mehlodi ya tsa tlhaho..  Ka 2021, Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa kopane le baetapele ba bang tsebahatsong ya tshebedisano ya bohlokwa le dinaha tsa France, Germany, United Kingdom le Amerika, mmoho le European Union, molemong wa ho tshehetsa phetoho nang le toka moruong sebedisang mehlodi ya eneji sa hlahiseng khabone le setjhaba se nang le bokgoni ba ho emelana le maemo lehodimo mabe..  Afrika Borwa sebeditse ka thata itokisetsa ho fetela tlhahisong ya motlakase hlwekileng le ho fallela mehloding ya eneji ya tlhaho kang matla mafura hlwekileng etswang ka metsi le motlakase, dimela, matla moya, matla letsatsi le metsi, hara mehlodi meng.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the visit to South Africa by Mr Alok Sharma, President of the 26th United Nations (UN) Climate Change Summit, from 19 to 21 June 2022, and his assessment that South Africa has shown clear commitment to clean energy transition.
tgt_text: Motswako ona wa eneji tlisa tekatekano pakeng tsa mehlodi ya eneji ho netefatsa matla tshepehang emelanang le ditlhoko tsa naha tsa eneji tse eketsehang..  Tshebediso ya Ente ya Lefu la Coronavirus (COVID-19).

src_text: In 2021, President Cyril Ramaphosa joined other leaders in announcing historic partnership with the governments of France, Germany, United Kingdom and United States, as well as the European Union, to support just transition to low carbon economy and climate resilient society.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse ho theoha ka matla ha palo ya batho ba tshwaetswang ke COVID-19 rekotilweng Afrika Borwa dibekeng tse mmalwa tse fetileng mme ya kgothaletsa batho bohle ba loketseng, ho tswela pele ka ho enta leng ntho thusang ho thibela ho kula haholo, ho robatswa sepetlele le ho hlokahala..  Ho fihlela jwale halofo ya palo ya batho ba baholo ba Maafrika Borwa se fumane bonnyane ente le nngwe ya COVID-.

src_text: South Africa has been hard at work in preparing the ground for our clean energy transition and move to clean energy sources such as green hydrogen, biomass, wind power, solar power and hydro-power, among other renewables.
tgt_text: Mmuso ikemiseditse ho sebedisa tjhelete ya tswala tlase eo sa tswa kadingwa ke Banka la Lefatshe ho reka diente tse ding tsa COVID-19 le ho netefatsa hore setjhaba se sireletsehile ka ho lekaneng ditshwaetsong tse ka bang teng..  Kabinete boetse buisane ka dintlha tse amanang le tswelopele taolong ya sewa sa COVID-19, haholoholo kgatelopele etswang molemong wa ho kgutlela bophelong bo tlwaelehileng.

src_text: This so-called energy mix allows for balance between energy sources to ensure reliable power to meet the country’s growing energy needs.
tgt_text: Letona la Bophelo bo Botle, Ngaka Joe Phaahla, le tla fana ka dintlha tse ding..  Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha.

src_text: Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19) vaccine uptake.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebohile Maafrika Borwa ohle ikamahantseng le mekete ya naha ya Letsatsi la Naha la Batjha ya Labone la la 16 Phuptjane 2022 tlasa mookotaba reng: “Ntshetsopele ya mekgwa ya ho iphedisa ya moshwelella ya batjha le matla bona molemong wa bokamoso bo tjhatsi.” Moya wa tjantjello le matla bontshitsweng ke batjha naheng ka bophara ke dintho tse ka ketekelwang mme di tlisa tshepo ya bokamoso bo tjhatsi..  Jwalokaha re lebile mafelong Kgwedi ya Naha ya Batjha re tebiseng matsapa rona ho netefatsa hore batjha ba fihlella mananeo mangata ao mmuso fanang ka ona le ho ba thusa hore ba kgone ho ba le seabo moruong..  Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba, jwaloka mohiri moholo arabetse phephetso ena ka ho thusa batjha ba phethetseng dithuto tsa bona ba sa sebetseng ho fumana boiphihlelo ka Lenaneo la Tshebeletso ya Setjhaba la ho Rupella Batjha Mosebetsing.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the significant drop in COVID-19 infections recorded in South Africa over the past few weeks and encouraged all eligible people to  continue  to vaccinate, which helps to prevent serious illness, hospitalisation and death.
tgt_text: Mmuso boetse kenya tshebetsong Letlole la Mesebetsi ya Setjhaba (SEF) le Tsehebeletso tsoseleditsweng ya Naha ya Batjha (NYS) leng maiteko ho theha mesebetsi tla thusa khirong ya batjha ba ka bang.

src_text: Half of all adult South Africans have to date received at least one COVID-19 vaccine dose.

Government aims to use the low-interest loan recently approved by the World Bank to purchase additional COVID-19 vaccine doses and ensure that the nation is adequately protected against potential infections.
tgt_text: Maiteko ana tla fana ka boiphihlelo bo hlokehang haholo ba mosebetsing mme boele tiise molemo wa seabo sa baahi.

src_text: Cabinet also considered matters related to developments on the management of the COVID-19 pandemic, particularly with the progress being made towards full return to normal socio-economic activities.
tgt_text: SEF sebetsa mmoho le mekgatlo eo eseng ya mmuso (di-NGO) ha NYS hira batjha ditshebeletsong tse tswelang baahi molemo naheng ka bophara..  Dipalangwang.

src_text: The Minister of Health, Dr Joe Phaahla, will provide further details.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse Morero wa Dintlha tse 11 wa Tshebetso tla sebetsana le ho kwalwa ha mebila le ho hirwa ha matswantle jwaloka bakganni ba dilori.

src_text: National Youth Day  .
tgt_text: Morero ona sibollotsweng ke Komiti ya Matona Fapaneng (IMC) ya Mebila le ho tsamaiswa ha Thepa ka tshebedisano le ba amehang indastering ya ho tsamaiswa ha thepa, hara tse ding kgothaletsa ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha ditokomane tsa ho eta le ho ikamahanya le melao ya tsa basebetsi..  IMC thehetswe ho sebetsana le diketsahalo tse jeleng setsi tsa ho kwalwa ha mebila le mehwanto ya boipelaetso ya bakganni ba dilori ba Maafika Borwa ba sa kgotsofalang.

src_text: Cabinet thanked all South Africans for joining in the country’s National Youth Day commemorations on Thursday, 16 June 2022 under the theme: “Promoting sustainable livelihood and resilience of young people for better tomorrow.” The spirit of enthusiasm and resilience shown by the youth across our nation is indeed cause for celebration and hope for better tomorrow.
tgt_text: Mehwanto le ho kwalwa ha mebila di na le kameho mpe phallong ya dipalangwang tshosa boramatsete ba dinaha tse ding mme sa bohlokwa haholo na le kameho mpe moruong le metjheng bohlokwa ya phepelo sebedisang mebila amehang mehwantong..  Kgaello ya metsi Masepaleng Moholo wa Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB).

src_text: As National Youth Month draws to an end, let us intensify our efforts to ensure young people access the many support programmes provided by government and facilitate their active participation in the economy.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse seabo sa Lefapha la Metsi le Bohlweki (DWS) Masepaleng Moholo wa NMB, Kapa Botjhabela molemong wa ho thibela ho kwalwa ha phepelo ya metsi nakong eo provense tobaneng le mathata matla kgaello ya metsi qadileng ka.

src_text: The Public Service, as the largest employer, has responded to this challenge by enabling unemployed graduates to gain experience through the Public Service Graduate Internship and Learnership Programme.
tgt_text: DWS sebetsa le provense ho kenya tshebetsong mehato ya nako kgutshwane bohareng le telele ya ho lwantsha ditlamorao tsa komello..  Kabinete boetse ipileditse ho baahi ba NMB ho ikamahanya le melawana ya metsi behilweng ke bomasepala ba lehae ho netefatsa boteng ba metsi nako telele.

src_text: Government is also implementing the Social Employment Fund (SEF) and revitalised National Youth Service (NYS) job-creation initiatives that will each draw 50 000 young people into the economy.
tgt_text: Ka kakaretso, metsi sebediswang ka letsatsi lokela ho fokotswa ka dilitara tse dimiliyone di 50, ho tloha ho dilitara tse dimiliyone di 280 tse sebediswang hona jwale ka letsatsi, mme sena se tla lebisa tshebedisong ya dilitara tse dimiliyone di 230 ka letsatsi..  Bosenyi le bobodu.

src_text: These initiatives will not only provide much-needed work experience but will also reinforce the value of active citizenship.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha mosebetsi wa Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha ofising ya Benoni ya nehileng moahi wa Bangladesh bukana ya ho eta ya mokunyata.

src_text: The SEF partners with non-governmental organisations (NGOs) while the NYS enlists young people for services which benefit communities across the country..     Transport .
tgt_text: Mosebetsi eo leng Mme Sibongile Simelane fumane beili ya R5 000 Lekgotleng la Dinyewe la Makgistrata la Benoni ka Labobedi la la 21 Phuptjane.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the 11-point Action Plan to deal with road blockages and recruitment of foreign nationals as truck drivers.
tgt_text: Moahi enwa wa Bangladesh leng Monghadi Fahim Kazi tshwerwe leka ho tswa naheng ena ka la 12 Motsheanong 2022 sebedisa lebitso la ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.

src_text: The plan, which was developed by the Road and Freight Inter-Ministerial Committee (IMC) in partnership with the road and freight industry stakeholders, promotes amongst others the enforcement of visa requirements and compliance with labour laws.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Ditaba tsa Kahara Naha (DHA) le sa tswa romela sebapadi sa dipaleng sa Lithuania, Ieva Andrejevaite naheng ya habo, ha ne batla ho sebedisa hampe botsamaisi ba Afrika Borwa ba taolo ya baphaphathehi iqapela pale eo seng nnete batla botshabelo kwano ka lebaka la “ntwa Ukraine.”.

src_text: The IMC was formed to deal with escalating road blockages and protests by disgruntled South African truck drivers.
tgt_text: Kabinete rorisitse mosebetsi etswang ke Karolo ya ho Lwantsha Bobodu ya DHA thoholetsa le ho kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa ho tswela pele ka ho tlaleha diketso tseo tsa tlolo ya molao.

src_text: Protests and road blockages adversely impact mobility, scare foreign investors and most importantly, negatively impact the economy and essential supply chains which use affected corridors.
tgt_text: Diketso tse seng molaong tsa Maafrika Borwa rekisang boitsebiso ba ona di na le ditlamorao tse mpe le tse kgolo bakeng sa polokeho ya naha le maemo yona bophelong ba setjhaba le moruong wa yona.

src_text: Nelson Mandela Bay (NMB) Metropolitan Municipality water shortages.
tgt_text: Mmuso tla tswella le ho nka mehato matla kgahlano le mang kapa mang ya ikamahanyang le diketso tse seng molaong tseo leng tello melao ya rona ya ho kena naheng ena, ntle le tshabo kapa leeme..  Kabinete boetse ananetse ho tshwarwa ho sa tswa etsahala ha titjhere ya Durban, mme Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – ya ahlotsweng dilemo tse tharo tsa ho sebeletsa setjhaba le tse nne tsa tjhankaneng, mme hloletswe kantle dilemo tse tharo ke Lekgotla la Dinyewe la Lebatowa la Mlazi, Kwazulu-Natal – ka ho tlola Molao wa Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala wa Mebuso ya Lehae, 2000 (Molao wa 27 wa 2000).

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the intervention of the Department of Water and Sanitation (DWS) in the NMB Metropolitan Municipality in the Eastern Cape to avert Day Zero as the province is facing severe water shortages which started in.
tgt_text: Jwaloka titjhere sekolong se neng se le sebaka sa ho kgetha nakong ya Dikgetho tsa Bomasepala, Mme Gabuza dumetse molato wa ho kgetha makgetlo 24, ho kenyeletsa makgetlo 12 Dikgethong tsa Bomasepala le 12 Dikgetho tsa Diwate..  Kahlolo ena ke pontsho matla ya boinehelo ba Khomeshene ya Dikgetho ya Afrika Borwa ya ho nka bohato kapele le ho bontsha taolo ya boitshwaro bo bobe.

src_text: The DWS is working with the province to implement short, medium and long-term measures to address and mitigate the potential impact of the drought.
tgt_text: Ena ke tiisetso matla ya mekgwatshebetso ya dikgetho seng matlafaditswe ka ho hlahiswa ha Sesebediswa sa Taolo ya Bakgethi thibelang ho kgetha habedi..  Kabinete tiisitse hore dikgetho ke tshiya ya demokrasi ya rona mme di lokela ho sireletswa ka hohle kamoo ho ka kgonehang kateng..  Seboka sa bo-12 sa Matona (MC12) sa Mokgatlo wa Lefatshe wa Kgwebisano (WTO).

src_text: Cabinet further urged the residents of NMB to adhere to water restrictions imposed by local municipalities to ensure water security.
tgt_text: Kabinete ananetse diphetho tsa WTO MC12 neng tshwaretswe Geneva, Switzerland ho tloha ka la 12 ho ya ho la 17 Phuptjane 2022, haholoholo qeto reng dinaha tse nang le bokgoni di ka ba le ditokelo tsa ho hlahisa diente tsa COVID-19 ho fihlela ka.

src_text: Overall, water use must be reduced by 50 million litres per day, from the current level of 280 million litres per day down to 230 million litres per day.
tgt_text: Qeto ya ho atolosa sena hore se kenyeletse kalafo le hlahlobo tsa COVID-19 kgutliseditswe morao ka dikgwedi tse tsheletseng.

src_text: Crime and corruption  .
tgt_text: Esale Afrika Borwa itlhomme pele boipiletsong ba hore WTO dumelle dinaha tse ding ho ba le ditokelo tsa ho iketsetsa diente tsa COVID-19 mme sena se ka netefatsa hore ho na le phihlello lekanang enteng le ho kgonahatsa hore dinaha tse nang le bokgoni ba ho hlahisa diente di di etsa..  Seboka se boetse sa inehela motjheng bulehileng le kenyeletsang bohle molemong wa ho tlisa diphetoho mesebetsig ya sona, mme ha dumellanwa ka ditumellano tsa kgwebisano tse sebetsanang le tsa bophelo bo botle, ho behwa ha meedi dithusong tsa botshwasi, kemiso ya nakwana kgwebisanong ya marangranng le boteng ba dijo nako telele  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the recent arrest of Home Affairs official stationed at the Benoni office for issuing fraudulent passport to Bangladeshi national.
tgt_text: Kgatelopele Lenaneong la ho Fallela Kgasong ya Dijithale (BDM).

src_text: The official, Ms Sibongile Simelane, was granted R5 000 bail in the Benoni Magistrate's Court on Tuesday, 21 June.
tgt_text: Kabinete tsebisitswe ka tsa morao Lenaneong la BDM mme ya amohela kgatelopele entsweng ka ho kenngwa ha di-set-top box le karolo ya ho fallela kgasong ya dijithale ho tloha ho ya analogue.

src_text: The Bangladeshi national, Mr Fahim Kazi, was arrested while trying to leave the country on 12 May 2022 under the name, ‘Lebogang Ndlovu’.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse tobokeditse tlhokeho potlakileng ya ho phethela BDM molemong wa ho etsa hore ho be le spectrum se hlokehang bakeng sa phihlello ya inthanete, le bakeng sa mesebetsi meng amanang le theknoloji ya tlhahisoleseding le dikgokahano..  Letona la Dikgokahano le Ditheknoloji tsa Dijithale, Khumbudzo Ntshavheni le tla ba le seboka le boraditaba hosane (Labohlano, 24 Phuptjane) ho fana ka dintlha tse ding.

src_text: The Department of Home Affairs (DHA) recently deported Lithuanian actress, Ms Ieva Andrejevaite, who sought to abuse South Africa’s refugee management regime when she fabricated story of wanting to apply for asylum because of the “war in Ukraine”.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.

src_text: Cabinet commends the work being done by the DHA’s Counter Corruption Unit.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tlaleho ya bobedi ya Selemo le Selemo ya Naha ya Maemo Ditokelo tsa Ngwana.

src_text: It applauds and encourages ordinary South Africans to continue to report such criminal acts.
tgt_text: Tlaleho fana ka tlhahisoleseding mabapi le ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Morero wa Naha wa Tshebetso wa Bana bakeng sa 2019 ho ya ho.

src_text: The unlawful acts of South Africans who sell their identities have far-reaching negative implications for the country’s security and socio-economic status.
Government will continue to deal harshly against anyone involved in illegal acts that undermine our immigration laws, without fear or favour.
tgt_text: Tlaleho hlakisa dikatleho tsa 2020 ho ya ho boetse hlakisa dibaka tse sa ntseng di fana ka bothata, ho kenyeletsa polokeho ya bana le ho se lekane pakeng tsa bana ba hlokang le ba sa hlokeng.

src_text: Cabinet  also welcomed the recent conviction and sentencing of Durban teacher, Ms Nomusa Precious Gabuza (37) – who was sentenced to three years' correctional supervision and four years' imprisonment, wholly suspended for three years, in the Umlazi Regional Court in KwaZulu-Natal – for contravening the Local Government Municipal Electoral Act, 2000 (Act 27 of 2000).
tgt_text: Tlaleho boetse bontsha kamoo sewa sa COVID-19 se ammeng bana kateng nakong ena..  Sepheo ka mehato ya ho kena dipakeng kenngwang tshebetsong ke mmuso ke ho netefatsa ho hlomphuwa ha ditokelo tsa bana, jwalokaha di hlalositswe Molaotheong wa Rephaboliki ya Afrika Borwa wa.

src_text: As teacher at the school which was used as voting station during the Municipal Elections in October 2021, Ms Gabuza pleaded guilty for fraudulently casting 24 votes, including 12 for the Municipal Elections and 12 for the Ward Elections.
tgt_text: Mehato ena boetse tshehetsa maitlamo naha Ditumellanong tsa Dinaha tsa Matjhaba tsa Ditokelo tsa Ngwana (UNCRC) le Tokomane ya Tumellano ya Afrika ya Ditokelo le Thekolohelo ya Ngwana (ACRWC).

src_text: The conviction and sentencing underscore the Electoral Commission of South Africa’s commitment to intervene timeously and apply consequence management.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa saenne ditokomane tsa UNCRC le ACRWC..  Tlaleho bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha mmuso le ba bang ba amehang boemong ba naha le ba diprovense.

src_text: This is also strong affirmation of the electoral systems, which have since been strengthened with the introduction of the Voter Management Device that prevents double voting.
tgt_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla behwa websaeteng ya Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba: www.dsd.gov.za.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed that elections are the cornerstone of our democracy and must be protected at all costs..     World Trade Organisation (WTO) 12th Ministerial Conference (MC12).
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Nako le Nako ya Afrika Borwa ho UNCRC Kopantsweng ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ho UNCRC.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the outcomes of the WTO MC12 held in Geneva, Switzerland from 12 to 17 June 2022, in particular the decision that eligible countries could override COVID-19 vaccine patents until.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Tlaleho ya boraro ho ya ho ya botshelela ya Nako le Nako ho UNCRC.

src_text: The decision on whether to extend this to COVID-19 therapeutics and diagnostics was delayed for six months.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena tla kamora ya bobedi tekilweng ho UNCRC ka.

src_text: South Africa had been leading the call for the WTO to waiver intellectual property rights tied to COVID-19 vaccines that will ensure equal access to vaccines and enable countries that have the capability to manufacture vaccines to do so.

The conference also committed to an open and inclusive process to reform all its functions and agreed to package of trade deals addressing areas such as health, setting limits on fishing subsidies moratorium on e-commerce trade and food security     CABINET DECISIONS.
tgt_text: Tlaleho bokeleditswe ho latela Karolo ya 44 ya UNCRC, mme boetse akaretsa ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tse entsweng tlalehong ya ho qetela.

src_text: Progress on Broadcasting Digital Migration (BDM) Programme.
tgt_text: UNCRC rometse ditlhokomelo le dikgothaletso tsa naha ka.

src_text: Cabinet received an update on the BDM Programme and noted the progress made with the installation of set-top boxes as part of migrating from analogue to digital broadcasting.
Cabinet re-emphasised the urgency for concluding the BDM to free up the spectrum needed for mobile broadband, and other information and communications technology related purposes.
tgt_text: Pokeletso entswe ka tshebedisano le mafapha ohle loketseng le ba amehang naheng ka bophara.

src_text: Communications and Digital Technologies Minister Khumbudzo Ntshavheni will hold media briefing tomorrow (Friday, 24 June) to provide more details.
tgt_text: Tlaleho felletseng tla phatlalatswa ha se teketswe UNCRC.

src_text: Annual National Child Rights Status Report.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya naha ka ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong.

src_text: Cabinet approved the second Annual National Child Rights Status Report to be published.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha tlaleho ya pele ya Afrika Borwa ya naha mabapi le ho Kenngwa Tshebetsong ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong tekwa Lenaneong la Phumantsho ya Bodulo la UN (UN-Habitat).

src_text: The report provides an update on the implementation of the National Plan of Action for the Children for the 2019-2024 period..
tgt_text: UN-Habitat amohetse Lenaneo la yona le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong, Sebokeng sa yona sa Phumantsho ya Bodulo le Ntshetsopele ya Bodulo ba Ditoropng bo Tsitsitseng ka Mphalane.

src_text: The report highlights the achievements recorded for the 2020-2021 period.
tgt_text: Ho ne ho lebelletswe hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di nehelane ka ditlaleho tsa kgatelopele ka ho ithaopa..  Afrika Borwa tsheheditse ho amohelwa ha Lenaneo le Letjha la Metse ya Ditoropong mme hamorao ya le kenya tshebetsong ka Moralotshebetso Momahaneng wa Ntshetsopele ya Metse ya Ditoropong (IUDF).

src_text: It also highlights areas that remain challenge, including the safety of children and the continued disparities between the poor and the rich in respect of children.
tgt_text: Sepheo sa IUDF ke ho tataisa ntshetsopele ya bodulo ba ditoropong bo kenyeletsang bohle, bo matla le bo nang le seriti..  Tlaleho ya kgatelopele bokeleditswe ka tshebedisano le mmuso wa naha, diprovense le mebuso ya lehae, le mekgatlo loketseng eo seng ya mmuso..  Lewa le Momahaneng la Ntshetsopele ya Batjha (IYDS).

src_text: The report also reflects on how the COVID-19 pandemic impacted on children during this period.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kenngwa tshebetsong ha IYDS.

src_text: The intervention measures being implemented by government are aimed at realising the rights of children, as outlined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.
tgt_text: Lewa le thusa ho kenya tshebetsong Leano la Naha la Batjha la 2020 ho ya ho.

src_text: They also support the country’s obligations to the UN Conventions on the Rights of the Child (UNCRC) and the African Charter on the Rights and Welfare of the Child (ACRWC).
tgt_text: Le hlalosa diketsahalo, diprojeke le mananeo lokelang ho etswa ke ba fapaneng ba amehang ho tswa mekgatlong ya batjha..

src_text: South Africa is signatory to both the UNCRC and ACRWC.
tgt_text: Le boetse le thusa ka ho fokotsa phethapheto ya dithuso tsa mmuso mme le tataise kamoo mekgatlo ya basebetsi le lekala la poraefete di ka tshehetsang batjha ho fihlella menyetla.

src_text: The report was compiled in consultation with government departments and number of relevant stakeholders at national and provincial levels.
tgt_text: Pokeletso ya lewa na le maikutlo makala fapaneng setjhabeng..  Moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Ho ya Ho Ile ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: The full report will be posted on the Department of Social Development website: www.dsd.gov.za.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka moralo wa Tokomane ya Tataiso ya Paballo le Tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: South Africa’s Combined third to sixth Periodic Report to the UNCRC.
tgt_text: Dihlodilweng tsa Afrika Borwa di fana ka motheo wa bohlokwa bakeng sa kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo, mme di bohlokwa boiphedisong ba batho..  Tokomane ena ya Tataiso thusa ho kenya tshebetsong dkgothaletso tsa Moifo wa Boemo bo Hodimo wa Ditsebi kgethilweng ka 2019 hore lekolebotjha maano jwale, molao le mekgwa ya ditaba tse amanang le mefuta ya bohlokwa ya dihlodilweng..  Tlaleho kgothaleditse tshibollo ya leano le leholo le akaretsang la paballo le tshebediso ya Moshwelella ya dihlodilweng tsa naha.

src_text: Cabinet approved the tabling of the third to the sixth Periodic Report to the UNCRC.
tgt_text: Leano le tla kenngwa tshebetsong makaleng ohle mmuso.

src_text: This report follows the second Periodic Report that was tabled to the UNCRC in..
tgt_text: Paballo bohlokwa bakeng sa letsholo la naha la ho potlakisa kgolo ya moruo le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..  Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha.

src_text: The report has been compiled in accordance with Article 44 of the UNCRC, and also covers the observations and recommendations made from the last report.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Lewa la Nama ya tse Hlaha hore setjhaba se ntshe maikutlo ka lona.

src_text: The UNCRC sent its observations and recommendations for the country in..
tgt_text: Sepheo ka lewa ke ho hophisa le ho tlisa diphetoho indastering ya nama ya tse hlaha.

src_text: The compilation was done in consultation with all relevant departments and stakeholders across the country.
tgt_text: Sepheo se seng ke ho ba le seabo phumanehong ya dijo nako telele..  Indasteri ya nama ya tse hlaha indastering eo haholoholo sa hlophisehang sebetsang ka mokgwa sa momahanang.

src_text: The full report will be made public once it has been tabled to the UNCRC.
tgt_text: Lewa lena le sisinngwang le fana ka mokgwa wa tshebetso tla hlophisa le ho matlafatsa lekala lena jwaloka le fanang ka dijo nako telele le la kgolo ya moruo le ka thusang ho thehweng ha menyetla ya mosebetsi  Dibili.

src_text: National report on implementing the New Urban Agenda.
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of South Africa’s first national report on the Implementation of the New Urban Agenda to the UN Human Settlements Programme (UN-Habitat).
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya Merero ya Setso ka Kakaretso ya 2022 Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.

src_text: The UN-Habitat adopted its New Urban Agenda at its Conference on Housing and Sustainable Urban Development in October.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka dikarolo tse ngotsweng botjha ke ho lekolabotjha Molao wa Boetapele ba Setso le ba MaKhoi-San wa 2019  (Molao wa 3 wa 2019) keneng tshebetsong ka la 01 Mmesa.

src_text: Member states were expected to submit progress reports voluntarily.
South Africa supported the adoption of the New Urban Agenda and subsequently implemented it through the country’s Integrated Urban Development Framework (IUDF).
tgt_text: Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang.

src_text: The IUDF aims to guide the development of inclusive, resilient and liveable urban settlements.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tekwa ha Bili ya Tlhomathiso ya 2022 ya Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang, Palamenteng bakeng sa hore ke sekasekwe.

src_text: The progress report was compiled in consultation with national, provincial and local spheres of government, and relevant NGOs.
tgt_text: Ha se amohetswe, Bili tla fetola Molao wa jwale wa Tshireletso ya Demokrasi Itshetlehileng ho Molaotheo Kgahlano le Boferekanyi le Diketsahalo tse Amehang wa 2004 (Molao wa 33 wa 2004).

src_text: Integrated Youth Development Strategy (IYDS).
tgt_text: Bili ena fetile motjheng matla wa dipuisano le setjhaba kamora hore tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Motsheanong.

src_text: Cabinet approved the IYDS for implementation.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka diphetoho ke ho tjhorisa metjha ya kwano ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi le ya lefatshe teng.

src_text: The strategy gives effect to the National Youth Policy 2020-.
tgt_text: Diphetoho di boetse tsa lokisa dikarolwana tseo ho neng hothwe ha di ikamahanye le molaotheo ke Lekgotla la Molaotheo..  Jwaloka setho sa Lekgotla la Tshireletseho la Matjhaba Kopaneng, Afrika Borwa tlameha ho sebedisa melao ya matjhaba naheng ena leng melao eo sepheo ka yona leng ho matlafatsa mehato ya ho lwantsha boferekanyi lefatsheng  Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: It outlines the actions, projects and programmes to be undertaken by various stakeholders from youth formations.
tgt_text: Seboka sa bo-14 sa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Afrika Borwa (BRICS).

src_text: It also deals with minimising the duplication of government interventions and guides how civil society and the private sector can support young people from accessing opportunities.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla etella pele Afrika Borwa Sebokeng sa mokgwa wa vidiyo sa bo-14 sa Baetapele ba dinaha tsa BRICS se tla tshwarwa ke People’s Republic of China ho tloha ka Labone la la 23 ho ya ho Labohlano la la 24 Phuptjane.

src_text: The compilation of the strategy involved diverse inputs from various sectors of society.
Draft White Paper on Conservation and Sustainable Use of South Africa’s Biodiversity.
tgt_text: Botho ba rona ba BRICS bo tswela pele ho tswela naha molemo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the draft White Paper on Conservation and Sustainable Use of South Africa’s Biodiversity for public comments.
tgt_text: Ngwahola thepa ya Afrika Borwa rometsweng dinaheng tse ding ballwang dipersenteng tse fetang tse 17 ile dinaheng tsa BRICS, mme dipersente tse fetang tse 29 tsa thepa tlileng kwano di ne di tswa dinaheng tseo.

src_text: South Africa's biodiversity provides an important basis for economic growth and development, and is critical to people’s livelihoods..
tgt_text: Boleng ba kgwebisano ena ntse bo ntse bo hola, mme kgwebisano yohle ya Afrika Borwa le dinaha tse ding tsa BRICS ka 2021 ballwa dibiliyoneng tse R702, ha ka 2017 ne ballwa dibiliyoneng tse  .

src_text: This White Paper gives effect to the recommendations made by the High-Level Panel of Experts appointed in 2019 to review our current policies, legislation and practices on matters relating to iconic species.
tgt_text: Tshebedisano hara dinaha tseo leng ditho tsa BRICS makaleng kang bophelo bo botle le kgwebisano ntlafetseng hodisitse diindasteri tsa naha ena, mme tswetse ditho tsohle tsa BRICS molemo.

src_text: The report recommended the development of an overarching policy on conservation and sustainable use of the country’s biodiversity.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka botsetedi ba rona diprojekeng tsa ntshetsopele ya meralo ya ditshebeletso le maiteko ho potlakisa metjha ya kgwebo ke ho eketsa thepa romelwang ho balekane ba rona ba BRICS..  Sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo.

src_text: The policy will be implemented across all spheres of government.
tgt_text: Sekolo sa Naha sa Mmuso (NSG) se tla tshwara Lenaneo la sona la boraro la sekolo sa Mariha sa Tsamaiso ya Moruo bakeng sa Bahlanka ba Phethahatso, Johannesburg ho tloha ho la 27 Phuptjane ho ya ho la 1 Phupu.

src_text: Conservation is important for the country’s drive to accelerate economic growth and job creation.
tgt_text: Sebokeng ho tla tla Matona tswang Côte d'Ivoire; South Sudan le Afrika Borwa; le Balaodi-Kakaretso ba Lesotho, Zambia, Democratic Republic of Congo, Tanzania le Ghana.

src_text: Game Meat Strategy.
tgt_text: Boramotse ba Afrika Borwa, mmoho le ditho tsa dikomiti tsa boramotse le makgotla phethahatso ba tla ba teng le bona..  Ho lebelletswe hore bahlanka bana ba phethahatso ba tswang dinaheng tse fapaneng ba abelane dikgopolo le dithuto ka maemo fapaneng ao ba kopanang le ona mosebetsing wa bona wa letsatsi le letsatsi..  NSG radile lenaneo la selemo le selemo bakeng sa ditho tsa phethahatso ka 2020 le karolo ya tshehetso ya yona boinehelong ba mmuso ba ho aha naha nang le bokgoni.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the draft Game Meat Strategy for public comments.
tgt_text: Sepheo ka sekolo sena hara tse ding ke ho hlomella bahlanka ba phethahatso makaleng mararo mmuso ka boetapele bo ntlafetseng le bokgoni ba ho hlokomela le hore ba kgone ho lekola botjha diphephetso tsa tsamaiso tse sitisang ho kenyeletswa ha bohle le kgolo ya ho ya ho ile ya moruo..  Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela.

src_text: The strategy seeks to formalise and transform the game meat industry.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Nelson Mandela le ka Mantaha, 18 Phupu 2022, mme le tla ketekwa tlasa mookotaba: “Etsa seo se kgonang, ka seo nang le sona, moo leng teng”.

src_text: It also seeks to contribute towards food security in sustainable manner.
tgt_text: Ke boipiletso bo matla bathong hore ba tshehetse le ho ba le seabo letsholong lena ka maiteko moshwelella nang le thuso ya nako telele..  Bo bong ba maiteko ao moshwelella ke Dipuisano tsa selemo le selemo tsa Batjha tsa ho tlotla Nelson Mandela le Lenaneo la Boetapele bo Kgabane bo tsepameng dintlheng tseo ho buuwang ka tsona haholo tse amanang le batjha Afrika Borwa le lefatsheng ka bophara..  Nako ya Lekgetho.

src_text: The game meat industry is predominately an informal industry that operates in fragmented manner.
tgt_text: Sehla sa 2022 sa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho se qala ka la 1 Phupu ho ya ho la 24 Mphalane.

src_text: The proposed strategy provides an implementation plan that will formalise and strengthen the sector as both provider of food security and an economic growth sector that can help create job opportunities     BILLS.
tgt_text: Balefi ba lekgetho ba kgothaletswa ho kenya ditokomane tsa bona tsa lekgetho ka mokgwa wa eFiling (www.sarsefiling.co.za) kapa ho MobiApp ya Tshebeletso ya Pokello ya Lekgetho ya Afrika Borwa (SARS)..  Monongwaha SARS tla nne sebedise tlhahisoleseding eo e bokellang ya motho ka mong, ho etsa tlaleho ya motho nang le dintlha tsohle tsa hae tsa ditjhelete, ho thusa ho bebofatsa motjha wa ho kenya ditokomane tsa lekgetho.

src_text: Traditional Affairs General Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Ka 2021 SARS bokelletse tlhahisoleseding ya balefi ba lekgetho ba dimiliyone tse fetang tse tharo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Traditional Affairs General Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Ho kenngwa ha ditokomane ka nako le ka nepo ho netefatsa hore batho ba ikamahanye le melao ya lekgetho, le ho thusa mmuso ho isa ditshebeletso ho Maafrika Borwa di hlokang haholo  Melaetsa.

src_text: The amendments seek to revise the Traditional and Khoi-San Leadership Act, 2019 (Act 3 of 2019), which came into effect on 1 April.
tgt_text: DithoholetsoKabinete thoholeditse le ho lebisa ditakaletso tse ntle ho bana: • Moahlodi Owen Lloyd Rogers kamora hore kgethelwe ho ba moahlodi wa Lekgotla la Molaotheo la Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Protection of Constitutional Democracy Against Terrorist and Related Activities Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: • Kabinete le Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba lakaleditse Mopresidente wa Mehleng Thabo Mbeki mahlohonolo Letsatsi la Tswalo ha qeta dilemo tse 80, leo le ketekileng ka la 18 Phuptjane.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Protection of Constitutional Democracy Against Terrorist and Related Activities Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Monghadi Mbeki lakaleditse Maafrika Borwa ohle bokamoso bo tjhabileng le bo nang le katleho  KhiroHo tlameha hore ho netefatswe mangolo thuto ba hirwang mme ho netefatswe le hore ba ha ba so ka ba tlola molao.

src_text: Once adopted, the Bill will amend the current Protection of Constitutional Democracy Against Terrorist and Related Activities Act, 2004 (Act 33 of 2004).
tgt_text: Balaodi ba Ikemetseng ba Boto ya Boladi ya Bofofisi Afrika Borwa  Monghadi Ernest Khosa  Mme Bulelwa Koyana  Monghadi Surendra Sooklal; led.

src_text: The Bill went through an extensive public consultation process after it was approved by Cabinet in May.
tgt_text: Mme Rejoice Edith Phewa.

src_text: The amendments seek to align the country’s domestic instruments of fighting terrorism with the global measures that have been put in place.
tgt_text: Ditho tsa Ofisi ya Diphatlalatso tsa Dilounu tsa ho reka Matlo le Phatlalatso ya Dikoloto tsa Matlo  Mme Kenosi Pearl Louisa Selane (Modulasetulo)  Mme Catharina Maria Van der Sandt  Monghadi Errol Vincent Magerman  Moadvokheiti Mandla Dludlu  Monghadi Matsobane Gabriel Mello  Mme Palesa Mawasha  Mme Penelope Anne Beck-Paxton  Mme Sphiwe Dorris Mayinga  Mme Tshifhiwa Victor Mphigalale; lej.

src_text: Issues in the Environment.
tgt_text: Tsa Moraorao Mabapi le Kokwanahloko ya Khorona (COVID-19).

src_text: Update on the Coronavirus Disease (COVID-19).
tgt_text: Kabinete leboha batho bohle ba Afrika Borwa ba ileng ba kgetha ho enta le ho ikobela dipehelo tsohle tse mabapi le COVID-19 leng se entseng hore lenane la batho ba tshwaetsehang le se ke la phahama haholo leqhubung la bohlano la sewa sena naheng ena..     Leha ho le jwalo, re ntse re tlameha ho ba hlokolosi jwalo ka ha COVID-19 ntse so fele.

src_text: Cabinet commended all people in South Africa who chose to vaccinate and observe all COVID-19 protocols that resulted in the country averting rising numbers of new cases during the fifth wave of the pandemic..
tgt_text: Leha mmuso sa tswa phumula molao qobellang batho ho apara dimonkwana setjhabeng, empa batho ba nang le mafu sa phekoleheng, le ba kulang, ba ntse ba tlameha ho tswela pele le ho di apara.

src_text: However, we must not be complacent as COVID-19 is still in our midst.
tgt_text: Re ntse re tlameha ho tswela pele le ho hlapa matsoho rona kgafetsa kapa ho hlwekisa ka sebolaya dikokwanahloko, ho iqaqolohanya le ba bang mmoho le ho ba sebakeng se kenang moya hantle..     Ente ntse le yona feela mokgwa nang le bopaki ba saense ba hore thibela COVID-19, mme Kabinete kgothaletsa batho bohle ba so kang ba enta ho etsa jwalo ka potlako le ba entileng ho fumana ente ya tlatsetso mahala ditsing tse haufi tsa ho entela..     Monkeypox.

src_text: Although the country recently scrapped the compulsory wearing of masks in public, people with comorbidities and those who are ill are encouraged to continue wearing mask.
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya behwa sehlohlolong sa ditaba tsa moraorao mabapi le Monkeypox le ho tshwaetsa ha yona naheng ena ho latela ho fumaneha ha motho wa bobedi ya nang le bohloko bona naheng ena.

src_text: We must also continue to wash or sanitise our hands, and observe social distancing and proper ventilation.
tgt_text: Bakudi bana ka bobedi ba ipolokile ka bonngwe malapeng mme ho ntse ho tsongwa batho bao ba kileng ba kopana le bona, bao ho ka etsahalang hore ba bile kotsing ya ho tshwaetseha..     Ka bobedi Lefapha la Bophelo bo Botle le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Mahloko Tshwaetsanang, ba sebedisana mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle ho hlahloba kotsi ya tshwaetsano bohlokong bona naheng ena ba ipapisitse le dipehelo tsa Matjhaba tsa Bophelo bo Botle..     Kokwanahloko ya monkeypox ha tshwaetsane ha bonolo ntle le ha thetsane le motho ya nang le yona jwalo ka ho sunana, ho mo sika kapa ho thetsa dikarolo tsa mmele tse nang le yona.

src_text: Presidential Social Sector Summit.

src_text: The Presidential Social Sector Summit held in Ekurhuleni, Gauteng from 4 to 5 August 2022 under the theme: “Fostering Social Cohesion to Enable Socio-Economic Participation in Communities”, brought together stakeholders from different constituencies to work with government to address socio-economic challenges and mobilise resources for civil society, among other objectives..

src_text: The summit considered dialogue reports from the nine provinces on their challenges, which included access to funding, regulatory issues, transformation of the social sector with view to fostering state-civil society partnership to address challenges related to poverty, inequality and unemployment..

src_text: Cabinet called on civil-society organisations and citizens to play their active part in ensuring that we build better tomorrow, as envisioned in the National Development Plan: Vision  Cabinet Decisions.

src_text: Cultural and Creative Industries Masterplan.

tgt_text: Ho Phatlalatswa Pele ho Nako ha Tokomane ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditlolo tsa Molao tsa Kotara tsa Selemo sa Ditjhelete sa 2022/.

src_text: The masterplan focuses on visual arts; crafts and design; audio-visual and interactive media; design and creative services; performance and celebration, including music, publishing and printed media..
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tshisinyo ya ho phatlalatswa pele ho nako ha tokomane ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tsa selemo sa ditjhelete sa 2022/.

src_text: The masterplan will intervene in these sectors towards building transformed creative innovative sector that will be globally recognised and competitive in the space.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara tse sa tswa phatlalatswa.

src_text: It will work towards the South African creative industry being able to access the local and international markets..
tgt_text: Sena se etseditswe ho fetola nako ya ho phatlalatswa ha dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa naha..   Dinako tse sisintsweng tsa phatlalatso ya dipalopalo tsa ditlolo tsa molao tsa kotara ke Phato 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya pele le Pudungwana 2022 bakeng sa kotara ya bobedi.

The amendments are mainly on the borrowing section of this framework.

src_text: The amendments also clarify the role of development finance institutions in the lending space of the municipalities.

src_text: The approved amendments seek to incentivise more lenders in the municipality markets but continue to maintain the core principles underlying municipal borrowing..  Pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly recorded crime statistics for 2022/23 financial year.

src_text: Cabinet approved the proposed pre-release calendar for the publication of the quarterly crime statistics for the 2022/23 financial year.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena fana ka dipalopalo ho ya ka merabe, bonng, bodudi le boahi ba naha ho batho ba nang le ditokelo tsa ho ba le mobu Afrika Borwa.

src_text: The proposed pre-release calendar crime statistics is August 2022 for quarter one and November 2022 for quarter two.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa NWRIA wa 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba ho tla nka matsatsi   Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho tla le meralo, tshehetso ya ditjhelete le kaho ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi bakeng sa naha ena tla boele laola le taolo ya meralo ya motheo ya metsi teng ha jwale..   Mokgatlo ona tla netefatsa phepelo otlolohileng le tshepahetseng ya metsi ikamahantseng le Molaotheo wa naha.

src_text: Crime statistics for quarter three and quarter four will be released in February and May 2023 respectively..  Lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD).

src_text: Cabinet approved the lapse of the National State of Disaster (NSoD) that was declared following the devastating floods in the Eastern Cape and KwaZulu-Natal..

src_text: The extension considered the need to continue augmenting the existing contingency measures undertaken by organs of state to mitigate and address the impact of severe weather in the affected provinces..

src_text: Cabinet agreed that current circumstances no longer warrant the extraordinary measures as organs of state, the private sector and civil society will continue to ensure ongoing relief, recovery and reconstruction  Bills.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Deeds Registries Amendment Bill of 2020 to Parliament for further processing.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in June 2020 for further public consultation.
The proposed amendments will give effect to the realisation of the land tenure that is legally secured in Section 25(6) of the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of.

src_text: The Bill provides for the collection of the statistics in terms of race, gender, nationality and citizenship of the holders of land rights in South Africa.

src_text: This provision will enable more accurate land audit reports and surveys in the future regarding the transformation of land ownership..  National Water Resource Infrastructure Agency (NWRIA) Bill of.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ka yona ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa melao supileng leng (1) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane tsa Dipenshene, wa 1963 (Molao wa bo 41 wa 1963); (2) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Masole, wa 1976, (Molao wa bo 84 wa 1976); (3) Molao Laolang Penshene ya Basebeletsi ba Mmuso wa 1996; (4) Molao Laolang Komeshene Shebaneng le Lekgetho, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 99 wa 1997; (5) Molao Laolang Banka ya tsa Temo le Mobu, wa 2002 (Molao wa bo 15 wa 2002); (6) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2005 (Molao wa bo 26 wa 2005 le (7) Ntlafatso ya Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Bahlahlobi ba Dibuka tsa Ditjhelete wa 2021 (Molao wa bo 5 wa 2021).

src_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the NWRIA Bill of 2022 for public comment for period of ninety (90) days.
tgt_text: Ho Molao Laolang Dipenshene tsa Masole wa 1996 ho kenyeleditswe hore motho kenye molekane wa hae mme seo se nkuwa ka se etsahetse ho tloha ka la 27 Mmesa.

src_text: The Bill proposes the setting up of an NWRIA to be responsible for the planning, financing and development of the water infrastructure for the country.
tgt_text: Dintlafatso molaong ona wa dipenshene tla thusa hore balekane ba masole ba kgone ho fumana karolo ya bona hang hang ha ba kgaola lenyalo..   Ho hong hape, dintlafatso tsena di tla hlakisa karolo ya Letona La Matlotlo mme lehlakoreng la mosebetsi wa ho hlahloba dibuka teng dintlafatso tsena di fetola hanyane matla komiti ya bahlahlobi ba dibuka ha ho etsahetse mohlahlobi wa dibuka fumanwa le molato.

src_text: It will also be responsible for the maintenance of the current water infrastructure.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao ile ya phatlalatswa ka Hlakola 2022 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: The agency is to ensure sustainable, equitable and reliable supply of water in line with constitutional obligations of access to water and secure healthy environment.
The agency will be set up as Public Entity under the Schedule 2 of the Public Finance Management Act, 1999 (Act 1 of 1999).
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Akaretsang (Phapanyetsano seng molaong ya Ditjhelete le ho Thibela ho Tshehetsa Botshosetsi ka Ditjhelete) wa.

src_text: The agency will take on the functions that are currently performed by the Trans-Caledon Tunnel Authority..  Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao tlisa dintlafatso melaong latelang  Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Ditjhelete tsa Mautlwela, wa 2001 (Molao wa bo 38 wa 2001); (ii) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Mekgatlo sa Etseng Phaello, wa 1997 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 1997); (iii) Molao Laolang Thepa Laolwang ke Matlole, wa 1988 (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1988; (iv) Molao Laolang ho Sebetsa ha Dikhamphane, wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 71 wa 2008) le  Molao Laolang Lekala la Ditjhelete, wa 2017 (Molao wa bo 9 wa 2017)..   Dintlafatso tsena di kgona ho rarolla mathata neng fumanwe ke Komiti Ikgethang neng Lekola Maemo Ditjhelete tsa Naha (FATF).

src_text: The Bill amends the Municipal Fiscal Powers and Functions Act, 2007 (Act 12 of 2007).
tgt_text: Komiti ena ne etse dikgothaletso tse 40 tse tla thusa Afrika Borwa hore kgone ho sebetsa ka tsela ya matjhaba mabapi le ho lwantsha phapanyetsano seng molaong ya ditjhelete mmoho le tshehetso ya botshosetsi ka ditjhelete..   Ho ne ho fumanehe hore Afrika Borwa ne haella dikarolong tse.

src_text: The amendments regulate the powers of municipalities in levying development charges in respect of land development applications submitted to municipalities.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao tla lokisa dikarolo tse 14 ho tsena tse badilweng.

src_text: These amendments will ensure municipalities apply these charges fairly, transparently and effectively.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa FAFT ho tloha ka.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Bill in 2020 for public consultation..  Financial Matters Amendment Bill of.
Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Financial Matters Amendments Bill,.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa.

src_text: The Bill proposes the amendment to seven Acts, namely (1) Associated Institutions Pension Fund Act, 1963 (Act 41 of 1963); (2) Military Pension Act,1976 (Act 84 of 1976); (3) Government Employees Pension Law of 1996; (4) Financial and Fiscal Commission Act,1997 (Act 99 of 1997); (5) Land and Agricultural Development Bank Act, 2002 (Act 15 of 2002); (6) Audit Profession Act 2005 (Act 26 of 2005) and  the (7) Auditing Profession Amendment Act 2021 (Act 5 of 2021).
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya tsona seng Molaong ya 2002 ho ka sekasekwa ho ya pele.

src_text: The proposed amendments include, under the Military Pension Act of 1996, the inclusion of life partners to the benefits retrospectively from 27 April.
tgt_text: Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano seng Molaong ya tsona, wa 1992 (Molao wa bo 140 wa 1992) bolelang hore ke tlolo ya molao ho hlahisa dithethefatsi tse ngotsweng ho Shetjule ya Pele le ya Bobedi ya Molao ona..   Dintlafatso tsena di bolela ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya molao oo se molaong sa dumellane le molaotheo wa naha jwalo ka ha shetjule ya molao ona dumella Letona ho etsa diphetoho molaong ona ntle le ho latela tsela nepahetseng ya ketsa molao..    Ka 2020, Lekgotla la Molaotheo le ne le bolele ha Karolo ya bo 63 ya Molao Laolang Tshebediso ya Dithethefatsi le ho Thibela Phapanyetsano ya Tsona seng Molaong wa 1992 mme lekgotla la neha Palamente ho fihlela ka la 17 Tshitwe 2022 ho lokisa phoso eo.

src_text: The pension laws amendments will enable spouses to realise their pension interest immediately on dissolution of the marriage.
tgt_text: Ketsahalo Tlang.

src_text: In addition to clarifying the role of the Minister of Finance and on the auditing, the amendments also adjust the powers of the enforcement committee where an auditor admits guilt.

src_text: General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of.
tgt_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: ●  Banyana Banyana, ka ho etsa nalane ka ho hapela Afrika Borwa Mahope wa Pele wa Basadi wa Dinaha tsa Afrika (WAFCON), ka ho hlola naha ya Morokho papading ya makgaolakgang ka Moqebelo wa la 23 Phupu.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the General Laws (Anti-Money Laundering and Combating Terrorism Financing) Amendment Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Tlholo ena ya bona ba kentse Mohopeng wa Lefatshe wa FIFA wa Basadi tla tshwarelwa naheng ya Australia le New Zealand ho tloha ka la 20 Phupu ho ya ho 20 Phato.

src_text: The Bill is an omnibus Bill that amends the current Acts namely  Financial Intelligence Centre Act, 2001 (Act 38 of 2001); (ii) Nonprofit Organisation Act, 1997 (Act 71 of 1997); (iii) Trust Property Control Act, 1988 (Act 57 of 1988); (iv) Companies Act, 2008 (Act 71 of 2008) and  Financial Sector Regulations Act, 2017( Act 9 of 2017).
tgt_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Afrika Borwa, ka ho hapa dimetale tse 27 dipapading tse fapafapaneng Dipapading tsa Commonwealth mane Birmingham, Englane ho tloha ka la 28 Phupu ho ya ho 8 Phato.

src_text: The amendments respond to the deficiencies identified during the peer review of the country conducted by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF).
tgt_text: Sehlopha sena se ne se be maemong borobong ka metale tse supileng tsa kgauta, tse robong tsa silifera le tse 11 tsa bronze.

src_text: The mutual evaluation report made 40 recommendations that would assist in getting South Africa to be aligned with international measures of combating money laundering and financing of terrorism..  South Africa was found to be lacking in 20 areas.
tgt_text: ●  Sehlopha sa Basadi sa Springbok, ka ho hlola naha ya Spain Letotong la Dipapadi tsa Basadi tsa Mariha tse neng di bapalla Lebaleng la Emirates Airline Park, Johannesburg.●  Mme Ndavi Nokeri (23), ka ho ba Mmabotle wa Afrika Borwa wa.

src_text: This Bill addresses about 14 of the areas identified.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Drugs and Drug Trafficking Amendment Bill of 2022 for further processing.
The Drugs and Drug Trafficking Act, 1992 (Act 140 of 1992) criminalises the manufacturing and supply of any substance included under the Schedule 1 and Schedule 2 of the Act..
tgt_text: Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang:.

src_text: The amendments address the invalidity of Section 63, which was found to be unconstitutional in respect of the Minister being provided with the rights to amend the schedules without the involvement of the legislative process.
tgt_text: Ngaka Zwanani Titus Mathe jwalo ka Motsamaiso ya ka Sehloohong Mokgatlong wa Ntshetsopele ya Eneji Afrika Borwa..   Ditho tsa nakwana tsa Mokgatlo wa Naha Laolang Taba tsa Motlakase Afrika Borwa: Ntate Thembani Bukula (Modulasetulo);Mme Zandile Mpungose (Motlatsi wa Modulasetulo); Mme Precious Sibiya;Mme Thembeka Semane; leNtate Fungai Sibanda kgethilwe hape)..   Modulasetulo le setho sa Moifo wa Boto ya Thekenoloji ya Dimenerale: Ngaka Thibedi Ramontja (Modulasetulo); leMoprofesara Lwazi Ngubevana.. src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse taba ya ho fokotseha hanyane ha palo ya batho ba sa sebetseng naheng ena ka persente tse.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the slight decline in the country’s unemployment rate, which dropped by.
tgt_text: 6, ho tloha ho persente tse.

src_text: 6 percent, from.
tgt_text: 5 ho ya ho tse.

src_text: 5% in the first quarter to.
tgt_text: 9 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa.

src_text: 9 percent in the second quarter of.
tgt_text: Ho ya ka dipalopalo tse phatlaladitsweng Tokomaneng ya Kotara ya Dipalopalo tsa Ditaba tsa Kgiro phatlaladitsweng ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo la Afrika Borwa, mesebetsi mengata fumanehile lekaleng la Ditshebeletso tsa Ntshetsopele ya Setjhaba (276 000), la tsa Kgwebo (169 000), la Ditjhelete (128 000) le la Kaho (104 000).

src_text: The figures published in the Quarterly Labour Force Survey by Statistics South Africa show that the biggest job gains were recorded in Community and Social Services (276 000), Trade (169 000), Finance (128 000) and Construction (104 000)..
tgt_text: Palo ya batho ba sebetsang ha jwale ke dimilione tse 15,6 kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 mme palo ya ba sa sebetseng yona eketsehile ka batho ba 132 000 ho ya ho ba dimilione di 8,0 ka kotara ya bobedi ya selemo sa 2022 ha ho bapiswa le kotara fetileng.

src_text: The total number of employed persons stood at 15, 6 million in the second quarter of 2022, and the number of unemployed persons increased by 132 000 to 8, 0 million in the second quarter of 2022 compared to the previous quarter.
tgt_text: Keketseho ena le ha le nyane, empa bontsha kgatelo pele boitekong ba mmuso le mahlahana ona ba ho aha moruo botjha esitana le ho theha menyetla hlokahalang ya mesebetsi.

src_text: These modest yet impressive gains show that the concerted efforts by government and its social partners to grow the economy and create much-needed jobs are beginning to bear fruit..
tgt_text: Sena ke bopaki ba hore ha re tshwarisane, mme re sebetsa mmoho re ka hlola diphephetso tse shebaneng le moruo wa rona.

src_text: This is testament to the fact that if we all work together by harnessing our collective strengths, we can overcome the challenges facing our economy..
tgt_text: Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano maikutlong Maafrika Borwa jwalo ka ha hula ka thata ka lebaka la leqeme la mesebetsi le ditjeho tse hodimo tsa ho phela.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of South Africans as they struggle to go about their daily lives owing to the cost of living and high unemployment rate.
tgt_text: Jwalo ka mmuso hlokomelang, re ikemiseditse ka hohlehohle ho sebedisana le mahlahana rona ho aha bokamoso bo betere bakeng sa batho bohle.

src_text: As caring government, we remain determined and committed to working together with our social partners to build better tomorrow for everyone.
tgt_text: Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho tshehetsa dikgwebo tsa lapeng ka ho reka le ho sebedisa ditshebeletso tsa lapeng.

src_text: Government remains committed to supporting local businesses by buying local goods and services.
tgt_text: Disebediswa tsa Setjhaba.

src_text: Public infrastructure.
tgt_text: Kabinete hanyetsana haholo le taba ya tshenyo ya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ke baahi ba Tongaat mane KwaZulu-Natal nakong ya boipelaetso ba bona ka lebaka la ho kgaoha ha phepelo ya metsi.

src_text: Cabinet condemned the destruction of infrastructure by Tongaat residents in KwaZulu-Natal during protest over access to water.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se be le mamello jwalo ka ha mosebetsi se qadile wa ho lokisa Sitsi se Hlwekisang Metsi sa moo Tongaat..  Kabinete utlwisisa hantle pherekano ya baahi jwalo ka ha ba tlameha ho sebedisa metsi tliswang ka dilori ka lebaka la tshenyo neng bakwe ke dikgohola botjheng ba selemo sena.

src_text: Cabinet called for calm and patience as work is underway to restore the Tongaat Water Treatment Works.
tgt_text: Leha ho le jwalo, meruso le ho senya disebediswa tsa setjhaba ha se tharollo, empa le ho eketsa mathata setjhabeng.
Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa.

src_text: Cabinet understands the frustrations of residents who have had to use water tankers for an extended period since the flooding earlier this year.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho saenelwa ha Tshisinyo ya Dintlafatso Molaong Laolang Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Bommasepala wa Selemo sa 2022, (Molao wa bo 3 wa Selemo sa 2022) ho ba molao ka botlalo ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa.

src_text: However, violence and anarchy are not solution, and the destruction of public infrastructure only hurts local communities.
tgt_text: Ka molao ona, ho ikemiseditswe ho ntlafatsa maemo le boleng ba tshebetso ya bommasepala.

src_text: Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act of.
tgt_text: Molao ona, ke karolo ya matsapa mmuso ho ntlafatsa maemo Phano ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba leng tokelo ya sona ngotsweng ho Molaotheo wa Afrika Borwa wa Selemo sa..  Molao ona hlakisa hantle le tsela tlamehang ho latelwa ha ho hirwa basebeletsi maemong hodimo boetse hape thibela basebeletsi ba mmuso ho ba ketapeleng ya mekga ya dipolotiki.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the signed into law the Local Government Municipal Systems Amendment Act, 2022 (Act 3 of 2022) by President Cyril Ramaphosa.
tgt_text: Molao ona hape dumella hore dikgeo tsa batsamaisi ba bommasepala di phatlalatswe boemong ba naha ho bebofatsa taba ya ho fumana batho ba nang le bokgoni bo hlokahalang.

src_text: The Act aims to improve the capacity and ethical standards of local government.
tgt_text: Kabinete na le boitshepo ba hore diphetoho tsena di tla netefatsa hore ba kgethelwang kapa ba hirelwang dikgeong tseo, ba sebetsa ka tsela lebelletsweng le ho netefatsa hore re ntlafatsa maphelo batho bohle.

src_text: The law forms part of government’s efforts to professionalise the Public Service and ensure the sustainable provision of services to the people, as basic right enshrined in the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of..
tgt_text: Bonokwane.

src_text: The Act specifies the processes to be followed for senior position appointments.
tgt_text: Kabinete thoholetsa ba Ditshebeletso tsa Lekgetho Afrika Borwa ka ho kgona ho fumana sethethefatsi sa crystal meth sa boima ba 785kg, se ka bitsang dimilione tse   Sethethefatsi sena, se fumanwe mane Boemafofaneng ba Matjhaba ba OR Tambo ka Sontaha sa la 28 Phato.

src_text: It now prevents senior public officials from holding political office in political parties.
tgt_text: Ho fumaneha ha sethethefatsi sena, ho tla romela molaetsa ho dinokwane hore madiboho rona sebetsa ka thata ho lwantsha ditlolo tsa molao  Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Also with this Act in place, vacant municipal manager posts are expected to be advertised nationally to attract wide pool of suitable candidates..
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya Moifo wa Thuto Phahameng Mabapi le Dipatlisiso ka Meputso ya Baokamedi ba Diyunivesithi (CHE) le Basebeletsi ba Boemong ba Botsamaisi ho tsona Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Cabinet is confident that these changes will ensure that those who are appointed or elected into these positions will be able to deliver on their promises so that we can achieve better life for all.
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya hlajwa malotsana ka sephetho sa dipatlisiso ka CHE, tse neng di thakgolwe ke Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale, Ngaka, Blade Nzimande, ho hlahloba taba ya meputso le tsela ya tshebetso ya batsamaisi ba ka sehloohong diyunivesithing dilemong tse 15 tse fetileng, ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 ho isa ho sa..  Dipatlisiso tsena, di ne di lekola taba ya tshebetso, katleho le ntshetsopele diyunivesithing kapa lekaleng la thuto phahameng naheng ena.

src_text: Crime.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena le dikateng tsa yona di kenyeletsa le dikgothaletso tsa teng.

src_text: Cabinet commended the South African Revenue Service’s customs officials for seizing 785 kg of crystal meth with street value of R236 million at the OR Tambo International Airport on Sunday, 28 August.
tgt_text: Tse ding tsa dikgothaletso di kenyeletsa ho matlafatswa esitana le ho sebetsa ka tsela hlakileng mabapi le ditaba tsa meputso.

src_text: The drug bust will send clear warning to criminal syndicates that our ports of entry and exit are well protected and our officers are working hard to stamp out any criminality   Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Tse ding dikgothaletso di eletsa ho thehwa ha komiti ikemetseng tla shebana le taba ya meputso.

src_text: Report of the Council on Higher Education (CHE) Enquiry into the Remuneration of University Vice Chancellors and Senior Executive Managers in South Africa.
tgt_text: Dikgothaletso tsena, di boetse di sisinya le hore ho be le ho matlafatswa mmoho le ho lekolwa ha tshebetso  ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed on the outcomes of the CHE enquiry that was commissioned in 2020 by the Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation, Dr Blade Nzimande, to examine the remuneration levels and trends of the university executives over the 15-year period from 2005 to..
tgt_text: Dipatlisiso tsena, di boetsa tsa lekola le ho fetana ha boholo ba ditsi tsena mme tsa boela tsa bapiswa le maemo matjhaba.

src_text: The investigation was to establish the sustainability, viability and development of the universities or higher education sector in the country.
tgt_text: Letona la Thuto Phahameng, Saense le Mahlale ho lebeletswe hore le buisane le ketapele ya diyunivesithi ka maikemisetso ho di ntshetsa pele.

src_text: This report outlines the key findings together with proposed remedial recommendations..
tgt_text: Ka morao ho moo, tlaleho ena tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Thuto Phahameng le Thupello: www.dhet.gov.za.

src_text: The recommendations propose, amongst others strengthened and more transparent remuneration process.
tgt_text: Ho Potlakiswa ha Diphetoho Dipatlisisong le Mokgweng wa ho Ruta Lekaleng la Thuto Phahameng.

src_text: The setting up of an external and independent oversight structure to oversee the decision-making process of remunerations.
tgt_text: Kabinete tshehetsa dikgothaletso tsa dipatlisiso tse pedi tse neng di etswe ho ka eletsa ka tsela le mekgwa ka sebediswang ho potlakisa diphetoho dipatlisisong le mokgweng wa ho ruta ditsing tsa thuto phahameng.

src_text: It also proposes the strengthening of the performance evaluation systems in the institutions.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya pele ne etswe ke Komiti Ikgethileng ya Matona neng fuputsa ka thibelo ya kgiro, tshebediso le katleho ya barutehi ba batho ba batsho Afrika Borwa.

src_text: The study has also taken into account the various sizes of these institutions and it also did international benchmarking.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ya bobedi – neng ntshitswe ke Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale mmoho le Mokgatlo wa Naha wa Dipatlisiso – yona ne etswe ke Mokgatlo wa Diyunivesithi tsa Afrika Borwa leng mokgatlo emetseng diyunivesithi tse 26 tsa setjhaba naheng ena.

src_text: The Minister of Higher Education, Science and Innovation is expected to discuss this report with the university leadership as measure to strengthen these academic institutions.
tgt_text: Ka bobedi ditlaleho tsena di kgothaletsa taba ya ho potlakiswa ha diphetoho dikarolong tse hlano leng tshebediso ya dirutehi; ho nka karolo ha basebeletsi ba diyunivesithi; mokgwa le tshebetso ya diyunivesithi; melawana le maano tshebetso, le kgaello ya disebediswa.

src_text: The report will thereafter be published in the Department of Higher Education and Training’s website: www.dhet.gov.za.
tgt_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ho Tshebediso ya Dimela le Diphoofolo Tlhahisong ya Dijo le tsa Temo (the Treaty).

src_text: Accelerated Transformation of the Research and Teaching Capacity in the Higher Education Sector.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha the Treaty Palamenteng bakeng sa tekolo.

src_text: Cabinet supported the recommendations of the two studies that were commissioned to advise on the measures to be put in place so as to accelerate the transformation of research and teaching capacity in the institutions of higher learning.
tgt_text: Sena se tla etsa hore Afrika Borwa be karolo ya Tumellano ena fanang ka tataiso ho dinaha tseo leng ditho mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo dijong le ho tsa temo.

src_text: The first report was done by the Ministerial Task Team which investigated the blockages that prevent the recruitment, retention and progression of black South African academics.
tgt_text: Ho amohelwa ha Tumellano ena, ho tla matlafatsa boitlamo ba naha ena mabapi le paballo le tshebediso ya nako telele ya dihlahiswa tsa dimela le diphoofolo, mme ho tshehetswe le batho ba mahaeng.

src_text: The second report – commissioned by the Department of Science and Innovation and the National Research Foundation – was done by Universities South Africa, the umbrella body representative of the 26 public universities in the country.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Both these reports proposes intervention strategies to accelerate transformation in five broad areas, namely in postgraduate pineline; staff participation; institutional culture and practice; policy and the strategy, and limited resources.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Leano la Diphetoho.
Moralo ona hlakisa ponelopele ka Afrika Borwa nang le Maemo Lehodimo Tsitsitseng.

src_text: International Treaty on Plant Genetic Resources for Food and Agriculture (the Treaty).
tgt_text: Moralo ona hlalosa tsela le mekgwa ya ho fihlela sena.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the Treaty to Parliament for accession.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tla ama motho ohle Afrika Borwa fane le ka menyetla ya ho lokisa ho se lekalekane ha nako fetileng le ho aha moruo tla tswela bohle molemo.

src_text: This will enable South Africa to form part of the parties to this Treaty, which guides the member countries in conserving and ensuring the sustainable usage of the plant genetic resources for food and agriculture.
tgt_text: Komeshene ya Mopresidente ya Maemo Lehodimo buisane le mahlahana yona mme ya fumana tshehetso kgolo ka moralo ona.

src_text: Acceding to this Treaty will also strengthen the country’s commitment towards conservation and sustainable use of plant genetic resources, and provide support to rural communities.
tgt_text: Kabinete ka netefatsa taba ya hore moralo ona wa ho fihlela tikoloho moya hlwekileng ka selemo sa 2050 tlameha ho tshehetsa moruo le ntshetsopele ya naha ho kenyeletsa menyetla ya mesebetsi ho bohle, tshebedisano le setjhaba le phediso ya bofuma.

src_text: Just Transition Framework for South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho mahlahana yona ohle hore tshehetse moralo ona.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Just Transition Framework for implementation.
tgt_text: Ho tla ralwa tsela eo moralo ona tlang ho kengwa tshebetsong ka yona mme tla kenyelletswa moralong wa maano le kabo ya ditjhelete tsa mmuso.

src_text: The framework presents shared vision for an equitable, climate-resilient South Africa.
tgt_text: Mofuta Motjha wa Lengolo la Afrika Borwa la ho Kganna.

src_text: It defines the principles and policy areas to achieve this.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho fetolwa ha mofuta sebetsang ha jwale wa lengolo la ho kganna ho ya ho le nang le dikarolo tse ntjha tsa tshireletso.

src_text: The transition framework will impact everyone in South Africa, and provides an opportunity to address historical inequities and creates an economy that benefits all.
tgt_text: Mofuta ona sebediswang ha jwale, haesale le tshebetsong ho tloha ka selemo sa.

src_text: The Presidential Climate Commission conducted an extensive consultation process with social partners and received broad support for the framework.
tgt_text: Maemo thekenoloji fetohile haholo matsatsing ana mme ho bitsa tjhelete ngata ho tswela pele le mofuta ona.

src_text: Cabinet affirmed that the shift to net-zero carbon economy by 2050 must support national development aspirations, including decent work for all, social inclusion and the eradication of poverty.
tgt_text: Mofuta motjha wa karete tsamaisana le Maemo Matjhaba Mangolo ho Kganna le Thekenoloji ya Poloko ya Dintlha tsa Batho.

src_text: Cabinet has called on all social partners to rally behind and embrace this framework detailed implementation plan for the framework will be developed, and it will be integrated into the government planning and budgeting system.
New South African Driving Licence Card.
tgt_text: Melawana ya Leano la Mmuso la Tshehetso ya Setjhaba (EPWP).

src_text: Cabinet approved the replacement of the current Driving Licence Card to one with more secure design features..
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha moralo wa EPWP bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: The current system has been in operation since.
tgt_text: Leano lena la EPWP, ke leo ka lona mmuso thusang setjhaba ho leleka bofuma ka ho theha mesebetsi ya nakwana, haholo bakeng sa basadi le batjha.

src_text: The technology has since evolved and it is becoming expensive to maintain the current infrastructure.
tgt_text: Moralo ona motjha tla hlakisa dintho tse ngata tse kang meputso, tshehetso tsa ditjhelete, tshireletso ya setjhaba le hore leano lena le ipapise le melao ya tsa kgiro.

src_text: The new proposed card will make the country’s driving licence compatible with the International Information Technology Personal Identification Compliant Driving Licence (ISO18013).
tgt_text: Le tla boela le kgothaletsa le tshebedisano mmoho pakeng tsa mmuso le lekala le ikemetseng ho ka netefatsa hore lenaneo lena la EPWP le thusa ho theha mesebetsi ya moshwelella le ho leleka bofuma.

src_text: Expanded Public Works Programme (EPWP) Policy.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tla hlaha ka mahlale ho kenya lenaneo lena la mesebetsi ya setjhaba tshebetsong naheng ka bophara.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the draft EPWP Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Diphetoho Mofuteng wa Bone wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa.

src_text: The EPWP is one of government's key programmes aimed at providing poverty and income relief by creating temporary work opportunities, particularly for youth and women..
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlhahisong ya Mofuta Motjha wa Tjhelete ya Tshepe Afrika Borwa ho tloha ka selemo sa tjhaetse monwana ho tjhentjhisana ha tshebediso ya dipuo tse molao tjheleteng ena jwalo ka selemo.

src_text: The draft new policy will strengthen the programme and provide clarity on aspects such as wages, funding model and social protection, and also align the EPWP with modern labour practices.
tgt_text: Lentswe lena “Afrika Borwa” le tla hlahella lehlakoreng le le leng la tjhelete mme ho tjhentjhanywe dipuo tsohle tse molaong.

src_text: It will promote partnerships between government and the private sector toward ensuring the EPWP contributes massively towards the creation of decent work and alleviation of poverty.
tgt_text: Ho R5, ho tla sebediswa puo tse tharo; ho R2; 50c, 20c le 10c ho sebediswe puo tse pedi mme ho R1 ho sebediswe puo le nngwe.

src_text: The policy will also promote innovation in the implementation of public works programmes across the country..
tgt_text: Dipuo tsena di tla nne di tjhentjhane jwalo ka selemo dilemong tsena tse leshome tse tlang.

src_text: Amendments to the Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Molawana wa Tlhwekiso ya Metsi (IWQM) wa Selemo sa.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the dimension, design and compilation of the year 2023 Fourth Decimal Coin Series of South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa IWQM bukaneng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: It approved the annual rotational system of the usage of the official languages on the fourth decimal coin series.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tla kena sebakeng sa wa kgale wa WQM wa selemo sa 1991 neng kengwe tshebetsong ka selemo sa..  Molawana ona hlakisa dintlha tsa bohlokwa tsamaisong ya tlhwekiso ya metsi.

src_text: The word “South Africa” will be inserted on the one side of the coins and printed in all the official languages.
tgt_text: Moralo ona tsamaisana le melao yohle ya naha laolang metsi mme ntse ikamahantse le boinehelo ba naha ba ho nka metsi jwalo ka sehlahiswa se sa atang.

src_text: Three languages will be used in the R5 coin; two languages R2; 50c, 20c and 10c coins and the R1 will be in one language.
tgt_text: Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya Bakeng sa Nako Tlang.

src_text: All these languages will be used on an annual rotational basis over the next 10 years.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho phatlalatswa ha Moralo wa Molawana Laolang Maqhubu Diyalemoya bakeng sa Nako Tlang bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: Draft Integrated Water Quality Management (IWQM) Policy of.
tgt_text: Maqhubu kgaso ya diyalemoya, ke bohlokwa ho tsa kgokahano le tshebedisong ya dijithale Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the Draft IWQM Policy for public consultation.
tgt_text: Molawana ona tla hlakisa taba ya ho fana ka dilaesense bakeng sa diselefounu; kgaso; tshebeletso tsa difofane le tsa dikepe; tsa dipatlisiso le ntshetsopele; tshebedisano le setjhaba ha mmoho le diindasteri tse ding tse amehang.

src_text: The proposed policy will replace the outdated WQM Policy of 1991 and its strategy that was put in place in.
tgt_text: Molawana ona tla netefatsa tshebetso hlokang leemo kabong ya dilaesense lekaleng lena ha mmoho le ho netefatsa hore bohle ba fumana kgokahano ntle ka mokgwa wa dijithale le dibakeng tse dikoting naheng ena.
Kemedi ya Afrika Borwa ho Boto ya Matjhaba ya Moifo wa Taolo ho tsa Kgokahano ya Diyalemoya (ITU).

src_text: The policy outlines set of principles that will form the basis for water quality management.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kgethwa ha Ntate Mandla Samuel Mchunu ho ya emela Afrika Borwa ho ITU (Region .

src_text: It provides an alignment to all the relevant water-related legislation and the country’s global commitments to the provision and conservation of water as scarce resource.
tgt_text: Ha jwale Ntate Mchunu ke setho sa boto ena.

src_text: Draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy.
tgt_text: Ho sisintswe hore boele kgethelwe ho sebetsa teng hape ho tloha ka semo sa 2023 ho isa ho sa..  Dikgetho di tla tshwarelwa Sebokeng sa ITU sa Kemedi tsa Dinaha se tla ba mane Bucharest, Romania ho tloha ka la 26 Lwetse ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.

src_text: Cabinet approved the publication of the draft Next Generation Radio Frequency Spectrum Policy for public comment.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa ikemiseditse ho ikamahanya le dipehelo tsa ITU ho netefatsa hore kgokahanyo finyella diqoleng tsohle tsa lefatshe ka mokgwa wa dijithale .

src_text: Radio frequency spectrum is finite natural resource that is vital to the growth of South Africa’s digital economy and communication infrastructure.
tgt_text: Kgwedi ya Botjhaba.

src_text: The proposed policy intends to support the spectrum allocation and licensing for fixed mobile; broadcasting; aeronautical and marine; research and development; community access, and other relevant industries.
tgt_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ya Botjhaba leng ya Lwetse re tla keteka tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa”.

src_text: The policy also seeks to promote equity and fair allocation to contribute towards the transformation of the sector and accessibility of digital connectivity even in outlying parts of the country.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho Maafrika Borwa kaofela ho keteka Botjhaba ba rona ka ho fapana ha rona empa re ntse re le setjhaba se le seng se bopahaneng.

src_text: South Africa’s Candidature for the International Telecommunication Union ( ITU) Council and Radio Regulations Board.
tgt_text: Re tlameha ho sebetsa mmoho re tshwarane ho fedisa dikarohano le dipherekano tsa nako  fetileng mme re be setjhaba se le seng se motlotlo ka Afrika Borwa  Melaetsa.
