src_text: Cabinet approved South Africa’s candidature of Mr Mandla Samuel Mchunu to the ITU Radio Regulations Board (Region .
tgt_text: DitebohoKabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho:Bahlodi bohle, ba fumaneng dimetale le bohle ba nkileng karolo lebelong la bo 95 la Comrades tummeng ka hore ke “Lebelo Botho la ho Hlola Kaofela”, le neng le mathwa ka la 28 Phato.

src_text: Mr Mchunu is currently serving board member.
tgt_text: Mokgahlelong wa banna mohlodi bile Tete Dijana (ka nako ya dihora tse 5, metsotso 30 le metsotswana 38).

src_text: He is proposed for re-election to the ITU Council for the term 2023 to.
tgt_text: Mohlodi enwa tswa Mahikeng profensing ya Leboya Bophirima.
Mokgahlelong wa basadi teng mohlodi bile Alexandra Morozova ho tswa naheng ya Rashia (ka nako ya dihora tse 6, metsotso 17 le metsotswana 47).

src_text: The elections will take place during the ITU Plenipotentiary Conference to be held in Bucharest, Romania from 26 September to 14 October.
tgt_text: MatshidisoKabinete lebisa matshidiso yona ho lelapa le metswalle ya:Mme Rita Alice Ndzanga (88), eo neng le molwanedi wa tsa tokoloho le ditokelo tsa basebetsi ya neng fumane Kgau ya National Order of Luthuli ka selemo sa 2004 ka “Kabelo ya hae ho lwaneleng ditokelo tsa basebetsi le tsa Afrika Borwa sa kgetholleng ka morabe le bonng.”Ditho tse hlano tsa Sepolesa sa Afrika Borwa (SAPS) tse ileng tsa swahlamana le sefofane Boemafofaneng ba Rand, Germiston, ka Labobedi la la 30 Phato.

src_text: South Africa remains committed to the goals and objectives of the ITU of bridging the digital divide and connecting all the people of the world   Upcoming event.
tgt_text: SAPS ntse fuputsa sesosa sa kotsi ena.

src_text: Heritage Month.
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletsa mofofisi wa teng ya lemetseng haholo ho fola ka potlako  Kgiro.

src_text: Heritage Month in September will this year be commemorated under the theme: “Celebrating the Legacy of Solomon Linda and South Africa’s Indigenous Music”.
tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang  Mme Gugulethu Abigail Thimane jwalo ka Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso (DDG): ba keng sa Tekolo le Ntshetsopele Lefapheng la Meralo, Tekolo le Tekolobotjha  Mme Kwena Komape jwalo ka DDG: Ntshetsopele ya Moruo, tsa Kgwebo le Dipapatso Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ditaba tsa Mobu le Ntshetsopele ya Dibaka tsa Mahaeng  Ngaka Bongani Elias Sithole jwalo ka DDG: Ofising ya Naha ya Taolo ya Dikoduwa Lefapheng la Puso ya Kopanelo.

src_text: Issues in the Environment.
tgt_text: Motlakase.

src_text: Energy.
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya fumana tlaleho ho tswa ho Letona la Dikgwebo tsa Mmuso Pravin Gordhan ka mekgwa eo Eskom tlang ho sebedisa ho lwantshana le ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa.

src_text: Cabinet was briefed by Public Enterprises Minister Pravin Gordhan on the capacity of Eskom to mitigate the intermittent load-shedding and also received progress report from the Technical Committee of the National Energy Crisis Committee.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse hape ya fumana le tlaleho ya kgatelo pele mosebetsing wa Komiti ya Naha Shebaneng le Mathata Motlakase..     Ha ditlaleho tsena ka bobedi di se di sekasekilwe ho tla ba teng phatlalatso tla etswa..     Kabinete ikwahlaya haholo ka ditshitiso tse bakwang ke ho tingwa hona ha motlakase dikgwebong le malapeng, haholoholo nakong eo mmuso kenyang tshebetsong matsapa neng phatlalatswe ke Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa ka Phupu.

src_text: Further announcements will be made following the conclusion of the intensive deliberations of these reports.
tgt_text: Matsete.

src_text: Cabinet expressed regret at the disruption and inconvenience caused by load-shedding to businesses and households, particularly happening at the time when government is engaged with the interventions announced by the President in July.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho thakgolwa ha Sitsi se setjha sa Tlhahiso sa Sandvik Khomanani mane Kempton Park, seo bileng karolo ya ditshepiso tse neng di etswe Sebokeng sa bone sa Matsete sa Afrika Borwa (SAIC) se neng se tshwaretswe Sandton Convention Centre ka la 24 Tlhakubele 2022 sa dimilione tse  .
Sitsi sena se setjha se bobatsi ba 62 000m², se kopantse tshebetso ya ditsi tse hlano tse neng di sebeletsa mona nakong fetileng mme se hirile batho ba ka bang.

src_text: Investment.
tgt_text: Sena ke se seng sa ditsi tse kgolo le tse tswetseng pele tsa Sandvik lefatsheng ka bophara mme se kgona ho hlahisa dipersente tse fetang tse 60 tsa tlhahiso Afrika Borwa.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the new Sandvik Khomanani Manufacturing Site in Kempton Park, which was part of the R350-million investment pledged at the fourth South Africa Investment Conference (SAIC) held at the Sandton Convention Centre in Johannesburg on 24 March..
tgt_text: Kabinite boetse ya amohela ho etela ha Mopresidente ho thakgolweng ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa Hesto Harnesses mane Stanger, KwaDukuza ka la 13 Loetse.

src_text: The new 62 000 square-metre facility consolidates operations previously undertaken at five separate sites and accommodates about 550 employees.
tgt_text: Sitsi sena ke se seng sa diprojeke tse hlano tsa matsete tseo leng karolo ya matsete Metair Investments Limited dibilione tse  4 tlo tshehetsa katoloso ya tlhahiso ya mofuta motjha wa koloi ya Ford Ranger.

src_text: It is one of Sandvik’s biggest and most advanced facilities globally, and has the ability to produce underground loaders with over 60% South African content..
tgt_text: Mopresidente ile boela etela le ho bulweng ha khamphane atolotsweng ya ha Sappi Saiccor Mill bitsang dibilione tse R7,7 mane Umkomaas ikemiseditseng ho atolla tlhodisano ya tshebetso ya yona maemong matjhaba ha mmoho le ho eketsa menyetla ya mosebetsi bakeng sa nako kgutshwane le telele..     Matsete ana ke mang ditshepiso tse neng di etswe ke diindasteri tsena ho SAIC.

src_text: Cabinet further welcomed the oversight visit by President Ramaphosa in KwaZulu-Natal during the launch of the Hesto Harnesses manufacturing facility in Stanger, KwaDukuza on 13 September.
tgt_text: Matsete mang le mang matjha naheng ena thusa letsholong la kahobotjha le tsoseletso ya moruo, mme hape tswela pele ho etsa Afrika Borwa sebaka se setle sa ho etsa matsete..     Ntshetsopele ya Meralo ya Motheo.

src_text: This facility is one of five capital investment projects that form part of R. 4-billion commitment by Metair Investments Limited to support the expansion and localisation of the new Ford Ranger.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho bulwa ha karolo ntjha ya Mmila wa Ring Road wa Musina mane Limpopo tla bebofatsa kgwebelano ha mmoho le ho tsamaya ha batho Musina le dinaheng tsa boahisane tse ka borwa ho Afrika.

src_text: The President also attended the opening of the Sappi Saiccor Mill upgrade and expansion project worth R7,7 billion in Umkomaas, which is aimed at increasing the capacity and global competitiveness of the company while also creating short- and long-term employment opportunities..
tgt_text: Projeke ena ya dimilione tse R640 thehile mesebetsi ya moshwelella fetang 275 mme ya thehela le dikgwebo tse nyane, tse bohareng le tse kgolo menyetla..     Ho ahwa ha mmila ona wa Musina Ring Road ke karolo ya leano la mmuso la meralo ya motheo tlasa lenaneo la ERRP, leo ka lona ho ikemiseditsweng ho theha le hona ho hodisa menyetla ya mesebetsi setjhabeng ho tswa makaleng fapafapaneng..     Koduwa ya Jagersfontein.

src_text: These investments form part of pledges made by industrialists at the SAIC.
tgt_text: Kabinete lebisa kutlwelo bohloko ya yona ho malapa ohle lahlehetsweng ke beng ka ona ka lebaka la ho phatloha ha letamo la morafo neng se sa sebediswe wa Jagersfontein mane Foreisitata ka Sontaha sa la 11 Loetse.

src_text: Every new investment into our country assists in the reconstruction and recovery of our economy, and continues to profile South Africa as an investment destination of choice.
tgt_text: Koduwa ena sentse meralo mengata ya motheo esitana le matlo le dikoloi tsa batho..     Ketelong ya hae sebakeng sena sa koduwa ka Mantaha wa la 12 Loetse 2022, Mopresidente Ramaphosa ile thoholetsa matsapa neng se entswe ho leka ho thusa sebakeng seo ile ba ikana hore mmuso tla fana ka tshehetso hlokahalang setjhabeng seo sa Jagersfontein.

src_text: Infrastructure development.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ya kgothatswa ke taba ya hore beng ba morafo ona ba ikemiseditse ho tshehetsa mmuso ka tshehetso ya setekginiki haeba ka kotjwa ke Moifo okametseng Dimenerale Afrika Borwa..     Indasteri ya merafo ke le leng la makala nang le seabo se seholo kgolong ya moruo wa naha ena ka ho theha menyetla ya mesebetsi, ho romelwa ha thepa dinaheng tsa kantle ha mmoho le ho etsa matsete dinaheng tsa kantle, tseo tsohle tse tswelang batho ba dibaka tsa merafong molemo..     Mmuso le mekgatlo ikemetseng ba ile ba phallela ho thusa mahlatsipa ka dintho tse kang mepheme ya nakwana, ditshebeletso tsa ho thojwa maikutlo le ditlhoko tsa sethatho tse kang dikobo, mealo ha mmoho le dijo.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the opening of the new section of the Musina Ring Road in Limpopo that will make it easier for people to move around Musina, and also allow for increased trade and economic activity between South Africa and the Southern African Development Community countries.
tgt_text: Metsi le motlakase le tsona di boetse setlwaeding sebakeng sena..     Ha ho se ho hlwekisitswe sebakeng seo sa koduwa, boratekginiki ba tla hlahloba maemo matlo moo.

src_text: The R640-million project created over 275 full-time jobs for locals and provided opportunities for local communities and small, medium and micro enterprises (SMMEs)..
tgt_text: Kabinete leboha ba ditshebeletso tsa tshohanyetso, mekgatlo ya setjhaba le setjhaba ka kakaretso ka ho phallela ka thuso..     Moruo.

src_text: The construction of the Musina Ring Road is part of government’s infrastructure programme, through the ERRP, that seeks to create inclusive growth and employment opportunities across various sectors and communities.
tgt_text: Kabinete ile ya sekaseka maemo moruo naha ena ho latela dipalopalo tse sa tswa lokollwa ke Lefapha la Dipalopalo (Stats SA) la naha ena tse bontshang ha tlhahiso ya thepa kotareng ya bobedi ya selemo sena theohile ka persente tse 0,7%.

src_text: Jagersfontein disaster.
tgt_text: Hara dintlha tse bakileng phokotseho ena re ka bala ho tingwa ha motlakase ka sepheo sa ho baballa, ntwa ya Rashiya le Ukraine ha mmoho le ho nyoloha ha ditjeho tsa bophelo ka kakaretso..     Matsapa ileng etswa ka Lenaneo la Kahobotjha le Tsoseletso ya Moruo ile thusa haholo ho thibella ho lahleha ho hong ha mesebetsi ha mmoho le kgahlamelo mpe ya maemo matjhaba moruong wa rona.

src_text: 1 Cabinet expressed its sincere condolences to the families of those who lost their lives after the tailings of an abandoned local mine in Jagersfontein in the Free State burst open and released disastrous mudslide around dawn on Sunday, 11 September.
tgt_text: Matsapa ana mmuso bontsha katleho kgolo, mme bopaki ba teng bo bonahetse dipalopalong tsa Kotara tsa Stats SA tsa Dipatlisiso tsa Batho ba Sebetsang.

src_text: The disaster also left the local infrastructure, personal properties such as vehicles and several homes severely damaged.. 2 During his visit to the disaster area on Monday, 12 September 2022, President Ramaphosa expressed appreciation for the rescue and recovery efforts being undertaken in the area.
tgt_text: Dipalopalo tsena di bontsha ha le batho ba 648 000 ba fumaneng mesebetsi pakeng tsa kotara ya pele le ya bobedi ya selemo sa     Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: He also pledged that government will provide the necessary support to the affected residents of Jagersfontein.
tgt_text: Ho Behwa Leihlo le ho Lekolwa Botjha (M&E) ha Moralo wa Leano la Naha la Batjha (NYP).

src_text: Cabinet is encouraged that the owners of the mine have said that they are ready to provide technical assistance and support to the government should it be requested by the Minerals Council South Africa.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana moralo wa M&E mme tla matlafatsa ho behwa leihlo ha ditshiya tsa NYP 2020-.

src_text: 3 The mining industry remains significant contributor to the economy through direct and indirect employment, export earnings, and foreign direct investment, and plays crucial role in improving the lives of people in mining communities.
tgt_text: Moralo ona na le dipontsho tse hlano tse tsamaisanang le ditshiya tsa NYP.

src_text: 4 Government and some non-governmental organisations intervened urgently by providing emergency shelter, trauma counselling and basic provisions such as blankets, mattresses and food parcels.
tgt_text: Dipontsho tsena di ile tsa thehwa ka tshebedisano mmoho le bankakarolo ba nang le thahasello tshehetsong le ntshetsopeleng ya batjha naheng ena.

src_text: Water supply and electricity in the area have since been restored.
tgt_text: Dintlha tsa teng di tla arolwa ho ya ka dilemo, bonng, maemo ho itekanela, morabe ha mmoho le dibaka..     Ho behwa leihlo hona ho tla etsuwa maemong ohle mmuso ha mmoho le lekaleng le ikemetseng.
Tlaleho ya teng tla bokeletswa jwalo ka kotara mme phatlalatswe habedi ka selemo..     Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo.

src_text: 5 Once the disaster site has been cleaned up, technicians are expected to undertake structural assessments of houses.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Moralo wa Leano bakeng sa Moralo wa Kopanelo mmusong oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho hlwaya dikgeo tse teng moralong wa ha jwale..     Matsapa ana rerilweng, ka ona ho ikemiseditswe ho shebana le ho hloleha ho etsa meralo maemong ka boraro mmuso.

src_text: Cabinet thanked emergency services, civil-society organisations and members of the public for their generous contributions and assistance.
tgt_text: Matsapa ana tla tla ka lenaneo le bontshang bopaki le tla beha tshebetso leihlo.

src_text: Economy.
tgt_text: Leano lena le boetse le tla le leano la tjhebelopele la nako telele bohareng le kgutshwane maemong ohle mmuso..     Sena se tla thusa ho tla le diphetoho melaong ka maikemisetso ho ntlafatsa tshebedisano meralong le tjhebelong pele..     Ho Amohelwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha Akgente ya Meriana ya Seafrika (AMA).

src_text: Cabinet deliberated on the state of the economy in the country after Statistics South Africa’s (Stats SA) recent figures showed that the gross domestic product (GDP) for the second quarter of 2022 decreased by 0,7%.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tekenwa ha Tumellano ya ho Thehwa ha AMA le ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.

src_text: Factors which influenced this decrease included load-shedding, the Russia-Ukraine conflict, and the high cost of living and inflation.
tgt_text: Sena se tla thusa ho theha tumellano eo ho neng ho dumellanwe ka yona Palamente ya Dinaha tsa Afrika ka.

src_text: The interventions made by the Economic Reconstruction and Recovery Plan (ERRP) have largely cushioned the country from the international headwinds, and also protected jobs and livelihoods.
tgt_text: Ka tumellano ena, ho tla thehwa AMA bakeng sa kontinente ya Afrika.

src_text: Government’s strong economic interventions are beginning to bear fruit, as evidenced in Stats SA’s recent Quarterly Labour Force Survey results, which showed that over 648 000 jobs were gained between the first and second quarters of  Cabinet Decisions.
tgt_text: Akgente ena tla laola meriana yohle ya kontinente ena mme ntlafatse le polokeho le tshebediso ya yona..     Ho tekenwa ha tumellano ena ho tla ntshetsa pele boinehelo ba Afrika Borwa matjhabeng ba ho ntlafatsa ho laolwa ha meriana kontinenteng ena..     Tlaleho Tshebetsong ya Dipatlisiso le Ntshetsong Pele (R&D) ya Lenaneo la Merokotso ya Lekgetho – 2019/20 le 2020/.

src_text: Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) Framework for the National Youth Policy (NYP).
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Lenaneo la R&D la Merokotso ya Lekgetho la dilemo tse pedi tse fetileng (2019/20 le 2020/21).

src_text: Cabinet approved the M&E framework that will enable the effective monitoring and impact assessment of the pillars of the NYP 2020-.
tgt_text: Sena se tsamaisana le karoloya bo 11D (17) ya Molao wa Lekgetho, wa 1962 (Molao wa bo 58 wa 1962) bolelang tlhokeho ya ho tliswa ha ditlaleho tsena Palamenteng..     Lenaneo lena la merokotso ya lekgetho le kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ikemetseng ho tsetela ho R&D le ho tshehetsa kgolo ya matsete.

src_text: The framework provides five high-level indicators which are aligned with the pillars of the NYP.
tgt_text: Lenaneo lena le tshehetsa ntlafatso ya saense le mahlale kgolong ya moruo le matlafatsong ya tlhodisano..     Kabinete kgotsofetse ka tlaleho ena bontshang dikhamphane tse ntjha tse kentseng dikopo tsa merokotso ya lekgetho.

src_text: The indicators were developed with the relevant stakeholders who have an interest in the development and empowerment of youth in the country.
tgt_text: Sena se kgothaletsa dikhamphane tse ngata ho nka karolo ka maikemisetso ho hodisa matsete tsona le ho matlafatsa kgolo ya moruo..     Dikhamphane tse nne tse ka pele lenaneong lena la merokotso ya lekgetho ke tsa lekala la tlhahiso ya tsa temo, tsa merafo, tsa dikhemikhale, ditlolo, meriana, setekginiki le tsa thekenoloji ya dikhomputara mme Kabinete nkile makala ana la ona ka Sehloohong Leanong la Meralo ya Diindasteri.

src_text: The data collection will be disaggregated in terms of age, gender, disability, racial grouping and the geographic setting of these interventions..
tgt_text: Tlaleho feletseng ka fumaneha ho websaete ya Lefapha la Saense le Mahlale: www.dst.gov.za..     Foramo ya Afrika ya Menyetla ya Kgolo (AGOA) –.

src_text: The monitoring will be done in all spheres of government, entities and the private sector.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha Foramo ya AGOA ya.

src_text: The reports will be generated quarterly and published twice year..  Policy Framework for Integrated Planning.
tgt_text: AGOA ne thakgolwe ke naha ya Amerika ka selemo sa 2000 ho fana ka tshebedisano ya tsa kgwebo dinaheng tse ka tlase ho lehwatata la Sahara..     Thumello ya thepa ya Afrika Borwa ka tlasa lenaneo la AGOA kenyeletsa ditholwana, matokomane, dikoloi, dikarolwana tsa dikoloi, menerale ya ho etsa tshepe, tshepe le dihlahiswa tsa dikhemikhale.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the Policy Framework for Integrated Planning in government, which seeks to address the identified policy planning gaps in the current planning system.
tgt_text: Sebaka le letsatsi la seboka seo di tla phatlalatswa ha nako ntse tsamaya..     Seboka sa Matona sa Tlhahlobo ya Lefatshe (GEO) –.

src_text: The proposed interventions will amongst others deal with the lack of planning alignment within the three spheres of government.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha Seboka sa Matona sa GEO mane Kapa ka.

src_text: The interventions will introduce an evidence-based monitoring mechanism.
tgt_text: GEO ke mokgatlo wa kopanelo wa mmuso neng thehwe ka selemo sa 2003 ka mora Seboka sa Matjhaba sa Ntshetsopele se neng se tshwarwe ka.

src_text: The policy framework also introduces easier predictability with long to medium and short-term planning across government.
tgt_text: Lena ke lepatlelo leo dinaha tse fapafapaneng di fanang ka kabelo ya tsona molemong le mong wa ho aha tshebeletso ya GEO..     Ha jwale GEO na le ditho tsa mebuso ya dinaha tse fetang tse 113, mme tse 30 tsa tsona ke tsa mona Afrika.

src_text: It will work towards introducing legislative reforms to improve coherency and predictability in government planning and monitoring..
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho se ka sehloohong ho tloha ka selemo sa 2005 mme borasaense ba rona ke karolo ya dipatlisiso tse ngata tse etswang ke GEO..     Mphalane Kgwedi ya Dipalangwang (OTM) –.

src_text: Ratification of the Treaty for the Establishment of the African Medicines Agency (AMA).
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho thakgolwa ha letsholo la OTM ka Moqebelo wa la 1 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Sishov’ingolovane: mmoho re aha moralo wa motheo wa dipalangwang ntlafatsang maphelo batho.”.

src_text: Cabinet approved the signing of the Treaty for the Establishment of the AMA and its submission to Parliament for ratification.
tgt_text: Lenaneo la selemo la OTM ke leo ka lona ho hlokomediswang setjhaba ka bohlokwa ba dipalangwang jwalo ka karolo ya kgolo le ntshetsopele ya moruo.

src_text: This will give effect to the treaty that was adopted by the African Union Assembly in.
tgt_text: Ho tla ba le diketsahalo tse fapafapaneng mefuteng yohle ya dipalangwang jwalo ka difofane, dikepe, dipalangwang tsa setjhaba ha mmoho le tsa mebila.

src_text: The treaty formally establishes the AMA for the continent.
tgt_text: Diketsahalo tsena di tla hlokomedisa ka tshireletso le polokeho dipalangweng.

src_text: The agency will regulate medical products, and improve the safety and efficacy of the medical products for the continent.
tgt_text: Bankakarolo ba tla bontshana le ka diphephetso tse tobaneng le lekala la dipalangwang..     Mmuso ntse ikemiseditse ka taba ya ho ntlafatsa meralo ya motheo ya dipalangwang, mahaeng le ditoropong ka sepheo sa ho bebofatsa ho thothwa ha batho le thepa..     Kopano ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UN) ya Lenaneo la ho Dudiswa ha Batho.

src_text: The signing and ratifying of this treaty will advance South Africa’s global and continental commitment toward strengthening the continental regulatory system on its health products..  Report on the Performance of the Research and Development (R&D) Tax Incentive Programme – 2019/20 and 2020/.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarwa ha kopano ya UN-HABITAT Johannesburg ka la 16 le la 17 Mphalane.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the R&D Tax incentive Programme for the past two years (2019/20 and 2020/21).
This is in line with section 11D (17) of the Income Tax Act, 1962 (Act 58 1962), which requires the tabling of these reports in Parliament.
tgt_text: Lefapha la ho Dudiswa ha Setjhaba ke lona le tla tsamaisa seboka sena sa matsatsi mabedi seo ho sona ho tla tla boradipolotiki, basebeletsi le boradipatlisiso lekaleng lena ho kenyeletsa ditho tsa bohlokwa tseo tla beng le Kemedi ya UN-HABITAT ho tswa Nairobi, Kenya.

src_text: The tax incentive programme seeks to encourage private companies to invest in R&D so as to stimulate investment growth.
tgt_text: Taba tla ba ka sehloohong mona tla ba ho nkuwa ha mehato mabapi le dibaka tsa baipehi le ba mekhukhung..     Sephetho sa dipuisano tsena tla ba ona mokotaba tla theha Moralo wa Matjhaba tla tliswa ho Kopano ya UN-HABITAT ho tla pasiswa ka     Ditshisinyo tsa Melao.

src_text: It enables the advancement of science and innovation towards economic growth, and promotes competitiveness.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le Tlhekefetso tsa Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) wa.

src_text: Cabinet is pleased that the report shows that new companies have applied for the tax incentive.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa 2021 wa Moifo wa Naha Shebaneng le GBVF bakeng sa ho sekasekwa.

src_text: It encourages more companies to access this scheme as part of growing their respective investment and stimulating economic growth.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena tla le moralo wa molao tla thusa ho theha komiti ya molao tla shebana le taba ya GBVF boetse dumella ho thehwa ha Boto tla tla le maano le ho kenya tshebetsong ha Leano la Moralo wa Naha shebaneng le GBVF le neng le tjhaelwe monwana ke Kabinete ka Mphalane.

src_text: The top-four companies that accessed the tax incentive are in agro-processing; mining beneficiation; chemicals, cosmetics, pharmaceutical and electro-technical and Information Technology sectors that Cabinet endorsed as priority areas in the Industrial Policy Action Plan.
tgt_text: Boto ena tla ba le kemedi ya persente tse 51 ho tswa setjhabeng le tse 49 ho tswa mmusong.

src_text: The full report can be accessed through the Department of Science and Innovation website: www.dst.gov.za..  African Growth and Opportunity Act (AGOA) Forum –.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ya molao se phatlaladitswe bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..     Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the hosting of the AGOA Forum in.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa ha Tshisinyo ya Molao Laolang Kwae le Disebediswa tsa ho Tsuba tsa Elektroniki wa 2018 Palamenteng oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng hore kene sebakeng sa Molao Laolang Kwae wa 1993 (Molao wa bo 83 wa 1993) jwalo ka ha ntlafaditswe..     Ka tshisinyo ena ho ikemiseditswe ho tiisa melawana ya dipetlele tsa mmuso hore ikamahanye le ya Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Bophelo bo Botle Laolang Kwae nngwe ya dintho tse bolelwang ke tshisinyo ena ke dibaka tseo ho sa tsubelweng ho tsona kantle le ka hara meaho; ho kwalwa ha ho rekiswa ha kwae metjhining ya ho rekisa, le hore kwae be le letshwao la tlhokomediso pakaneng ya yona..     Tshisinyo ena sekasikilwe ke bankakarolo bohle ho kenyeletsa indasteri ya kwae, mekgatlo ya setjhaba ha mmoho le mafapha amehang mmuso     Diketsahalo tse Tlang.

src_text: AGOA was enacted by the United States of America (USA) in 2000 to provide unilateral trade preferential access for most of the sub-Saharan African countries and the USA domestic market.
tgt_text: Kopano Tlwaelehileng ya bo 77 ya Matjhaba Kopaneng (UNGA77).

src_text: South Africa’s exports under AGOA include edible fruits, nuts, vehicles, auto components, iron, steel and chemical products.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa nka karolo ho UNGA77 tswelang pele ntlokgolo ya Matjhaba Kopaneng mane New York City, USA ho tloha ka la 20 ho isa ho la 27 Loetse 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Nako ya bohlokwa: Tharollo ya diphetoho mathateng rarahaneng”.

src_text: The actual date and venue are still to be announced.
tgt_text: Kgahlamelo ya sewa sa Khorona (COVID-19) dinaheng tseo moruo le bodulo ba teng bo seng maemong bile kgolo ha bapiswa le ya dinaha tse setletseng mme dinaha tsena ha di tlameha ho tlohelwa di sale morao ha re tla tabeng ya kahobotjha le tsoseletso..     Pele ho Ngangisano ya Kopanong eo ya UN, Mongodi Moholo wa UN, Ntate António Guterres tla kopanya seboka se mabapi le “Diphetoho ho tsa Thuto” mme bitse le kopano ya bohlokwa ya Maano Ntshetsopele (di-SDG).

src_text: Group on Earth Observations (GEO) Ministerial Summit –.
tgt_text: Dikopano tsena tsa di-SDG ho lebeletswe hore di tle le ditsela tsa ho potlakisa ho kengwa tshebebetsong ha maano..     Letsatsi la Botjhaba.

src_text: Cabinet approved that South Africa hosts the GEO Ministerial Summit in Cape Town in.
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka puo ya bohlokwa moketeng wa ho keteka Letsatsi la Botjhaba la 2022 mane Union Buildings ka Moqebelo wa la 24 Loetse.

src_text: The GEO is an intergovernmental body set up in 2003 after the 2002 World Summit on Sustainable Development.
tgt_text: Lepetjo la mokete ona ke le reng: “Re Hopola Lefa la Solomon Linda re Thabela le Mmino wa Setso sa Afrika Borwa.”.

src_text: It serves as multilateral platform where countries voluntarily contribute towards common goal of building the GEO systems.
tgt_text: Selemong sena Kgwedi ena ya Botjhaba tla tsepamisa maikutlo mminong wa setso sa Afrika Borwa haholoholo wa Isicathamiya ha mmoho le kabelo ya ona dipapading, tsa bonono, tsa setso le botjhaba.

src_text: The GEO currently has more than 113 national governments, 30 of which are from Africa and about 140 participating organisations, with 11 of these from Africa.
tgt_text: Ka lepetjo lena ho ikemiseditswe ho keteka dilemo tse 60 sebini le moqapi wa dipina Solomon Popoli Linda (1909-1962) hlokahetse mme boela tsebisahale ka la Solomon Ntsele, eo leng moqapi wa pina ya, “Mbube”.

src_text: South Africa has been an active Executive Committee member since 2005 and our scientists are currently participating in number of research initiatives led through the GEO.
tgt_text: Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle.

src_text: October Transport Month (OTM) –.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa tla keteka Mokete wa Matjhaba wa 2022 wa Letsatsi la Ditaba tsa Mawatle mane Thekong ho tloha ka la 12 ho isa ka la 14 Mphalane.

src_text: Cabinet approved the launching of the OTM campaign on Saturday, 1 October 2022, under the theme: “Sishov’ingolovane: together building transport infrastructure that builds and sustains livelihoods”.
tgt_text: Mokete ona tla tshwarwa nakong ya OTM moo ka lona ho tlang ho etswa tlhokomediso ka dikepe jwalo ka lekala la dipalangwang.

src_text: The annual OTM is used to raise awareness on transport as one of the critical elements in economic growth and spatial development number of activities will take place to showcase the various aspects of transport infrastructure in aviation, maritime, public transport and roads.
tgt_text: Moketeng ona ho tla ba teng le kemedi ho tswa dinaheng tse fapafapaneng ho tla iponela tsa indasteri ya dikepe ya Afrika Borwa.

src_text: The activities will also raise awareness regarding transport safety and security.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa haesale le setho sa Mokgatlo wa Matjhaba wa Dikepe ho tloha ka selemo sa.

src_text: Stakeholder engagements will also be held to discuss various challenges in the transport sector.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo ona ke lekala le laolang tshebetso ya dikepe ho Matjhaba Kopaneng..     Kgwedi ya Bohahlaudi.

src_text: Government remains committed to improving the country’s transport infrastructure, both in rural and urban areas, so as to facilitate an effective and efficient movement of goods and people..  United Nations (UN) Human Settlement Programme Habitat (UN-HABITAT) Meeting.
tgt_text: Letsatsi la Matjhaba la Bohahlaudi (27 Loetse) Kgweding ena ya Bohahlaudi re tlo le keteka ka lepetjo le reng, “Re Nahana Botjha ka Bohahlaudi”.

src_text: Cabinet has approved the hosting of the meeting of the members of the UN-HABITAT in Johannesburg on 16 and 17 October.
tgt_text: Tsa bohahlaudi kwano lapeng di bohlokwa bakeng sa kahobotjha ya lekala lena la bohahlaudi le karolo kgolo ya Lekeno la Afrika Borwa ha mmoho le ho thehwa ha mesebetsi..     Kabinete thabetse ho ntlafala ha lekala la kamohelo ya baeti le ntlafetseng ka mora sewa sa COVID-.
Halofong ya pele ya 2022, ho bile le maeto lehae dimilione di.

src_text: The Department of Human Settlements will coordinate this two-day meeting to be attended by political champions, practitioners and researchers, including key members of the Committee of Permanent Representatives of the UN-HABITAT based in Nairobi, Kenya.
tgt_text: 2 leng keketseho ya persente tse 114 ha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang selemong sa.

src_text: Key issues to be discussed will include seeking transformational interventions for informal settlements and slums..
tgt_text: Sena se bontsha keketseho leha ho bapiswa le nako tshwanang ka selemo sa 2019 moo ho bileng le maeto lehae dimilione di.

src_text: The outcomes of these deliberations will culminate in the launching of the Global Action Plan Framework, which will be tabled in the UN-HABITAT Assembly for endorsement in  Bills.
tgt_text: Jwalo ka karolo ya ho keteka Kgwedi ya Bohlaudi, Kabinete kgothaletsa Maafrika Borwa hore etele diprofensi tsa bona ka ho fapana..     Kabinete amohetse qeto ya Bofofise ba Belgium ba ho ba le difofane tse tlang Afrika Borwa ka ho otloloha ho qalang kgweding ena (Loetse) leng se tla matlafatsa lekala lena le ho netefatsa taba ya hore Afrika Borwa ke sebaka se setle sa bohahlaudi.

src_text: National Council on Gender-Based Violence and Femicide (GBVF) Bill of.
tgt_text: Sena se tla kenyeletsa difofane tse tla ya Kapa le Johannesburg jwalo ka beke     Melaetsa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission of the National Council on GBVF Bill of 2021 to Parliament for processing.
tgt_text: Diteboho    Kabinete lebisa diteboho le ditakaletso tse ntle ho: Mopresidente William Samoei Ruto wa Kenya, ya neng behwa semmuso ka Labobedi la la 13 Loetse 2022, ho latela dikgetho tse se nang morusu tse neng di tshwerwe ka la 9 Phato.

src_text: This Bill provides legislative framework for the establishment of the statutory body to provide focus intervention in dealing with GBVF.
tgt_text: Motlatsi wa Mopresidente, Ntate David Mabuza ne le teng moketeng oo ho emela Mopresidente Ramaphosa, mmuso le setjhaba sa Afrika Borwa.

src_text: It also provides for the establishment of the Board of the Council that will provide strategic leadership and oversee the implementation of the National Strategic Plan on GBVF, which was approved by Cabinet in October 2020 for implementation.
tgt_text: Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa Rabi ha mmoho le Toropo ya Kapa ka ho tshwara ka katleho Mohope wa Lefatshe wa borobedi wa Rugby Sevens ho tloha ka la 9 ho isa ka la 11 Loetse ne le lekgetlo la pele tonamente ena tshwarelwa Afrika, mme seo se bontsha hantle hore Afrika Borwa tumme hantle ka kamohelo ya baeti..     Matshediso     Kabinete fetisetsa matshediso yona ho malapa le metswalle ya:  Bana ba sekolo ba 18 le batho ba baholo ba babedi ba ileng ba hlokahala kotsing nyarosang ka Labohlano la la 16 Loetse mane Phongola, KwaZulu-Natal ka mora hore lori thulane le vene tsamaisang bana ba sekolo     Kgiro.

src_text: The board will have 51% representation from civil society and 49% from government.
tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang     Ntate Makgothi Samuel Thobakgale jwalo ka Molaodi Kakaretso (DG): Mokomeshenara wa Naha wa Lefapha la Tlhabollo ya Batshwaruwa     Ngaka Malixole Percival Mahlati Motlatsi wa Molaodi Kakaretso DDG: Ya Karolong sebetsang ka Dipetlele le Thuto Phahameng ho tsa Bophelo bo Botle le Ntshetsopele ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo     Ntate Siyabonga Blessing Mdubeki jwalo ka Moabi wa Lefatshe ya ka Sehloohong Lefapheng la tsa Temo, Ntlafatso ya tsa Mobu le ho Ntlafatswa ha Dibaka tsa Mahaeng     Ntate Phaswa Phineas Mamogale Motsamaisi ya ka Sehloohong wa Ditjhelete Lefapheng la tsa Bophelo..     Kabinete dumellana le ho hirwa ha batho ba latelang     Ntate Tshediso Matona jwalo ka Mokomeshenara wa Komeshene ya Tshehetso ya ba Batsho Moruong (BBBEE)     Ditho tsa Boto ya Maipiletso ya Difilimi le Diphatlalatso: Ntate Siyazi Tyamtyam (Modulasetulo); Mme Sohani Natasha Chundhur;Mme Sisanda Nkoala;Mme Shandukani Mulaudzi;Mme Nomaswazi Rachel Shabangu-Mndawe;Ngaka Litheko Modisane;Mme Phuti Nehemia Phukubje;Mme James Shikwambana; leMme Manko Thalitha Bufffel kgethilwe hape).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
tgt_text: Paballo ya Metsi.

src_text: Water security.
tgt_text: Kabinete leboha Maafrika Borwa ka ho ikobela dipehelo mabapi le ho fokotswa ha phepelo ya metsi dikarolong tse itseng tsa Johannesburg, Tshwane le Ekurhuleni ka boiteko ba ho imolla mehlodi ya rona.

src_text: Cabinet thanked South Africans for adhering to water restrictions implemented in certain parts of Johannesburg, Tshwane and Ekurhuleni to stabilise the capacity of reservoirs.
tgt_text: Mehlodi le matamo rona tlasa kgatello kgolo ka lebaka la maemo motjheso phahameng Gauteng leng se qobelletseng ba ha Rand Water ho fokotsa phepelo ya bona ya metsi ho bommasepala bana.

src_text: Dams and reservoirs remain under pressure due to high temperatures in Gauteng, and increasing demand forced Rand Water to reduce water supply to municipalities drastically.
tgt_text: Khamphane ena ya metsi fepela batho ba fetang dimilione tse 11 Gauteng le karolong tse ding tsa Mpumalanga, Foreisitata le Leboya Bophirima..   Ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ka hona ho ikemiseditswe ho leka ho baballa metsi ho fihlela maemo ntlafala.

src_text: The water utility supplies bulk potable water to more than 11 million people in Gauteng, parts of Mpumalanga, the Free State and North West.
tgt_text: Kabinete ipiletsa ho setjhaba hore se tswele pele ho ikobela dipehelo tsa ho fokotswa hona ha phepelo ya metsi ka hore se sebedise ka nepo..   Seteraeke sa ha Transnet.

src_text: These unavoidable restrictions aim to secure water supply and will remain in place until the situation improves.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse tumellano ya nyollelo ya meputso ya dilemo tse tharo fihletsweng ke mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa United National Transport Union (UNTU), le Transnet tla qala morao ho tloha ka la 1 Mmesa 2022 ho fihlela ka la 31 Tlhakubele.

src_text: Cabinet called on the public to continue adhering to the water restrictions and play their part by using this scarce resource sparingly.
tgt_text: Komeshene ya Tharollo ya Ditaba tsa Basebetsi (CCMA) ke yona neng laola dipuisano tsena mme sena se tlisitse mohwanto ona wa ditho tsa UNTU pheletsong hanghang.

src_text: Transnet strike.
tgt_text: Kabinete boetse ya amohela kgoeletso ya mokgatlo wa basebetsi wa South African Transport and Allied Workers Union wa ho fedisa seteraeke sa bona..   Kabinete amohela hape boinehelo ba Transnet ba ho shebana le mosebetsi wa ho leka ho fokotsa mosebetsi saletseng morao boemakepeng le ditereneng tse tsamaisang thepa bakilweng ke seteraeke sena leng se ammeng moruo wa naha le bohle ba tshepetseng tshebeletsong ya Transnet..   Kabinete leboha tshehetso le tshebedisano mmoho bontshitsweng ke dikgwebo nakong ena ya seteraeke.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the three-year wage deal reached between Transnet and the United National Transport Union (UNTU), which is applicable for the period 1 April 2022 to 31 March.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgothaletsa taba ya hore dikamano tsena di tswele pele pakeng tsa Transnete le mekgatlo ya basebetsi molemong wa khamphane le moruo wa naha..   Dikamano tsa Afrika Borwa le naha ya Saudi Arabia.

src_text: The Commission for Conciliation, Mediation and Arbitration mediated this deal, which ended the current industrial action by members of UNTU with immediate effect.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ketelo bileng le katleho ya Mopresidente Cyril Ramaphosa naheng ya Saudi Arabia ka la 15 le la 16 Mphalane.

src_text: Cabinet also welcomed the decision by the South African Transport and Allied Workers Union to call off the strike.
tgt_text: Ketelong ena dinaha tsena tse pedi di ile tsa saena ditumellano tse 17 makaleng mangata kenyeletsang la temo, botshwasi ba dihlapi, la merafo, ho fehlwa ha motlakase ka tsela ya tlhaho, tsa tshireletso, dipalangwang le la tlhahiso ya dimela le diphoofolo tsa lewatleng.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the commitment by Transnet to focus on clearing backlogs that occurred across the port and rail system during the industrial action, which negatively impacted the economy and sectors that are dependent on its services..
tgt_text: Ho boetswe ha saenwa le ditumellano tsa ho thehwa ha Moifo wa tsa Kgwebo le tshebedisano ho tsa sesole le theko ya thepa ya mmuso ha mmoho le tsa tlhahlobo ya maemo lefatshe..   Mopresidente sebedisitse monyetla ona ho mema ba tsa kgwebo Saudi Arabia ho tla sebokeng sa bohlano sa matsete sa Afrika Borwa se tla ba isao ka.

src_text: Cabinet expressed its gratitude to the support and cooperation given by business during the strike.
tgt_text: Saudi Arabia ke naha ya bobedi ka boholo hwebelanang le Afrika Borwa dinaheng tsa Botjhabela ba Bohareng mme hape ke naha eo ho yona ho rekwang thepa ngata tikolohong ena.

src_text: It encourages continuous relationship between Transnet management and labour for the benefit of the company and the economy of the country.
tgt_text: Dikamano tsa dinaha tsena di tlisitse tshebedisano ntle ho tsa kgwebo le matsete..   Matsete Meralo ya Motheo.

src_text: South Africa – Saudi Arabia relations.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohela taba ya ho simollwa ha sitsi sa tlhahiso sa dihlahiswa tsa polasitiki sa maemo pele mane Lanseria Gauteng ke khamphane ya matjhaba ya ALPLA Group.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the successful Working Visit to the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia by President Cyril Ramaphosa on 15 and 16 October.
tgt_text: Sena se paka boinehelo ba Mopresidente Ramaphosa ba ho ntshetsa meralo ya motheo pele jwalo ka mokgwa wa ho nyolla moruo le menyetla ya mosebetsi..   Sena ke projeke ya matsete bitsang tjhelete dimilione di 50 tsa ditollara tsa Amerika mme ke karolo ya projeke ya moralo wa Toropo sebedisang Marangrang ya Lanseria.

src_text: During the visit, the two countries signed 17 Memoranda of Understanding (MoUs) in various fields such as agriculture, fisheries, mining, renewable energy, security, transport and aquaculture.
tgt_text: Projeke ena tla hlahisa botsitso moruong thehe le mesebetsi ka bang.

src_text: Other MoUs signed are on the establishment of Joint Business Council, cooperation in the field of military industries and procurements, and on geological survey cooperation.
tgt_text: Projeke ena kenyeletsa le mananeo 36 thupello ya boratekginiki ho tsa motlakase le ho lokiswa ha metjhini mmoho le ho tsoselletswa botjha ha dintho tse lahlilweng.

src_text: The President used the visit to invite Saudi Arabia businesses to South Africa’s fifth investment conference that will be held in.
tgt_text: Ba rupelletsweng lenaneong lena ba tla sebetsa ho ALPLA Group dinaheng tsohle tse Afrika ka borwa.

src_text: Saudi Arabia is South Africa’s second largest trading partner in the Middle East and the largest source of imports from the region.
tgt_text: Lenaneo lena la thupello le tla qala ka 2023 mme ba 12 ba pele ho tla rupellwa ba tla kgethwa hona mona setjhabeng..   Ho Rashwa Ntle le Molao.

src_text: International relations between both countries have resulted in positive effect on trade and investment trends.
tgt_text: Ho rashwa ntle le molao ho lematsa setjhaba le moruo wa rona.

src_text: Infrastructure investment.
tgt_text: Sena se tlisa tahlehelo ya lekeno mmusong le lekaleng la merafo..   Kabinete thabetse ho hatjwa ha dithunya le ho tshwarwa ha babelaellwa ba 20 ba belaellwang ketsong tsena tsa ho rafa ntle le molao mane Stillfontein Leboya Bophirima..   Kabinete etsa boipiletso ho mekgatlo qobellang melao ho netefatsa hore matsholo bona a atleha.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the commissioning of state-of-the-art plastics production plant by leading international manufacturer, the ALPLA Group, at Lanseria in Gauteng.
tgt_text: Sena se tla romela molaetsa pakang hore tlolo tsa molao ha di na molemo, dinokwane di tshwarwa di kwallwe ntle le tshabo..   Motlakase.

src_text: This augments President Ramaphosa’s commitment to position infrastructure development as means to stimulate the economy and increase employment..
tgt_text: Eskom sa tswa saena tumellano ya dilemo tse 30 le bahlahisi ba ikemetseng ba tla fehla motlakase seteisheneng sa Majuba le sa Tutuka mane Mpumalanga.

src_text: The investment worth US$50 million is key contribution to the Lanseria Smart City masterplan that will drive sustainability and recycling as well as create and sustain 350 jobs.
tgt_text: Kgiro ya lefatshe leo ho tlo ahwa diteishene tsena ho lona le tla tlisa matsete ballwang ho dibilione tse 40 tsa diranta..   Dikhamphane tse nne tse tla fehla motlakase ona ke – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group le Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – mme di tla eketsa motlakase wa 2 000 megawatts phepelong ya naha.

src_text: Included is an apprenticeship programme for 36 mechatronics and recycling technicians for ALPLA Group operations across southern Africa.
tgt_text: Motlakase ona tla hokelwa phepelong ya naha dikgweding tse 24 ho isa ho tse 36 ka mora ho phethelwa ha ditlhoko tse hlokahalang tsa ditjhelete mmoho le ditumello tse mabapi le tshebediso ya mobu..   Paballo ya Tlhahiso ya Dijo.

src_text: The apprentice programme will commence in 2023, with the first 12 South African apprentices coming from local communities.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohela ho tshwarwa ha seboka sa Agri SA sa 2022 mane Tshwane ka la 13 le 14 Mphalane 2022 tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re Hlahisa tsa Lehae”.

src_text: Illegal mining.
tgt_text: Sebokeng sena ho sekasekilwe taba tse kenyeletsang moralo bakeng sa tlhahiso ya lehae, meralo ya motheo bakeng sa bahlahisi ba lehae; ho etsa tikoloho ya rona dumelle tlhahiso ya dijo bakeng sa nako tlang ha mmoho le ho thusa bahlahisi ba lehae tshebetsong ya bona ya ho hlahisa dijo kwano..   Bakeng sa paballo ya nako tlang ya tlhahiso ya dijo, Kabinete amohetse ho thehwa ha Sitsi sa Naha sa Thibelo ya Ditshwaetso tse amang Leruo le Dijalo.

src_text: Illegal mining hurts communities and our economy, and results in loss of revenue for both government and the mining sector..
tgt_text: Sena se etswa ke Lekala la Mahlale tsa Temo Lefapheng la Saense le Mahlale ka kopanelo le Yunivesithi ya Tshwane.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the seizure of firearms cache and the arrest of 20 suspects linked to illegal mining during an operation at mineshaft in Stilfontein in North West.
tgt_text: Sitsi sena se tla thusa thibelong le ho fokotseng ditshwaetso tsa dijalo le diphoofolo leng se tla tshehetsa tlhahiso ya dijo le ntshetsopele ya dibaka tsa mahaeng   Diqeto tsa Kabinete.

src_text: Cabinet appeals to South Africans to continue working with law-enforcement agencies to ensure the success of future anti-crime operations.
tgt_text: Ho Lokiswa ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika.

src_text: This will send strong message that crime does not pay, and that criminals will be arrested and prosecuted without fear or favour..   Energy.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tokomane ya Mokgatlo wa Dinaha tsa Afrika bakeng sa Dipehelo, Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso, Taolo ya Bommasepala le Ntshetso pele ya bona ho tla tla lokiswa.

src_text: Eskom recently signed 30-year lease agreements with four independent power producer investors to construct new clean-energy generation capacity at Majuba and Tutuka power stations in Mpumalanga.
tgt_text: Afrika Borwa ne saene Tokomane ena ka Phato.

src_text: The land leases will attract an estimated investment of about R40 billion.

The four investors – HDF Energy South Africa, Red Rocket SA, Sola Group and Mainstream Renewable Power Developments South Africa – will contribute at least 2 000 megawatts to the national electricity grid.
tgt_text: Tokomane ena ya Keketso ya Matla Tshebetso fana ka moralo dinaheng tsohle tseo leng ditho mabapi le taba ya keketso ya tsela tsa tshebetso ho tloha boemong ba naha ho isa maemong ohle mmuso.

src_text: The new generation capacity is expected to be connected to the grid within 24 to 36 months from financial closure, subject to environmental, land zoning and other regulatory approvals.
tgt_text: Tokomane ena shebane haholo le temana ya katoloso ya matla tshebetso maemong bommasepala le ntshetsopele ya bona..   Kopano ya Matjhaba ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya Polokeho Ditereneng (IRSC).

src_text: Food security.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tshwarelwa ha kopano ya bo 32 ya Selemo le Selemo ya IRSC Johannesburg ho tloha ka la 1 ho isa ka la 6 Mphalane 2023, tlasa lepetjo le reng: “Re lokisa diterene tsa rona Maemong sa Lokang”.

src_text: Cabinet welcomed the hosting of the Agri SA Congress 2022 in Pretoria on 13 and 14 October 2022 under the theme: “Growing Local”.
tgt_text: IRSC ke foramo ya matjhaba kopanyang ditsebi ho tsa polokeho ho tsa diterene boemong ba matjhaba ho tla hlabana malotsana ka tsa ntlafatso ya polokeho ditereneng..   Mokgatlo wa Afrika Borwa wa tsa Polokeho ho tsa Diterene ne qetele ho tshwara kopano ena ka selemo sa.

src_text: The congress engaged on issues such as making agriculture masterplans work for local growers; sustainable infrastructure for locally grown food; making the local environment sustainable for local food production into the future, and strengthening food producers’ capacity to process locally grown produce.

In further prioritising food security, Cabinet also welcomed the launch of the National Biosecurity Hub, by the Department of Science and Innovation's Agricultural Bio-economy Innovation Partnership Programme, in collaboration with the University of Pretoria.
tgt_text: Mokgahlelo wa Bobedi wa Moralo wa Naha wa Selemo sa 2050 wa Meralo ya Motheo (NIP 2050).

src_text: The hub will support the prevention, reduction and management of crop and animal disease, which will contribute to increased productivity, food security and sustainable rural development   Cabinet decisions.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho hatiswa ha mokgahlelo wa bobedi wa moralo wa NIP 2050 bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba.

src_text: Ratification of the Decentralisation Charter of the African Union (AU).
tgt_text: Moralo ona fana ka tataiso tabeng ya maano tshebetso le diprojeke tsa mmuso..   Moralo ona hlwaya ditshebetso tsa diprojeke lekaleng la ho dudiswa ha setjhaba, ditshebeletso tsa bommasepala tse kenyeletsang motlakase; metsi; ho thothwa ha matlakala; dipalangwang tsa setjhaba; meralo ya motheo ya tsa thuto, bophelo le dijithale le thibelo ya bobodu le bonokwane..   Moralo ona bontsha moo ho hlokahalang ho tsepamiswa maikutlo teng, le ho lekola maemo teng renang ha jwale le se tlamehang ho etswa bakeng sa ho fihlela tjhebelo pele ya moralo ona.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament the AU Charter on the Values and Principles of Decentralisation, Local Governance and Local Development for ratification.
tgt_text: Moralo ona eletsa hore tshebetso ya moralo ona be ya nako ya dilemo tse tharo.

src_text: South Africa signed the charter in August..
tgt_text: Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

src_text: The Decentralisation Charter provides framework to all member states guiding document on the decentralisation of powers and functions from national to other spheres of government.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Moralo wa Naha wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

src_text: The charter deals largely with the decentralisation of authority and functions, local governance framework and local development.
tgt_text: Moralo ona ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa 2021 bakeng sa maikutlo setjhaba..  Moralo ona fana ka ditshiya tse hlano mabapi le ho ntlafatsa Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso.

src_text: 32nd Annual International Railway Safety Council (IRSC).
tgt_text: Ditshiya tsena di kenyeletsa tsela ya kamohelo ya ba sa tswa hirwa Ditshebeletsong tsa Mmuso; tataiso ya mosebetsi ho ba sa tswa hirwa; meralo le ho behwa leihlo ha tsela eo basebeletsi ba sebetsang ka yona; thupello tswellang ha mmoho le menyetla ya ntlafatso ya maemo thuto..   Diphetoho dipehelong tsa kgiro ya Balaodi Kakaretso (bo DG).

src_text: Cabinet approved the hosting of the 32nd Annual IRSC Meeting in Johannesburg from 1 to 6 October 2023 under the theme: “Reshaping railways in an uncertain World”.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana tlaleho sisinyang dipehelo le boiphihlelo boo ba hirwang jwalo ka Balaodi Kakaretso Mafapheng Mmuso ba tlamehang ho ba le bona.

src_text: The IRSC is an international forum that brings together railway safety professionals from all over the world to exchange experiences so as to improve railway safety..   As member of the IRSC, South Africa’s Railway Safety Regulator last hosted this forum in.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena tla le ditshisinyo tse ngata tse kenyeletsang nako ya kgiro ya bo DG le tsela eo ba maemong hodimo taolo ba abang ka teng mosebetsi ho basebeletsi ba tsa ditjhelete nngwe ya ditshisinyo ke ya hore DG ofising ya Mopresidente boele be yena Hlooho ya Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba.

src_text: Draft National Infrastructure Plan 2050 (NIP 2050) Phase.
tgt_text: Maemong diprofensi sena se tla kengwa ofising ya ditonakgolo.

src_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the draft NIP 2050 Phase 2 for public consultation.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena boetse fana ka tataiso ya ka moo mafapha tlang ho laola ka yona ditumellano tsa kgiro tsa bo DG..   Ho boetse ho na le diphetoho ho tsela eo ho lekolwang Maemo Tshebetso bo DG hore di tsamaisane le diphetoho tse tokomaneng ena.. 4   Bekeng tlang Letona le Tshwereng Mokobobo la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba, Ntate Thulas Nxesi tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba ho tla phatlalatsa tsela eo Moralo wa Ntlafatso ya Tsela ya Tshebetso ya Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso tla kengwa tshebetsong ka teng le ho hlopholla diphetoho tse entsweng dipehelong tsa kgiro ya bo DG..   Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha Tokomane ya Tshebetso Mabapi le Ditokelo tsa Batho ba sa Itekanelang ya 2020-2021 (WPRPD).

src_text: The plan offers direction in strengthening and augmenting government strategic integrated projects..
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana Tlaleho ya Bohlano ya Kgatelopele ya ho Kengwa Tshebetsong ha WPRPD fanang ka kgatelopele ho kengweng tshebetsong ha WPRPD.

src_text: It identifies the strategic projects in human settlements; municipal electricity; water; solid waste; passenger transport; education and health infrastructure; digital infrastructure, and crime and corruption.
tgt_text: Tlaleho ena na le diphehiso ho tswa mafapheng naha le diprofensi kenyeletsang le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Tlaleho ya pele ne phatlalatswe ka selemo sa.

src_text: The format of the plan provides vision of the area to be tackled, offers an assessment of the current status, outlines the essential conditions for success and states what needs to be done to achieve the vision.
tgt_text: Ena ya bohlano se tjhaetswe monwana hore ka hatiswa bukeng ya diphatlalatso tsa mmuso ke Lefapha la Basadi, Batjha le Batho ba sa Itekanelang..   Diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya Tumellano ya ho Fokotsa Kgethollo Kgahlano le Basadi (CEDAW).

src_text: It proposes the implementation process to be taken over the three-year running cycle action plan.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha diphetoho Karolong ya bo 20(1) ya CEDAW ho tla lokiswa.

src_text: National Implementation Framework towards the Professionalisation of the Public Service.
tgt_text: Diphetoho tsena di bolela ka ho eketswa ha nako ya dikopano tsa komiti sekasekanang le ditlaleho tsa dinaha tseo leng ditho..   Afrika Borwa ne saene tumellano ena ka 1993 mme ya lokiswa ka Tshitwe.

src_text: Cabinet approved the National Implementation Framework towards the Professionalisation of the Public Service.
tgt_text: Ho tliswa ha yona Palamenteng ho etsetswa hore tokomane ena kgone ho tsamaisana le diphetoho tsa Karolo ya bo 20(1) ya tumellano ena.

src_text: The framework was published for public consultation in.
tgt_text: Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng.
Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tumellano ya Matjhaba ya Kamohelo ya Mangolo Thuto Phahameng bakeng sa tokiso.

src_text: The framework provides five pillars on interventions in professionalising the Public Service.
tgt_text: Ha se lokisitswe tla romelwa ho Matjhaba Kopaneng lekaleng la teng la Thuto, Saense le tsa Botjhaba leng se etswang ho latela Molao wa Naha Laolang Mangolo Thuto Phahameng wa 2008 (Molao wa bo 67 wa 2008).

src_text: The pillars include pre-entry recruitment and selection within the Public Service; induction and onboarding; planning and performance management; continuous learning and professional development, and career progression and career incidents.
tgt_text: Tumellano ena ya Matjhaba maikemisetso yona ke ho netefatsa hore ha ho kgethollo boemong ba matjhaba kamohelong ya mangolo thuto phahameng.

src_text: Changes in the conditions of employment for Directors-General (DGs).
tgt_text: Sena se etsa hore dinaha tseo leng ditho di amohele maemo thuto dinaha tse 193 tseo leng ditho tsa Matjhaba Kopaneng.

src_text: Cabinet approved the report that proposes measures to strengthen the capacity and capability of the DGs in the Public Service.
tgt_text: 9  Ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete.

src_text: The report made several proposals,  including the tenure of DGs and the management of delegations by the Executive Authority to the accounting officers..
tgt_text: 1   Kabinete dumellane le phatlalatso ya ofisi ya Mopresidente ya ka Mantaha wa la 17 Mphalane 2022 ya ho tlohelwa ha diphetoho tse neng di entswe Bukaneng ya Merokotso ya Ditho tsa Kabinete ya.

src_text: The report also proposed that the DG in The Presidency will be designated as the Head of Public Administration.
tgt_text: 2  Diphetoho tsena tse neng di etswe ka Mmesa 2022, di ne di eketsa merokotso diofising tsa Matona ikarabellang mafapheng fetang le le leng.

src_text: In the provinces, this function will be designated to the DGs in the offices of the Premiers.
tgt_text: Di ne di boetse di bolela ha mmuso tla lefella ka botlalo motlakase le metsi moo matona dulang teng.. 3  Kabinete mametse kgoeletso ya setjhaba mme ya nka qeto ya ho lekola diphetoho tsena botjha.

src_text: The report further proposed measures to guide departments on the management of contracts of DGs.
tgt_text: Ho lekolwa botjha hona ho tla etswa ke komiti ikemetseng mme tlaleho ya teng tla phatlalatswa ho websaete ya Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Mmuso: www.dpsa.gov.za.10  Tshebedisano Diphetohong tsa ho Fokotsa ho Silafala ha Moya (JETP) ha mmoho le Moralo wa Matsete JETP, (JETP-IP).

src_text: The revised Performance Management System for DGs is being revised to align it with the approved changes.
tgt_text: 1  Ka mora ho amohela ho phatlalatswa JETP le JETP-IP, Kabinete tjhaetse JETP-IP monwana mme ya leboha le mosebetsi wa ho hlahisa.. 2  JETP-IP hlakisa se hlokahalang ho etswa bakeng sa hore mmuso finyelle maikemisetso ona ho fokotsa ho silafala ha moya ho ka tlisa diphetoho setjhabeng le ho basebeletsi ba amehang.. 3  Komiti ya Matona ya ho Fetoha ha Maemo Lehodimo tla bitsa seboka sa boraditaba haufinyane ho tla fana ka lesedi le eketsehileng   Ditshisinyo tsa Molao.

src_text: The Acting Minister of Public Service and Administration, Mr Thulas Nxesi, will next week convene media briefing to outline the National Implementation Framework towards the Professionalisation of the Public Service and also unpack the approved changes in the conditions of employment for DGs.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng ya Selemo sa.

src_text: Fifth Progress Report on the Implementation of the White Paper on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities (WPRPD) 2020-.
tgt_text: Kabinete tjhaetse monwana ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa Selemo sa 2022 ho ka sekasekwa.

src_text: Cabinet approved the Fifth Progress Report on the Implementation of the WPRPD, which provides an update on the implementation of the WPRPD.
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena ntlafatsa molao wa dilemong tse 70 tse fetileng wa Bahwebi ba Dikepeng wa 1951, (Molao wa bo 57 wa 1951)..   Ha tshisinyo ena se le molao tla fana ka moralo wa taolo ya kgwebo ya dikepeng tla laola le ho ahwa, ho ngodiswa, ho rehwa mabitso le ho behellwa ha dikepe tse tsofetseng ka thoko..   Diphetoho tsena di tla tlisa diphetoho lekaleng lena la dipalangwang tsa mawatleng le ho netefatsa hore naha ena ipapisa le Ditumellano tsa Matjhaba tsa Dipalangwang tsa Mawatleng..   Tshisinyo ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa.

src_text: The report covers inputs from national and provincial government departments.
tgt_text: Kabinete amohetse ho tliswa Palamenteng ha Tshisinyo ya Ntlafatso ya Molao wa Dipalopalo wa Selemo sa 2022 ho tla sekasekwa.

src_text: It provides updates on the policy implementation that include budget allocations..
tgt_text: Tshisinyo ena sisinya diphetoho Molaong wa Dipalopalo wa 1999 (Molao wa bo 6 wa 1999).

src_text: The first annual progress report was published in.
tgt_text: Diphetoho tsena di etswa mabapi le ho ralwa ha mmoho le ho kengwa tshebetsong ha Mokgwa wa Tshebetso wa Naha wa Dipalopalo tshehetsang ho sebediswa ha mokgwa wa dipalopalo bontshang bopaki..   Diphetoho tsena di matlafatsa tshebedisano mmoho ya Lefapha la Dipalopalo le makala mang mmuso ha mmoho le ho atolla tshebetso ya Molao ona   Diketsahalo tse tlang.

src_text: This fifth progress report has been approved to be gazetted and published by the Department of Women, Youth and Persons with Disabilities.
tgt_text: Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Dikgwebo tse Nyane, tse Mahareng le tse Kgolwanyane (SMME) le Mekgatlo ya Matsema.

src_text: Amendment to Article 20(1) of the Convention on the Elimination of All Forms of Discrimination Against Women (CEDAW).
tgt_text: Lefapha la Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane ka kopanelo le lekala le ikemetseng ba tla tshwara Seboka sa Naha sa Mopresidente sa di-SMME le Mekgatlo ya Matsema mane Bryanston, Gauteng ho tloha ka la 13 ho ya ka la 15 Pudungwana.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the amendment to Article 20(1) of the CEDAW for ratification.
The amendments provide for an increased duration of the committee meetings that process the member states’ reports.
tgt_text: Seboka sena se tla kopanya ditsebi ho tswa ho mmuso le lekaleng le ikemetseng ho tla bontshana ka tsela tsa ntlafatso lekaleng lena.

src_text: South Africa signed this convention in 1993 and subsequently ratified it in December.
tgt_text: Hara ba lebeletsweng ke mekgatlo ya dikgwebo, ba sebetsang ka di-SMME, barutehi, bangodi ba melawana le ba mekgatlo ya tshehetso ya ditjhelete..   Sebokeng sena ho tla boela ho sekasekwe Moralo wa Kopanelo wa Ntshetsopele ya Dikgwebo tse Nyane oo ka ona ho ikemiseditsweng ho matlafatsa lekala lena la di-SMME.

src_text: The submission to Parliament seeks to align the previously ratified convention with the amendment to Article 20(1) of the convention.
tgt_text: Seboka sena hape ho lebeletswe hore se thakgole le taba ya Dikgau tsa Selemo le Selemo tsa Mopresidente tsa di-SMME..   Seboka sa Mopresidente sa Twantsho tsa Tlhekefetso ya Basadi le Dipolao tsa Bona (GBVF) sa Selemo sa.

src_text: Global Convention on the Recognition of Qualifications concerning Higher Education .
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla tshwara Seboka sa bobedi sa GBVF mane Gallagher Convention Centre, Gauteng ka la 1 le la 2 Pudungwana.

src_text: Cabinet approved the submission to Parliament of the Global Convention on the Recognition of Qualifications concerning Higher Education for ratification.
tgt_text: Seboka sa pele se ne se tshwarwe ka selemo sa 2018 seo ho sona mmuso le mekgatlo ya setjhaba ba neng ba etse boinehelo ba ho fokotsa ditlhekefetso tsena naheng ena..   Seboka sena sa bobedi ka sona ho tla shejwa tema seng kgathilwe ho kenyeng tshebetsong Moralo wa Naha wa GBVF.

src_text: Once ratified it will be deposited to the United Nations (UN) Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization and domestically enabled through the National Qualifications Framework Act, 2008 (Act 67 of 2008).
tgt_text: Lepetjo la selemong sena le tla re: “Re Tiisa Boikarabelo, ho Patlakiswa le ho Matlafatswa HONA JWALE”..   Seboka sena se tla buisana ka taba tse kenyeletsang boikarabelo mafapheng ikarabellang ha mmoho le bankakarolo ba kang mekgatlo ya setjhaba, lekala le ikemetseng le ya basebetsi..   Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente leba Kapa Leboya.

src_text: The Global Convention establishes universal principles for fair, transparent and non-discriminatory recognition of higher education qualifications and qualifications.
tgt_text: Imbizo ya Bohlano ya Mopresidente ya Ntlafatso ya Ditereke (DDM) tlo tshwarelwa Upington, Kapa Leboya ka Labohlano la la 21 Mphalane 2022 lebaleng la dipapadi la Mxolisi Dicky Jacobs..   Imbizo ena ya Mopresidente ya DDM tlo lekola kgatelo pele le diphephetso tse teng phanong ya ditshebeletso Kapa Leboya mme ho be le mekgwa ya tharollo.

src_text: It allows for the recognition of foreign qualifications in 193 UN member states.
tgt_text: DDM netefatsa ho potlakiswa ha moralo wa phano ya ditshebeletso, ho kengwa ha lona tshebetsong ha mmoho le kabo ya teng ya ditjhelete..   Pele ho imbizo ena, matona, ditho tsa moifo wa bommasepala le boramotse ba tla tshwara mananeo fapafapaneng sebakeng seo sa Upington..   Tlaleho ya Hara Selemo ya Kabo ya Matlotlo (MTBPS).

src_text: Withdrawal of the amendments to the Guide for Members of the Executive.
tgt_text: Kabinete kgolwa hore ho fana ka MTBPS ya selemo sa 2022 ke Letona la Matlotlo Enoch Godongwana ka Laboraro la la 26 Mphalane 2022, ke karolo ya mehato ya bohlokwa ya ho beha tsohle pepeneng ha re tla kabong ya matlotlo..   MTBPS fana ka tlaleho ya boinehelo ba mmuso ba ho bontsha ka moo matlotlo naha sebediswang ka teng boetse bontsha le ka moo mmuso tlang ho leka ho fokotsa sekgeo pakeng tsa tjhelete kenang le sebediswang..   Ditlhahlobo tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome.

src_text: Cabinet endorsed the announcement made by The Presidency on Monday, 17 October 2022 to withdraw the amendments made to the Guide for Members of the Executive, also called the Ministerial Handbook, for..
tgt_text: Ditlhahlobo tsa Makgaolakgang tsa Sehlopha sa Leshome tsa selemo sa 2022 di tlo qala ka la 31 Mphalane mme di fele ka la 7 Tshitwe.

src_text: The amendments that were made in April 2022 provided for additional capacity to some of the offices of the Ministers who are responsible for more than one portfolio.
tgt_text: Kabinete lakaletsa baithuti bana ba Selemo sa 2022 mahlohonolo ditlhahlobong tsa bona.

src_text: They also required the State to take over full responsibility for the costs associated with the provision of electricity and water to official residences occupied by members of the executive..
tgt_text: Tshehetso ya matitjhere, batswadi le bahlokomedi tla thusa baithuti bana ho shebana le ditlhahlobo tsa bona ka boitshepo..   Kabinete etsa kgoeletso ho batswadi le bahlokomedi ho kgothatsa le ho thusa bana hore ba kgone ho ithuta hantle malapeng..   Seboka sa Moralo wa Naha wa Ntsetsopele (NDP) le Bokgoni ba Mmuso.

src_text: Cabinet noted the concerns raised by the public and resolved to review the Guide for Members of the Executive.
tgt_text: Lefapha la Ditshebeletso tsa Setjhaba ka kopanelo le Komeshene ya Naha ya Meralo ka tshebedisano mmoho le lekala la Ntshetsopele Yunivesithing ya Kwa Zulu-Natal di tla tshwara seboka sa NDP le Bokgoni ba Mmuso ho tloha ka la 7 ho ya ho la 9 Pudungwana 2022 lekaleng la Howard College la Yunivesithi ena ya KwaZulu-Natal..   Seboka sena se tla hlahloba bokgoni ba mmuso le tshebetso ya ona dilemong tse leshome tsa pele tsa NDP.

src_text: This process will be handled by neutral structure and once completed, the guide will be made public through the Department of Public Service and Administration’s website: www.dpsa.gov.za.
tgt_text: Lepetjo la seboka sena ke le reng: “Re Lekola Tshebetso le Bokgoni ba Mmuso Dilemong tse Leshome tsa NDP”.

src_text: Just Energy Transition Partnership (JETP) and JETP Investment Plan (JETP-IP).
tgt_text: Ho Nehelanwa ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini.

src_text: After welcoming presentation on the JETP and the JETP-IP, Cabinet endorsed the JETP-IP and expressed its appreciation of the detailed work undertaken to develop it..
tgt_text: Mopresidente Ramaphosa tla fana ka Lengolo la Bopaki ba Borena ho Morena Misuzulu KaZwelithini mane Lebaleng la Dipapadi la Moses Mabhida, Thekong, ka Moqebelo wa la 29 Mphalane.. src_text: The JETP-IP outlines the investments required to achieve the decarbonisation commitments made by the Government of South Africa while promoting sustainable development, and ensuring just transition for affected workers and communities..

src_text: Cabinet has approved the submission of the Merchant Shipping Bill of 2022 to Parliament for further processing.
tgt_text: Pele batho bohle ba hirwa, ho tla hlahlobisiswa mangolo bona thuto le mang hlokahalang   Moatevokate James Mlawu – Molaodi Kakaretso, Lefapheng la Dipalangwang   Ntate Shabeer Khan – Motsamaise Moholo wa Ditjhelete: Lefapheng la Matlotlo.

src_text: The Bill overhauls the 70-year-old Merchant Shipping Act, 1951 (Act 57 of 1951).

src_text: Issues in the environment.
